Description: Washington, DC is a dynamic urban landscape with a vibrant and growing community of people just like you who choose to work here, play here, and craft their lifestyle from the streets of the nation's capital. Dock 79 is positioned in just the right corner of a stunning neighborhood, allowing you to take advantage of everything the city has to offer. We also have the best waterfront views in town! * Dock79 is the pinnacle of true city living. A myriad of dining choices are at your fingertips with everything from light fare, family-style fun, and nighttime adventures for you to choose from. The endless options are a treat in themselves. * Life in our corner of DC is changing at an amazing rate. Join us at Dock79 and become a part of the movement to make this city even greater. With sophisticated residential spaces and an expansion plan that will blow your mind, theres no stopping the Docks.

Description: South Cathedral Mansions is nestled at the northwest corner of Cathedral and Connecticut Avenues in the heart of Woodley Park, just steps away from the Woodley Park-Zoo/Adams Morgan Metro station and three blocks from the Cleveland Park metro station. Weve preserved 20th century architectural details and added in features that complement the inherent beauty of South Cathedral Mansions. Glide across restored antique hardwood flooring in your apartment home and roll open a landmark-approved high-efficiency casement window to let in the breeze. Stroll into your state-of-the-art kitchen and fire up the gourmet gas cook-tops. Revel in the luxury of today, while soaking up the history of yesterday.

Description: There's nothing in DC like Hecht Warehouse's loft style apartments. Polished concrete floors meet subway-tiled bathrooms. Stylish kitchens with stainless steel appliances compliment exposed brick and glass block walls. Open spaces beckon for small gatherings. These are homes with a palpable sense of history thoughtfully redesigned for modern comfort. * While the building may be vintage, its amenities are anything but. The Hecht Warehouse is built for people unwilling to sit around and collect dust. It's built for the social, the active, the makers and the doers. This is a home where there are no strangersonly friends you haven't met yet. * Welcome to Hecht Warehouse and the new Ivy City, where you can dine in, go out, shop around, and sleep in the next day.

Description: Brookland Press takes its inspiration from the industrial era printing press, and pays homage to the artisans and craftsmen of Brooklands early days. With two distinct buildings, The Foundry and The Forge, youll have your choice of tastefully designed studio, one, and two bedroom residences with an unparalleled list of amenities for workdays and weekends alike. * THE FOUNDRY * With a new 2-story addition, the original 3 & 4-story industrial warehouse was converted to a 157-unit residential building now called The Foundry. Inspired in part by the existing historic elements from the previous structure, The Foundrys lofted ceilings, concrete columns and floors, and dramatic floor to ceiling windows create a vintage living experience rooted in texture and space unlike any found in the neighborhood. * THE FORGE * In juxtaposition to its sister building, The Forge is a brand new 6-story structure with 139 residences, featuring a wholly modern feel. With engineered wood floors and industrial fixtures and finishes, The Forge brings a modern sensibility to Brookland Press. The buildings exterior speaks to the former industrial uses across the site by incorporating brick with accents of stone and metal panels, while offering a warmer palette of textures and colors throughout.

Description: The locals know it. Even the tourists know it. Capitol Hill is one of the most eclectic, charming and sought-after neighborhoods in DC. In the center of it all, The Residences at Eastern Market is a collection of 128 spacious apartment homes that blends the uniqueness of the Hill with the beauty of modern design. Here, the energy of Eastern Market pairs with the quiet retreat of a landscaped courtyard. You'll find a convenient grocery store on the ground and a show-stopping pool on the roof. Friendly neighbors will become fast friends, and you'll have elegant spaces to host them. The best of DC and the beauty of good design: a match made only at The Residences at Eastern Market.

Description: Innovative. Invigorating. Intelligent. Thats what defines life at Aventine Fort Totten. Were a new breed of affordable and modern apartment homes changing the face of comfort and convenience in Washington, DC. Were for people who know what they want, and arent afraid to live life to the fullest. An unrestricted and forward-looking community meant to inspire the lives of our residents, Aventine Fort Totten is the answer to the balancing act that urban living requires today. Long workdays and longer nights demand style and sophistication, as well as functionality and comfort. Our Fort Totten apartments recharge the soul and replenish the spirit so you can tackle all the challenges life throws at you. Weve designed every floor plan with a breathtaking level of sophistication, but havent sacrificed livability. With four spacious floor plans and forty individual configurations to choose from, weve risen above the expected.

Description: The Woodward building, built in 1911 by Samuel W. Woodward, sits in a premier setting in the Historic 15th Street Financial District. It is ideally located one block from the White House and the U.S. Treasury building, just across the street from the McPherson Square Metro station, and within easy reach of world-class museums, galleries, theaters, and entertainment. This historic Beaux-Arts Revival building has been meticulously restored and renovated with contemporary features including limed oak flooring, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, expansive windows, and 9- to 12-foot ceilings. Select homes feature private terraces and picture-perfect views of the Washington Monument. Complemented by a 24-hour concierge and service that rivals the hospitality of a luxury hotel, The Woodward holds modern living with timeless appeal.

Description: Where:Live among the nightlife, restaurants, bars, and shops of the most desirable district, and don't be surprised by your friend's envy. The Louis is the premier modern addition to the U Street corridor. All of D.C. is your backdrop with city and monumental views as you entertain on the amenity level and transport yourself to a staycation on the amenity pool level. You don't have to go far as the metro, shops, restaurants, grocery store, and entertainment is right out your front door. What:The Louis is more than an apartment building; it is your community. All the authenticity, creativity, and fun the U street corridor has to offer converges in your new home. The history of 14th and U is rich and unique, and The Louis honors that history with it's clean lines, monochromatic tones, and vintage-inspired accents. You'll experience luxurious, sustainable living at The Louis, while enjoying amenities that reflect the U street corridor by bringing you and your neighbors together.

Description: Vaughan Place offers three distinctive styles of convenient urban lifestyles; The Towers, The Town Homes and The Terraces. These unique homes offer architectural-grade finishes, superior features, first-class services and amenities in a beautifully landscaped setting at the heart of the Embassy District. On-site amenities include, surface and garage parking, Olympic size swimming pool, state of the art fitness center and 24/7 concierge services. Our location is prime DC, just steps from Georgetown and Friendship Heights. Within minutes of your secluded community are many cultural and historical landmarks, including the Washington National Cathedral, Kennedy Center, Fort Reno Park, and American University. At Vaughan Place, you can experience the best of both worlds - the convenience of city living with the atmosphere of a village setting.

Description:
Welcome to Zen Apollo
Downtown DC apartments as tranquil as they are central. Live close to work and play. Visit our website at www.ZenApollo.com. Overview video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sIoZaGImJYE
Virtual Tours: http://bit.ly/1PkpSAi Be close to work and close to all the nightlife of Logan Circle. Near four metro lines: three blocks to orange and blue line; six blocks to red line; about four blocks to green line. Also near two Circulator bus lines. Amenities
- Rooftop pool and sundeck with lifeguard
- 24-hour concierge with front desk services
- Renovated, sunlit, laundry room by 10th floor patio
- Package notification via text or email
- Optional top-floor gym for $300 per year
- Hourly rentals cars in building offered by Enterprise CarShare and Zipcar.
- On-site management office
- Reserved garage parking for $225 monthly and $20 daily parking for out-of town guests
- Free bicycle parking
- Zen landscaping
- Courtyard driveway for easy drop-off and pick-up
- Community rooms including game room, theater and lounge for $150 per year Testimonials
"Anything that needs to be repaired, gets fixed right away." "The people at the building's front desk are really nice and helpful. That makes such a difference." Location
- Close to nightlife of Logan Circle and City Center
- 2.5 blocks to Orange Line (McPherson Square)
- 6.5 blocks to Red Line (Metro Center)
- Near two Circulator bus routes
- Bikeshare 1/2 block away
- 12 min walk to Whole Foods grocery
- 15 min walk to the 17+ new restaurants on 14th St.
- 1 block from a pleasant city park with daytime food trucks Office Hours Monday to Thurs: 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Friday: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Check for weekend open houses.

Description: The nation’s capital is experiencing a never-before-seen level of modern luxury living. Located in Southeast, Washington’s only waterfront neighborhood, steps from Nationals Park and a short stroll from Capitol Hill, One Hill South will exceed the expectations of Washington’s most discerning residents with its extraordinary amenity offerings, high-end finishes and tailored lifestyle services. Featured inside is a collection of unique public spaces and amenities carefully crafted with artisan designed furniture and finishes sourced from around the world. Every detail has been thoroughly considered. Retreat into the lush interior courtyard or rooftop, relax with a best-seller in the resident lounge, enjoy an exceptional evening with friends in the private party room — or just steps from your front door, admire the serenity of a gorgeous sunset while strolling through Canal Park or along the river walk trail.

Description: Water and Gas are included at Alban Towers Apartments, which first opened its doors in 1929. Painstakingly restored in 2001, these Georgetown apartments offer great amenities and beautiful finishes throughout. Our location at the gateway to Embassy Row in the Cathedral Heights neighborhood provides immediate access to Georgetown, Rock Creek Park, galleries, museums and theaters. Our homes feature hardwood floors, walk-in closets with shelving, private balconies with magnificent views, sunrooms and dens. Enjoy our heated indoor lap pool, 24-hour fitness center, clubroom with kitchen and a private reading library.

Description: Now Leasing! 455 Eye Street Apartments is a thoughtful blend of history and modern luxury in DC's Mount Vernon Triangle. The existing historic structures have been preserved and are now complemented by sleek residential towers accented with glass and brick. These new homes are surrounded by original exposed brick and lush foliage. Residents can enjoy a state-of-the-art fitness center, roof deck with pool and spacious resident lounges. Our collection includes studios, one bedrooms, two bedrooms, airy lofts and town-homes. All finished with quartz counter tops, stainless steel appliances, wide plank hard surface floors and in-home washers and dryers.

Description: A special place to call home, The Metropolitan Apartments is a beautiful, historic, & exquisitely renovated apartment community built in the stylish 1930s design, containing superbly designed studio, 1-Bedroom, 1-Bedroom & Den, 2-Bedroom, and 2-Bedroom & Den apartment homes located just blocks from the Rhode Island Avenue metro station. Finding just the right place to call home in Washington DC to fit your lifestyle can be a challenge. Fortunately, The Metropolitan has every luxurious detail prepared in their artistically designed apartments located in this trendy Northeast neighborhood. All apartment homes come with spacious floor plans, making it easier to live and play in comfort. The prime location offers easy access to metro, shopping, and local universities, all coupled with amazing amenities such as a gourmet kitchen, a washer/dryer, granite countertops, built-in microwaves, original refurbished hardwood floors, individually controlled heat and air conditioning, and stylish ceiling fans. The Metropolitan boasts an ornate, historic lobby, a state-of-the-art fitness center, bike room, controlled-access entry, reserved parking, storage, FIOS and concierge services. All in one of the most beautiful & historically restored apartment communities in Washington DC. Mere steps from all the best that DC has to offer, you can quickly run errands, shop, and explore without traveling far from the comfort of your home. The Metropolitan is the perfect blend of history and modern living creatively combined for an extraordinary living experience. Pet-friendly, we more than welcome your four legged family members. The courtyard and dog walk make it a great place for pet owners and animals lovers. Take advantage of this amazing opportunity to make The Metropolitan Apartments your new home by pre-leasing and reserving your apartment home today. With world-class features and easy accessibility to a diverse selection of necessities, entertainment, and restaurants in this DC neighborhood, it won't take long for you to miss out on a beautiful home! Why wait? . Check out our website at: www.themetropolitanapts.com Housing Choice Vouchers Welcome, Vales de Elleccion de Vivienda.

Description: Now Leasing! Move-in September 1st and get October rent free* The long-awaited release of 700 Constitution has arrived. Over three years of painstaking planning, design, creating and perfecting have gone into the creation of this magnificent property. All that’s left is to move in and call 700 Constitution your home. Nestled among stately townhouses, inviting parks and peaceful residential streets, 700 Constitution is a boutique apartment building of only 139 apartment homes, and Capitol Hill’s premiere address. Situated at the epicenter of Capitol Hill, 700 Constitution enjoys close proximity to everything you want to enjoy in this exciting area of DC. Enjoy a short stroll to Eastern Market to partake in the festivities. Head a little further south to Barracks Row and the hardest choice you’ll make is deciding which fabulous restaurant to dine at. Want even more hustle-and-bustle? The excitement of H Street is 0.7 miles north. The Capitol building, Library of Congress and Supreme Court are also all within walking distance. Need public transportation? Union Station metro/train/bus terminal is 0.7 miles from our front door and the Eastern Market Metro is even closer. There is also a metrobus stop adjacent to the building. Relax after a long day in your own oasis. Let our concierge hand your finished dry cleaning as you pass through the uncompromised beauty of the lobby and terrace common areas into the serenity of your home complete with full height and in some cases Palladian sound proof windows, elegant and light granite surfaces, modern floor finishes, nine-inch crown moldings and so much more. Make your way to the rooftop terrace with fabulous views of the capitol to relax, grill dinner or enjoy a game of corn hole with your friends. Or head down to the beautifully decorated common area for a game of billiards, use the state-of-the-art fitness center, or relax in the elegantly appointed media lounge replete with large screen televisions, Wi-Fi, kitchen, and to-die-for Mitchell Gold furnishings. While each apartment is equipped with full-size washers and dryers, a common area laundry room with free over-sized washers and dryers for your bulkier washables is always available. No quarters required! Does your family include a pet? Bring Fido to the pet washing station to keep him clean and snugly. With so many reasons to choose 700 Constitution, the question really isn’t why move in, but when? www.700.constitution.com *Terms and conditons apply

Description: Located within the triangle created by Wisconsin, Nebraska, and Massachusetts Avenue, 4000 Massachusetts Avenue Apartments is one of the most prestigious, uptown residences in Washington DC. Surrounded by such landmarks as the Washington Cathedral, American University, the US Naval Observatory, Glover Archibald Park, and the Vice President's home, you are truly in one of Washington's most elegant neighborhoods. 4000 Massachusetts Avenue Apartments is minutes from downtown Washington and Georgetown. You will enjoy exclusive shopping at nearby: Neiman Marcus, Saks Fifth Avenue, Cartier, Tiffany & Company, and more. Because of our central location, you will have your choice of fine dining and entertainment, all within easy reach of 4000 Massachusetts Avenue Apartments. Grace and Elegance come into view as you approach a canopied, white marble entrance along a striking, 235-foot driveway. The old world charm of the spacious lobby is enhanced by the uniformed doorman who welcomes you to this fine Washington establishment. The strength and character of the residence begins to unfold when you observe the quiet activity at the 24-hour concierge desk. Once inside your apartment home, you will find that it is designed for spacious living. The apartments feature large formal dining rooms and master bedrooms and are available in many different designs. Immaculately landscaped grounds, a full-size swimming pool with a two tiered flagstone deck, and nature trails throughout Glover Archibald Park provide the perfect backdrop for elegant living at 4000 Massachusetts Avenue Apartments.

Description: The View at Waterfront is a top of the line luxury apartment in Washington DC designed by I.M. Pei that offers you spectacular views of the Potomac River, and the DC skyline. When you're not gazing out onto the horizon, you can enjoy the outdoor pool, or relax at the bark park. We also have outdoor grills and fire pits for you to take advantage of. Inside, The View has been recently renovated offers the best amenities: granite, modern fixtures, and thoughtful finishes. We boast some of the largest apartment floor plans in the market! You'll also find that this is the perfect place if you're on-the-go! You have easy access to 395, and the Waterfront metro stop. Within a block of our community you have ZipCars and Capital Bikeshare bikes. So choose your desired form of transportation, and shop, eat dinner in Chinatown, catch a Nat's game, snag some Maryland Blue Crabs at the Maine Street Fish Market, and simply embrace living in the magnificence of our nation's capital.

Description: Andover House offers remarkable amenities and luxury apartments in Washington DC. Our apartments feature generous closets, updated kitchens complete with maple cabinetry and granite countertops, as well as thoughtful details. Residents take advantage of our internet lounge with coffee bar, fitness center, and premier resident and concierge services. Enjoy controlled-access entry and garage parking, a party room, and business center with conference room. Equidistant to two Metro stops, Andover House puts the best of DC right at your doorstep. Description: Flats 130 is located in NoMa, a rapidly developing new neighborhood in Washington, DC, just north of Capitol Hill and Union Station. Named for its location, north of Massachusetts Avenue, the area is quickly becoming the heart of all things exciting and new in DC. Flats 130 at Constitution Square is the address for hip and stylish apartments in northeast Washington, DC. Each apartment home features unique details with floor-plan options to fit any budget. There's natural lighting in every home and walk-in closets to help keep you organized. The kitchens have an open plan with custom cabinets, granite countertops and built-in, clean steel appliances. Our Washington, DC apartment rentals offer beautifully appointed one- and two-bedroom floor plans.

Description: Columbia Plaza is a significant part of Washington's prestige and heritage. Our location is unparalleled to any other apartment community you'll find. Convenient access to the State Department, World Bank and Capitol Hill is just one of the many extras. Private balconies and terraces overlook the national monuments, magnificent Kennedy Center and historical Watergate. Fine dining and elite shopping are minutes away. Known for our elegant, spacious apartments, Columbia Plaza gives you all the excitement and convenience you would expect living in our Nation's Capital and will reflect a life style that you can be proud of. A minimum lease of 12 months is required for unfurnished apartments and 3 months for furnished apartments. Efficiency one & two bedrooms available for immediate occupancy.

Description: On P Street NW, in the heart of the vibrant Logan Circle neighborhood, The Hudson is within easy reach of the Dupont Circle or McPherson Metro stations, and within seconds of shops and retailers, including Whole Foods,Starbucks, Bluemercury, Lululemon, and VIDA Fitness. From stained concrete floors to 9&prime ceilings with exposed spiral ductwork and concrete ceilings &ndash as well as granite countertops and stainless steel appliances &ndash the Hudson holds no shortage of style. Together with its sister building The DeSoto, The Hudson offers a 24-hour concierge and an unmatched level of service. The DeSoto is located in the heart of the vibrant Logan Circle neighborhood on P Street NW. Just across the street from Whole Foods, and steps from Starbucks, Blue Mercury, Lululemon, and VIDA Fitness, these modern apartment homes are within easy reach of the Dupont Circle or McPherson Metro stations. The DeSoto is fashionably appointed with 9&prime ceilings, polished concrete floors, exposed spiral ductwork and concrete ceilings, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances as well as a penthouse clubroom and rooftop terrace. Together with its sister building The Hudson, The DeSoto offers a 24-hour concierge and an unmatched level of service.

Description: Spread out at Bell Capitol Hill, formerly known as Kennedy Row, an apartment community in Washington, DC that offers a suburban lifestyle in the vibrant Capitol Hill neighborhood. Centrally located and just a short walk to the Metro, you'll enjoy an effortless commute to work and an easy escape to the area's best dining, shopping and entertainment. Walk or bike the expansive tree-lined streets and expand your city horizons into a refreshing urban setting. Our pet friendly community offers well-designed studio, one and two bedroom homes that feature custom cabinetry with millwork, premium stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and a washer and dryer in each unit. Start your day in our state-of-the art fitness center or soak in endless Capitol views from our rooftop terrace. Our smoke-free community also features bike storage and a pet washing station. Expand your idea of what it means to live on The Hill and call Bell Capitol Hill your new home.

Description: Located in Washington's exclusive Upper Northwest neighborhood between the Cleveland Park and Woodley Park Metro Stations on the Red Line, The Kennedy-Warren Apartments offers a level of elegance unsurpassed by any other residence in the city. Designed by Washington architect, Joseph Younger in 1930, The Kennedy-Warren is considered the most important privately owned example of Art Deco Style in the Nation's Capital. The exterior of the building is remarkable for its attention to detail, from the carved limestone eagles embellishing the front entrance, to the geometric aluminum spandrels flanked by saw-tooth patterns of multicolor tan brick. Although the exterior appears seamless, the Kennedy-Warren consists of two wings with separate addresses and shared world-class amenities. Description: Only 4 blocks to Woodley Park Metro! You have found your new home here at The Wallasey where historic charm and architecture blend with modern conveniences! This historic gem just finished a complete re-construction and a brand new apartment with impeccable finishes awaits you. In addition to an amazing apartment, with spacious rooms and high ceilings, The Wallasey offers an unbeatable location in the heart of Kalorama and less than ½ mile walk to Metro. With a commitment to resident comfort and satisfaction, The Wallasey Apartments provides gracious one- and two-bedroom apartment homes with all the modern conveniences. The brick exterior architecture and front tree-lined street add an antiquated charm to this urban apartment community, while the walk-in closets, linen closets and coat closets ensure you a spacious living environment. Select two-bedroom models even feature a second bath, and all include a breakfast bar, dividing the kitchen and living room, to make the most use of all the square footage.

Description: 2112 New Hampshire Avenue apartments are located in the heart of U Street, this bustling area is just a short walk to famous Dupont Circle and Adams Morgan, where you will come across an array of incredible restaurants, shops, pubs, grocery stores and all the things you deserve to have near your new home. We offer fabulous views from our roof top deck, while our southern exposure offers tasteful views of the city including the Washington Monument and the Capitol Building. Our Northern exposure will give you the beautiful serene view of Meridian Hill Park, where many of our apartment homes overlook the waterfalls of this historic park. 2112 New Hampshire is accessible to the green and yellow line metro which is only a 10 minute walk from our door step. You may also catch the red line at Dupont Circle which is just 15 minutes away. In addition we provide laundry facilities on every floor and reserved parking for our residents. We have two sizes of Studio apartments. Our 450 square feet studio gives you a separate kitchen and dressing area and is spacious in size offering unlimited possibilities for use of space. Some apartment homes even have their own private balcony with sun filled views! The larger studio of 535 square feet includes an L cove area which is large enough for your queen size bed and bedroom furniture. This apartment home also includes a large living area, separate kitchen, dressing area and full bath with ceramic tile and marble vanities. Some of our apartments include balconies and other apartment homes have unbelievable views of the city. You will love our fully equipped fitness center with a TV. So you don't miss your favorite program while you remain fit. Our Junior One Bedroom of 564 square feet in living space with a separate kitchen and a 24' balcony on the south side of the building gives you ample space for your furniture and comes with its own separate dressing area located just off the bathroom! The Large One Bedroom apartment of 740 square feet gives you more room than you'll know what to do with! A wonderful separate dining room, fabulous kitchen and huge bedroom with plenty of closet space throughout. This is an apartment community that you don't want to miss seeing! Enjoy sunsets from our roof top garden deck, come by and see our contemporary lobby and beautiful reception area and all the things that make this location in Washington D.C., NW. The most sought after address in the Metropolitan Area!

The residents of Ellicott House enjoy uncompromised luxury in every aspect from the high end interior finishes in each apartment, to the upgraded amenities which include a 24-hour concierge service, indoor/outdoor swimming pool, and 24-hour strength and cardio center. The studio, one and two bedroom apartments speak for themselves with 36-inch maple cabinetry with nickel pulls, stainless appliance package including built-in microwave, designer countertops and hardwood style floors. The property is just a short drive to many of Washington DC's most acclaimed monuments or a quick Metro ride. Residents can take advantage of assigned covered parking, a short walk to the Van Ness/UDC Metro Station or just steps away from the Metro Bus Line and trendy eateries. Description: Camden South Capitol stands as a unique resort-style living destination in Washington D.C. We offer studio, one and two bedroom apartments within our smoke-free community and showcase breathtaking views of the D.C. skyline. Our apartment homes feature stainless steel appliances, walnut-plank flooring, walk-in showers, spacious closets, designer pendant and track lighting, full-size washers and dryers included and balconies with views of the Capitol, Nationals Stadium and Anacostia River. Camden South Capitol includes amenities such as a 24-hour concierge service, fenced in dog park, pet grooming lounge, fitness center with cardio and weight training equipment, rooftop pool lounge and more. It's easy to experience the culture of Washington D.C. as the Navy Yard Metro Station and The Yards entertainment district sits just blocks away. Please note that all floor plan availability is subject to change. Call us and come home to Camden South Capitol today!

Description: Enjoy the affordable elegance of Washington House, an apartment residence in the heart of downtown. The attractive Art Deco facade sets the tone for unique community living. Central to Adams Morgan, the U Street Corridor and Columbia Heights! Residents enjoy a panoramic view of the Washington skyline from our rooftop deck, which is available for your private parties. Some units have views of our English garden, as well as historic Meridian Hill Park, located across the street. The nine-story building, comprised mostly of efficiencies and some one and two bedroom units, has laundry centers conveniently located on each floor. Large windows provide natural sunlight, and each apartment features elegant parquet wood floors and contemporary kitchens and baths, combining individual charm with modern amenities. And there's always something to do. Located between the bustling communities of Dupont Circle, Adams Morgan and the U Street corridor, Washington House has convenient front door Metrobus service, and is within easy walking distance of two Metrorail stops and numerous restaurants, shops and night spots. Our friendly doormen and staff, most of whom live in the building, are there to greet you when you return from work or an evening out.

We are just blocks from everywhere you want to be--Logan Circle, Connecticut Avenue, Dupont Circle, and more.

Description: Our leasing office is located at 5805 14th Street NW. Washington, DC 20011 . Brightwood Communities is a newly renovated apartment community located in Northwest Washington DC’s dynamic and growing Brightwood neighborhood. Conveniently located a few blocks away from a host of retail shops on Georgia Avenue (Including the new Walmart and Safeway) and a short metro ride away from Downtown, Brightwood offers all the advantages of urban living with the touch of comfort and security that makes our residents happy to call us home. Our location allows for easy access to Rock Creek Park, Silver Spring and Bethesda as well as Rt. 29 and I-495. Brand new community amenities, meticulously-groomed grounds and a dedicated staff contributes to a higher standard of living. Inside, you’ll find brand new efficiency, one and two bedroom apartments featuring renovated kitchens (with granite countertops) and bathrooms, stainless steel energy efficient appliances and comfortable individual unit controlled HVAC. You'll love living at Brightwood!

Description: Live near Columbia Heights, the U Street Corridor, Mount Pleasant, and Adams Morgan when you live at The Parkhill. Not only will you be within walking distance of all of these neighborhoods, you will be living in an architecturally historic building. Finding the right place to live in Washington, DC is challenging, but when you live at The Parkhill you’ll have convenience and comfort at your fingertips. Within walking distance of the Columbia Heights Metro stop, The Parkhill is surrounded by restaurants, nightlife, parks, grocery stores, shopping and so much more! Taking advantage of all Washington, DC has to offer is easier from the comforts of The Parkhill. Enjoy life in a studio or one bedroom apartment home complete with fully equipped kitchens, on-site laundry center, 24-hour maintenance, secured access, bike storage, parking, and so much more. Tell all your friends about the newly installed solar hot water heating system, too! The Parkhill puts you right where you want to be—at the center of it all.

Description: Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Columbia Heights, just off the hustle and bustle of 16th Street NW, The Cromwell is the perfect place to experience the District lifestyle. Spacious and sunny studio and one-bedroom apartment homes feature gleaming wood flooring or plush wall-to-wall carpeting. Gas cooking and central heating and air conditioning add modern convenience to your lifestyle- and it’s all included. The Cromwell’s ideal location gives you the best of what Northwest DC has to offer. Plentiful dining, shopping, and nightlife venues are all just a short stroll away. Multiple mass transit options provide effortless access to Dupont Circle, Adams Morgan, and the 17th Street corridor. Make the smart move to one of Northwest Washington’s most convenient communities…The Cromwell.

Description: Built in the 1930's, The Majestic, a historic treasure is the very picture of art deco elegance in the metropolitan Mount Pleasant neighborhood. Spacious apartment homes—many with dramatic city views—are stylishly appointed with hardwood floors, updated kitchens and bathrooms, large walk-in closets, and designer lighting. Class and comfort extend throughout the building, from the renovated lobby up to the one-of-a-kind rooftop terrace featuring panoramic city views. The Majestic is ideally set just two blocks from the Columbia Heights Metro, giving you effortless access to the very best of what DC has to offer—world-class dining, shopping, and nightlife, not to mention all the sights and attractions of the nation’s capital. Come to where elegance and comfort reign, The Majestic.

Description: Enjoy historical elegance mixed with modern sophisticated touches at The Envoy. The Envoy was built in 1918 and fully renovated in 1981. The Envoy is a certified National Historic Landmark located in the heart of Adams Morgan. Originally an exclusive hotel, The Envoy has entertained and accommodated Presidents, Senate members and their guests, and today it is available for your enjoyment and lifestyle needs! The Envoy is conveniently located, with easy accessibility to metro, shopping, dining, entertainment, and so much more within walking distance! It sits across from Meridian Hill Park, which is one of America's first urban parks, famous for its cascading pools, statues, fountains, and serenity. The lobby of The Envoy is absolutely breathtaking with its sprawling marble columns and flooring, original urbane chandeliers, floor to ceiling sprawling windows, and lavish ceiling moldings scalloped in gold leaf trim. There are over 45 different floor plans to choose from, some which include vaulted ceilings, balconies, and expansive lofts. For your convenience, The Envoy features 24-hour Concierge and Maintenance, valet dry cleaning, and covered reserved parking. Come be a part of The Envoy!

The Luzon and Van Buren is the perfect balance of lifestyle and community in this sought-after Northwest community.

Description: The Colonial Arms Apartments is a 25 unit, boutique-sized building consisting of one bedroom apartments that is located in the heart of Foggy Bottom. The Kennedy Center, George Washington University, The State Department, Georgetown, and the K Street Corridor are all within walking distance and the Foggy Bottom Metro station is within 3 short blocks. As the name connotes, the architectural style of the building is colonial and consistent with the quiet, residential nature of its neighbors. Beautifully renovated apartments with new kitchens and bathrooms are complimented by the designer decorated lobby and hallways providing the finest in urban living in a premier DC location.

Description: Nowhere in the Capitol Hill neighborhood will you find a CO-OP residence that offers a more perfect blend of urban convenience and contemporary living than here at The Townhomes on Capitol Hill. This is no ordinary community. Set on 5 acres of professionally designed and landscaped grounds, The Townhomes offer spectacular homes of one, two, and three bedrooms. These residences combine fanciful facades with spacious bright interiors to make for a living experience that is nothing short of wonderful! The design excellence of The Townhomes on Capitol Hill received national attention when the American Institute of Architects selected this new community for a 1998 Honor Award for Urban Design. The Townhomes on Capitol Hill is a mixed-income cooperative with a minimum 12-month commitment. Description: Camden Grand Parc balances historical architecture with modern upgrades inside studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes. Description: The Clarence House is one of Van Ness' hidden gems. It was built in the 1960s and although management has preserved a few fun, quirky, Madmen-esque details like revolving toothbrush holders in the bathrooms and milk cabinets in the hallways, the kitchens have been fully renovated with granite countertops, brushed steel appliances, and ceramic tile floors. The Clarence House offers basic community amenities including a rooftop terrace and laundry room with WiFi, but people who choose the Clarence House tend to prefer that their rent go toward their actual apartments rather than toward community amenities they'll rarely use. Management responds swiftly to maintenance requests and the friendly front desk staff members sign for packages and can assist residents until 11pm most nights.

Description:
IMMEDIATE MOVE-IN ON CAPTIOL HILL! PLEASE CALL!
The Morgan Apartments on the Hill has a one-bedroom apartment available for immediate occupancy. Our beautiful one-bedroom apartments are spacious and renovated in 2010 located on the Hill. This location is among the stunning historic Victorian row houses and directly across the street from Marion Park. The Morgan Apartments is a short stroll to Barracks Row, Eastern Market Metro (orange line). The Capitol and the historic Eastern Market. If you know Capitol Hill you know its history, charm and magic and if you are new to the Hill, come, look, and lease you'll love living here.
Our apartments feature:
- Lovely new kitchens
- Beautiful hardwood floors throughout
- Vintage bathrooms with respectful upgrades
- Ceiling fans
- Lots of large closets
- Fantastic light from tons of windows
- Individually controlled gas and heat and A/C
- Gas Cooking
- Laundry facilities
- Entry system and secured entry (fob entry)
- Cats Welcome
- On Call Maintenance
- Prices are subject to change
- Please call the office Monday thru Friday to make an appointment (202) 299-0622

Services: * Laundry Facilities

Description:
3 bedroom, 2.5 bath, 2400 sq/ft, single family home, $2800/month. Available for move in December 1, 2017. If needed, we can accommodate a November move in.
You will enjoy hosting your friends and family in this 2-level, 3-beds, 2.5 baths home. This home is a new build. Kitchen is well appointed with S/S appliances, granite countertops, and a custom built island which has been the center of countless gatherings and fun times. Hardwood floors throughout most of the home with two of three carpeted bedrooms. The bedrooms are large, have plenty of storage, and receive tons of light. The master suite is a delight with hardwood floors, walk-in closet, and generously sized bathroom. Enjoy dining and cookouts in your fenced backyard. While there is plenty of street parking, you also have a personal parking space.
Located just east of the Anacostia River, this property has access to the waterfront. 
Walking distance to Metro, easy access to 295 and 395, Bolling AFB, Census Bureau, and everything DC has to offer. The house is a short drive or metro ride to downtown.
Anacostia metro is green line, one stop away from Navy Yard, three stops from l'Enfant Plaza and five stops from Chinatown. A trip to the center of DC takes less than 15 min. 
Fitness buffs will appreciate Anacostia Park with its miles of trail for bikers and runners, a four minute walk from this home. Nats fans will be pleased that this property is a five minute bike ride to the stadium. Your friends and family will be pleased that you have so much space to host. You will be happy to call such a spacious, clean, and bright home yours.
Rent this 3 bed, 2.5 bath, 2400 sq/ft home for $2800/month. Tenants are responsible for all utilities. No pets.

Description:
Sun-filled, Well-Appointed 3 BR 2 BA House in Columbia Heights 
1339 Perry Place, NW Row House, Available November 1st
View by appointment. 
This beautiful 3 BR 2 BA row house has all the amenities including central air and heat, washer/dryer, updated kitchen with stainless appliances, back porch, front yard and efficient Elfa closets. House features a bright, finished basement (can be used as a bedroom and has its own private full bath), a back yard perfect for entertaining with friends and family, and private screened balcony off the rear.
The house is at the end of a quiet, tree-lined street and is perfect for a family or professionals... 8 blocks (10 minute walk) to Columbia Heights Metro, steps away to all Columbia Heights has to offer. Two minute walk to Thip Khao, Le Caprice, Pho Viet. Around the corner from Airedale, Little Coco's, Lyman's Tavern and more!
Lease Details:
-	$3,600/mo, 1- year lease and month-to-month after?- Tenant Pays All Utilities?
-	Cat considered with additional pet deposit
-	$40 application fee 
LOCATION:
At Holmead Street and Perry Place NW in Washington DC, 8 blocks from the Columbia Heights Metro + Shopping Area, 8 blocks from the 11th Street restaurant and bar scene.
?
HOUSE FEATURES:
- 3 Full bedrooms upstairs,
- Laundry room in basement with plenty of space for storage
- Hardwood floors and tile throughout
- Great kitchen + stainless appliances
- DW, WD in house
- Unfurnished
- 2 decks

Description:
Charming 2 bd plus den, vintage 3 level rowhouse with yard; lovely restored hdwd flrs. Grand 3 level rowhome in great condition. Outstanding location close to metro, supermarkets, restaurants and more. 
Features include:
2 spacious bedrooms
bonus room / office / den / nursery / playroom
huge dining room perfect for entertaining
lovely gas fireplace
stunning original refurbished hardwood floors throughout
cute kitchen with dishwasher
1st floor porch off kitchen
2nd floor porch off master
full finished basement plus separate workshop/storage area
1750 sf on three levels
Lovely fenced yard
lots of storage space- attic and basement
washer / dryer 
lovely front porch
Superb location: easy access to Metro, buses. Located at 7th (Warder St) and Quebec about 3 bks to Georgia Ave/Petworth Metro. About 3/4 mile to Columbia Hgts Metro. 1.25 mile to U Street/Cardoza Metro. Easy access to new Walmart, and all the hussle and bussle of the renovated retail shops and restaurants on 7th Street/Georgia Ave. Walk to the lovely open space of the Old Soldiers Home Golf Course and parks nearby.

Description:
This 13-story, 256-unit residential condominium is sited on one of the city's unique triangular blocks and wraps around a historic firehouse. Fabulous studio apartment located on 7th Floor of this fabulous building that offers its residents the following amenities:
Business Center (free wi-fi),State of the art Fitness Center, Lap Pool on Roof Deck, Walkout deck on Roof with amazing views, 24 Hour Concierge, Parking and Maid and dry cleaning Service are Available at additional costs,Loading Dock for deliveries 3 convenient Elevators Beautiful Community Room - available to rent
A superb Penn Quarter location in the heart of DC- super convenient to Georgetown Law, Verizon Center, Chinatown, Union Station, the Mall area, restaurants, bars, shops, grocery, cafe's and coffee shops, and so much more. CVS downstairs. Convenient to (4) Metro Stations and the Circulator (bus) 
Condo features a lovely upgraded kitchen with granite, full size appliances to include a dishwasher, and stunning spacious upgraded bathroom with glass shower. Large walk-in closet, plus another full size closet, plus a pantry space. Washer dryer in unit. Lovely light enters condo. Neutral decor throughout.

Description: Cozy 250 square foot basement apartment in the Hillcrest neighborhood of Washington, DC. The apartment has been renovated to include separate HVAC system, stainless steel stove, new carpet, and bathroom, with access to new Washer/Dryer. The apartment has a separate entrance at the rear of the house and plenty of street parking on a quiet street across from a park. The apartment is located 1.5 miles from Potomac Ave and Stadium-Armory metro stations, and several bus lines are located on Minnesota and Pennslyvania Ave. Entrance to 295 & 395 and Anacostia Park are less than a mile away for quick access to downtown, National stadium, and downtown.

Description:
Floor: 11 (top floor)
Ceiling height: 12 feet
Number of bedrooms: 1
Number of bathrooms: 1
Number of square feet: 754 
Number of closets: 1 large walk-in closet and 1 coat closet
Washer/dryer: in the unit
Monthly cost: $2,200 
Security deposit: $2,200
Minimum rent period: 12 months
Utilities: responsibility of the renter 
The condo has contemporary finishes like stainless steel appliances, granite counter-tops, and hardwoods. The condo was recently repainted, and has a new carpeting in the bedroom. The bathroom was recently updated with new appliances.
*Features*
*  Hardwood floors in living room and kitchen
*  Gourmet kitchens with granite countertops
*  Full size in-unit washer/dryer
*  Wood cabinetry
*  Floor to ceiling windows
*  French balconies
*  Stainless steel appliances
*  Ceramic tile flooring and shower surrounds
*  Just re-caulked bathroom
*  Plush carpeted bedroom spaces
*  Light filled residences
*  Wood cabinets and granite vanities
*  Individual climate control
*  Walk-in closet and large kitchen vanity closet
*  Online building management system through Building Link
*Amenities*
*  Rooftop swimming pool with a hot rub and sundeck
*  1 Acre private park
*  The Outdoor Courtyard and Rooftop Patio
*  Elegant clubrooms
*  24- hour front desk
*  Rooftop grills and garden 
*  Concierge services
*  Saturday farmers market
*  Underground parking (additional pay to other owners)
*  Resident events
*  Rich landscaping
*  Controlled building access
*  VIDA fitness in the building (additional pay)
*  Walking distance to Mt.Vernon Square, Gallery Place, and Judiciary Square Metro Stations
*  Amazing views
*Services*
*  Valet Dry Cleaning Service
*Cats allowed / dogs under 30 pounds are allowed*
* Dogs: Renters Insurance is required for dogs. Maximum of 2 pets per apartment with a maximum combined weight of 80lbs.
Pet Fees: $50/month pet rent per pet
*Move-In Costs*
Move: $250 non-refundable fee and $300 loading dock security deposit
All moves must be scheduled with the manager at least two weeks in advance of the move. Moves may be scheduled to occur and be completed between 9:00am to 5:00pm between Monday and Saturday, excluding US federal holidays.
Pet Fee: The annual pet registration $20.00.
Garage bike storage fee: $60 annual cost for 2 bikes. Deposit for bike cage key is $25.

Services: * Laundry Facilities

Description: This brand new, never before occupied, Industrial Design Style English Basement features 735 Square Feet with 1 bedroom, 1 bath, front and back private entrances, exposed brick walls, split system heat and air-conditioning, brand new stainless steel kitchen appliances, including electric range/oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, and microwave with a granite counter, and built-in pantry. Laundry access. Off street parking available. Huge entry and bedroom closets. Additional storage available. Walk or ride to Metro, shopping, and restaurants in this vibrant downtown neighborhood with historic designation.

Description:
DUPONT CIRCLE - modern/luxurious light-filled 1-bedroom condo apartment available first week of October 2017 @ $2300/month. 
THE APARTMENT: Approx. 740 sq. ft. top-floor unit with skylight and bay windows. Amenities include fridge w/auto-icemaker, electric 5-burner range, over-the-range microwave/hood, dishwasher, garbage disposal, light dimmers/spots, charcoal gray w/w carpeting, central heat/AC, in-unit washer/dryer, whirlpool bathtub, and walk-in closet in the bedroom. The unit is cable-ready. Rent includes water. Tenant pays for electricity plus any services such as phone, cable TV, and Internet. For a small fee (if room is available) there is bicycle storage in the basement. Pets may be considered on an individual basis.
THE BUILDING/NEIGHBORHOOD: The Nelson Condo is in the heart of the vibrant Dupont Circle neighborhood. The Nelson is a fantastic and friendly community where the residents take pride in their city residence. The building is in the best location in city on the same block as the historic Frasier Mansion (now the Church of Scientology). From the front door, it is exactly a 2-block walk south to the Dupont Circle Metrorail station (Q St. entrance). This historic building underwent a first-class total renovation in the 1980's and has been immaculately and proactively maintained ever since. The building has 5 floors including basement and has a large elevator. An exceptionally competent and responsive management company manages the unit and the building. Parking is on-street and requires a city Zone 2 residential parking sticker (easy to get) if you don't want to move your car every day.
Grocery store, shops, restaurants, galleries, museums, bars and just about everything that city-living can provide are only feet away from your front door. The address is 1733 20th Street, NW DC 20009. Google it yourself to see what an outstanding location it is! It is an easy walk to GW University, the World Bank/IMF, and many downtown business locations. 
LEASE/FEES: The rent is $2,300/month and a year’s lease is required (may negotiate a shorter lease). There is a $35 application fee to cover the background and credit check. Once approved, the first month's rent plus a one-month security deposit must be presented with the signed lease. Move-in/out fees are required. 
Serious inquires only -- no 3rd parties - please e-mail to ask questions and set up a viewing.
Thank you.
Joseph

Description:
Renovated English basement studio apartment just 2 blocks to the Mount Vernon Square Metro Station. Great neighborhood downtown and walking distance to City Vista Safeway, Mount Vernon Triangle restaurants/bars/shopping and the new Convention Center hotel. The unit has a step down living room, separate sleeping area, full kitchen with dishwasher, good closet space, small patio and washer/dryer. $1,375/month plus electric. Available Immediately. $650 deposit. Located at 457 M Street, NW, Basement Apartment.

Description: Beautiful, sun-filled 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom Capitol Hill rowhouse two blocks from Capitol South metro and House office buildings. Newly renovated home with central AC, top-of-the-line chef’s kitchen (Jen-Air appliances, including double ovens, warming tray and tons of cabinet space), and gorgeous bathroom with on-demand hot water. Washer and dryer in unit. Back-patio for grilling. Situated on a wide, quiet street with easy street parking. 10 minute walk to National's stadium, Eastern Market, Barrack's row, 5 minute walk to new Whole Foods, and a 2 minute drive to I-395. Surrounded by great parks with tennis, bocce, and more.

Description:
HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED! New owners, available immediately. Excellent neighborhood, right next to Tenley Town metro, Wholefoods and more! Huge back yard great for a garden or pets. The two units share a spacious front porch, great for hanging out on a lazy Sunday. New owners, willing to work with tenants on the lease and rent! Updated windows and appliances.
Unit 2:
This unit has 3 very large walled off rooms with plenty of natural window light and a closet in each. In the back of the house is a kitchen with a brand new refrigerator and living area that has a full kitchen, washer/dryer, and a full bathroom. There is a large deck in the back of this unit that can be used for BBQ or hanging out all year round.

Description: CONTACT: 267-307-2034 NO SECURITY DEPOSIT REQUIRED. $1,500 discount off first month's rent for one year lease. This is a fully furnished 3 bedroom, 2.5 baths apartment with the following included: 1. cable TV with DVD player & HDMI cable 2. high speed internet 3. home security monitoring with security cameras on the exterior of the building 4. washer/dryer 5. Water & electric included 6. Fully furnished bedrooms with hangers, drawers, standing lamps, bath soaps, etc 7. Fully furnished living room 8. Fully furnished dining room 9. cooking utensils (pots, spoons, cups, dishes, etc) 10. Coffee machine 11. Water dispenser 12. and much more 13. 1 assigned parking spot 14. keyless lock on each door. You do not need a key to enter the house. 15. Dishwasher This is a 2 unit 5 bedroom, 3.5 bath house. However, I am renting the first unit which has 3 bedroom, 2.5 baths. The kitchen will be shared with the basement tenant. As you can see from the pictures, this apartment has it all, even down to clothes hanger. The only thing you need to move in with you is your clothes. It is just few minutes walk to Deanwood Metro Station with easy access to several bus lines. CVS, public library, grocery store, post office, entertainment/shopping centers are just 3 minutes away. **No Smoking & no pets**

*this is the worst bio ever

Description:
Hello,
Please see attached photos, this Roll House property is located in our Nation's Capital (Wash. DC). It is within walking distance of public transportation, restaurants and entertainment. 
It features 3 bedrooms, 2 1/2 baths, off street parking and is complete with hardwood floors, high ceilings, eat-in kitchen and partially finished basement. 
This beautiful well-kept residence is snuggled in a quiet neighborhood. Pets are welcomed! 
For more information please contact:
(240) 685-6705

Description: Spectacular Views and Location! 2 bed/2 bath 11th floor Penthouse w/ 3 separate terraces totaling more than 120 sq ft. Upgraded hardwood flooring, designer lighting & brand new kitchen are just a few highlights. Gallery Place has terrific amenities incl. rental parking, concierge, 24 hour security, gym & reading room. Bars/Restaurants and metro all at your fingertips! Get it while it lasts!

Description:
Sleek + chic 1BR/1.5BA condo in booming NoMa! Terrace level w/ front patio. Open floor plan. Bay windows + recessed lighting. Brazilian rose hardwood floors. Modern kitchen w/ granite, steel, + Euro-style cabinets. Beautifully tiled BAs w/ custom vanities. Master BR w/ en suite BA (jetted tub). 3 blocks to new Whole Foods (2016). Walk to Metro + mins to Union Station!
Private Entrance - in a 6 Unit Condo
The space is simple and very close walk to some great places in North East DC
-H street Corridor 
-Union Market 
-H street street car will make traveling up and down h or to union station a breeze. 
-1.3 miles to the Capitol -walk to eastern market
Utilities that you will pay ( water is covered in Rent ) : 
1.Electricity - under 50.00 typical
2.Wifi -35.00 depends on service
Place can come furnished or not 
Short walk to Noma Metro - Right infront of galludet university short walk to union station
Intercom
Jetted Tub
Near Transportation
Patio
Washer/dryer ( with steam option )
Ceiling fan in master bedroom

Services: * Laundry Facilities

Description:
This junior 1BR in heart of Dupont Circle boasts hardwoods, a large picture window, ample closet space & a separate kitchen. 
Relax on the rooftop terrace, while enjoying panoramic views of city. On quiet side of beautifully maintained building, with 24-hour concierge & elevator. 
Fantastic location near local restaurants, boutique shops & metro. Every amenity you need is right in the neighborhood!!!
Come visit and see for yourself. Skype and WhatsApp video interview welcomed.

Description:
8th Street Plaza is located in the re-developing community of Congress Heights in Southeast DC. With professional landscaping and a secure building entrance, these newly renovated apartments offer affordabe priced housing in a wonderfully convenient neighborhood. From your new home you will have easy access to the Congress Heights Metro Station and to I-295, I-495, and I-95, which link you to many attractions, such as National Harbor and Nats Park. Nearby are Bolling Air Force Base, the Navy Yard, Homeland Security Headquarters and the up and coming St. Elizabeths Campus office park. The immediately surrounding area offers shopping, banking, and many local recreational opportunities, including The Shops at Park Village located less than a mile away while DC's attraction are just a couple of Metro stops away! 
These Apartment feature:
- 620 sq ft.living space
- New hardwood floors throughout 
- New tiles in the bathroom 
- Large updated kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steal appliances
- Large stackable washer and dryer
- Central air and heat
- Crown molding
- Remodeled bathrooms
- Plenty of closet space
- Assigned monitored parking for an additional fee
- Street parking for guests
- Gated community
To schedule an appointment to view the properties, to request more information, or to obtain a rental application please reply to this post.
Application Process: There is an application to complete and a 625 minimum credit score requirement. Exceptional credit discounts if leased by April 1, 2016!
We look forward to showing you your new home!
Continental Mortgage & Investment Corp.

Description:
Modern and open condo located in the heart of Adams Morgan. This 2 bed, 2 bath condo has a large kitchen with ample counter space for all your cooking needs. The kitchen opens out to a spacious living room, perfect for entertaining friends and family. The master suite includes a huge wall-to-wall closet and a private bathroom with glass-walled shower. The unit also includes huge floor-to-ceiling glass doors that open onto a personal patio, perfect for grilling or relaxing outdoors. Additionally the unit has a washer/dryer, central heating and A/C and a cozy office nook off the hallway. Beautiful hardwood floors stretch throughout the unit accompanied by brand new carpet in the bedrooms and a fresh coat of paint make the unit seem brand new.
The building itself has an electronic gated entry with phone capable unlocking. Perhaps most importantly the unit has an available off-street parking space behind an automatic garage door for an additional $200/month.
Living here you'll be only steps away from the many shops, restaurants and bars that make up the exciting Adams Morgan neighborhood. Never worry about hauling your groceries long distances again because you will be 2 blocks away from both Harris Teeter and Safeway grocery stores. Enjoy being only a short walk to all the restaurants, shops and cafes in the wonderful Adams Morgan neighborhood.

Rent is $3,000 per month ($3,200 with the parking space). Tenant will be responsible for electric and any television/internet/phone service. Pets are ok but will require additional deposits. Available immediately for a 12-month lease with option to extend. No smoking.
Please contact me to set up an appointment to see this amazing rental!

Services: * Laundry Facilities

Description:
This charming Georgetown 1 BR/1 BA is a ten minute walk from Dupont Circle.
Features of this spacious apartment include:
- remodeled kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances
- full updated bath
- large bedroom with double exposure windows and two closets
- dining area adjoining a bright living space with built-in bookcases
- air conditioning
- lots of natural light
- ample storage spaces
The apartment is on the fifth floor of a classic brick building with 24-hour desk service and security, gym, laundry facilities, and a rooftop veranda. Garage parking is available for an additional fee.

Description:
Modern penthouse condo at Velocity Condominiums with views of the Washington Monument and beyond. Located in Navy Yard, 1 block from the Navy Yard Metro, and just steps from the Capitol Riverfront, Nats Stadium, and the beautiful and peaceful Yards Park. Plenty of restaurants in the neighborhood, including DC's first winery - District Winery! Harris Teeter 3 blocks away and Whole Foods soon to be completed. Eastern Market within 10 min walking distance. 
The condo includes: 
- Floor to ceiling windows that allow plenty of sunlight
- Washer & dryer
- Hardwood floors & carpeted bedroom
- Electric stove, microwave, dishwasher
- Granite counters and espresso color cabinets w/ chrome pull out
- Breakfast bar/island 
- Balcony
- Huge bathroom
- Walk-in closet
- Built in wall-to-wall bookcase with cabinets and drawers in bedroom
Community Amenities at the Velocity include: 
- Rooftop: Pool, lounge chairs, tables, grills
- 24 hour Concierge Service: packages, dry cleaners
- Resident Lounge: sofas, tables, TV, kitchen

- Fitness Center

Close to Dupont Metro, Rose Park, and the shops and restaurants of Georgetown and Dupont. Laundry in building. Parking not included in rental but can be obtained separately in the garage. Bicycle room. Great rooftop deck for 4th of July

Description: CORCORAN WALK CONDOMINIUM: Corcoran Street was recently selected as one of the Top 12 streets to live on in D.C. according to Washingtonian Magazine. Just 1/2 block from Dupont Circle Metro & shopping where you can walk to everything, this beautiful one bedroom duplex on the top two floors of a four story light brick building comes equipped with hardwood floors, marble fireplace, skylight, washer/dryer, walk-in closet plus two standard closets. Located off 19th street between R and S Streets on a quiet tree lined block with friendly neighbors. Bike storage and additional storage available on site. $2850/mo. On street parking available. Ask about pets.

Property Description:
Four spacious units (new construction) located three blocks from the Mount Vernon Square Metro. Private entrances are located on 6th Street. First-floor units have private patios. Huge closets and plenty of storage space. Some parking available.
Features & amenities
Stainless Steel Appliances
Gas Range
Built-in Microwave
Garbage Disposal
En-suite Washer/Dryer
Ceramic Tile and Hardwood Floors
Some feature private porches
Private Parking Available

Description:
Property Description:
Madison Saints Paradise is situated near transit, retail, and restaurants. The building includes retail, twelve assisted living units, and twenty apartments. Floor to ceiling operable windows and a central courtyard enhance natural daylight and cross-ventilation in all the units.
Features & amenities:
Hardwood Floors
Ceramic tile bathroom
Recessed lighting Central air
Washer and Dryer in unit
Walk-in closets
Off-street parking
High-speed internet/cable available
Elevator Accessible
Steps from Shaw Metro

Description:
SIGNING BONUS!!!!
Great top floor 1 Bedroom/1 Bathroom rental in Georgetown/Palisades with ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED 
(telephone and cable/internet not included), in a secured entrance garden style building
- Walking distance to German Embassy, French Embassy, Georgetown University/Hospital, Sibley Memorial Hospital, grocery, banks, restaurants, coffee shops 
- Wood floors throughout, ample closets, new kitchen cabinets with lights, granite counter top, stainless steel appliances, recess lights with dimmers everywhere, complete new bath
- Steps away from public transportation
- 1 assigned parking space
- Extra storage
- Very short distance to down-town DC, George Washington University, American University, fine dining options & entertainment, and more
- Laundry in the building (ground floor)
- Pet friendly (according to building pet regulations)
- $1900 per month with 1 year lease; $1875 per month with 2 year lease

Description:
SIGNING BONUS: AVAILABLE NOW - 1 BEDROOM/1 BATHROOM ALL WITH UTILITIES INCLUDED (except internet/cable and phone)
- Executive, large one bed room(760 SQ FT) unit in prime location.
- Walking distance to American University, restaurants, Starbucks, supermarket, banks, medical facilities, and very short ride to Sibley & Georgetown Hospital / University, French and German Embassies, downtown activities.
- Unit is IN A SECURED 24/7 CONCIERGE building with elevator, laundry room, guest apartment, gym, engineer on site & sundeck.
- Completely renovated kitchen with brand new cabinets, matching back splash color, granite counter top, dish washer, garbage disposal, microwave, under cabinet's LED lights, gas stove & french doors refrigerator (few years young).
- New LED light fixtures in kitchen and dining rooms and recess LED lights in living room
- Simple but elegantly furnished(not including bed and tv), 
No pets allowed unless medically approved. 
$2,150.00/ month for one year lease or $2,100.00/Month for two years lease

Description:
New - Condo - 1 Block from Union Station - Off Street Parking available, in unit W/D, - 2 Blocks from Whole Foods
Bedroom / 2 Bath Ultra Luxury Condo that includes OFF STREET PARKING available and in unit washer / dryer for the low price of $2850 / month. Save thousands compared to comparable units nearby. Ready to move in. 
This luxury rental has Loft-style Design for Optimal Space and Views, This dual Master 2BR each with an en-suite bathroom. Open Floor Plan, Floor to Ceiling Windows Wrap-Around Windows (w/ window coverings), 9' High Ceilings, 7.5" Wide Plank Hardwood Floors.
The unit is located at 301 H Street, Northeast, in the burgeoning H Street Corridor. Across the street from a Giant and two blocks from Whole Foods. As the site of trendy restaurants, bars, and coffeehouses. The corridor continues to grow as a major center for District shopping, eating, and nightlife. 301 H Street is conveniently located near Union Station and Capitol Hill in addition to the Circulator, new DC Streetcar, and Capital Bikeshare, all providing easy access to all that DC has to offer. The H Street corridor, a part of the Atlas District, is located in Northeast Washington, DC, which borders the neighborhoods of Capitol Hill, Kingman Park, Carver/Langston, Trinidad, and Judiciary Square with easy access to I-395 and RT 50. 301 H Street boasts an impressive Walk Score of 95 and Bike Score of 94.
Included is a GOURMET KITCHEN with KitchenAid Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Cooking Range, Quartz Countertops, Glass Tile Backsplash, Soft-Close Drawers, Stylish Hardware, Under Cabinet Lighting, and Modern Gray Cabinetry.
Each of the DESIGNER BATHS has Waterworks Fixtures, Rain Shower Head, Modern Hardware, Quartz Countertops, and Furniture-style Vanities, Frameless Glass Showers, and Contemporary Tile Design.
Unit is available September 1. First Month rent and Security deposit moves you in. Lease term and move-in dates are flexible. Owners are local.

Description: 2 BR, 1.5 BA at 17th & R. Available early/mid November. Unit is approximately 860 feet, with a W/D and good closet/storage space in the unit. It is not a basement or first floor unit. Easy walk to Dupont Circle Metro, buses, grocery stores, restaurants, etc. Rent is $2600/month, with one month's security deposit required. No pets.

Description:
Spacious 2BR/1BA 1100ft² with charming balcony at Columbia Heights -$2900 If not available for the time above, individual viewing can be arranged by appointment. - Top unit w/ sky light in a 4-unit converted row house condo, with charming private South-facing balcony. - Warm and homey vibe with an ideal location. - Two short blocks to Meridian Hill Park, our dog's favorite park, with great community feeling, perfect for picnics in warm days; drum circle plays on Sundays afternoon.
- Across the street from Columbia Heights Community Center & a huge renovated beautiful children's playground. - Mt. Pleasant Farmers' market within walking distance between April and October.
- Quiet street with friendly neighbours. Street parking normally not an issue.
- Skylight which fills the entire living room & kitchen with natural light.
- A small enclosed parking garage included - we used it as extra storage space and to park our bikes & a scooter before as parking on the street never an issue but gives extra shelter for your car if needed.
- Spacious balcony, perfect for hammock and grilling on warm days.
- Largely covered with hardwood floor except kitchen and bathroom.
- Digital thermostat--controlled central air/heat.
- In-unit washer/dryer. Dishwasher equipped.
- Short walks to many bus stops to downtown and to the metro: 52/53/54/circulator on 14th St (one block away), S1/S2/S4/S9 on 16th St. (two blocks away) and Columbia Heights Metro (within 5 blocks). 14th & 15th St has bike designated lanes which are our main transportation path. Capital Bike Share stations on 14th St. one block away and on Euclid 1.5 blocks away.
- Target/Harris Teeter/Giant/Safeway/Best Buy/Bed, Bath & Beyond are all within short walk. Trader Joes on 14th St. also walking distance. - At short distance from many restaurants and shops at Columbia Heights, U St., Adams Morgan, 14th and 9 th St areas.
- Unfurnished. Water /sewage & trash removal are included. All other utilities are not included. Minimum lease is 1 year. Security deposit equals one month's rent.

Description:
Sunny 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom Dupont Circle apartment located on New Hampshire Ave (between R and S). Open house Saturday Oct 14th from 12pm-3pm.
Grocery store, restaurants, yoga, and much more just two blocks away. In boundary for and just a block away from Ross Elementary school. A short distance to downtown, U street, Georgetown, and Adams Morgan. The apartment has high ceilings, classic hardwood floors, big bright windows, recently updated bathrooms and kitchen with granite counter-tops and updated appliances. The two bedrooms have double closets for plenty of storage, and there are washers and dryers on every floor.
The apartment will be available on November 1st, 2017 for a one-year renewable term. The rent is $3,300 per month, which includes water (but not electric, cable, or internet).

Description: Listing Rental Date Availability has changed to mid-November (move-in date negotiable). The historic Car Barn was developed in 1896 as a maintenance facility and administrative offices for the Metropolitan Railroad Company. This Romanesque Revival style building was redeveloped in 2004 into 196 condos. The massive L-shaped design of the Car Barn lends itself well to a wonderful interior courtyard. Residents enjoy the community pool, covered parking and the security of 30 foot gates. The Car Barn location on Capitol Hill in the Lincoln Park neighborhood is a short ten minute walk to the Stadium Armory/Eastern Market Metro Stations and all the venues on Barracks Row. Parking spots (up to 2) may be available for monthly use. Otherwise, street parking is plentiful. One visitor parking pass per/unit. Spacious bedroom with two walk-in closets and new modern gray flooring installed wall to wall. Electricity bill from Pepco not included in rent. Working fireplace for the cozy Winter ahead. Some furniture may be left to furnish unit, if tenant interested in that option. Mid-November start date, negotiable.

Description: Open Sunday October 7th from Noon - 2:00. Located in the heart of DC's hottest neighborhood, this 2 level home on 12th Place is within walking distance to U Street and METRO. This home provides a peaceful retreat, featuring beautiful tones of grays and bright whites. 2 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths. Fully upgraded kitchen with all new Bertucci stainless appliances, Corian counter top that has a marble look. Other features include skylight above cable rail staircase, wood burning fireplace, LED lighting, exposed brick, hardwood floors throughout, central heat and air conditioning and a Washer/Dryer. Private fenced open space with brick patio is perfect for entertaining. Owner/Broker Investors Management, Inc. 202-462-1874

Description:
Description
The Towers! This is a Large remodeled Condo located at 4201 Cathedral Avenue NW, Washington DC. It has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, and approximately 1045 square feet. Plenty of room and a tremendous amount of closet space. Lots of natural light and stunning views. Condo utilities included in rent (Electricity, Air Conditioning, Heat & Gas, Water, (Sewer, and Trash). Remodeled kitchen and bath. Refinished floors.
In addition Tenant has the option of renting the assigned parking space in the building garage for an additional $150.00 per month.
This is a full service luxury building. Features include elevators, steel and brick construction, common picnic & olympic size pool area, laundry facilities on every floor, fitness facility, beauty salon, valet/tailor, 24 hour front desk, food market, library and tennis court! The property sits right on the corner of Cathedral and New Mexico and is easy, fast walking distance to American University, the National Cathedral and restaurants, parks and Embassies.
Security Deposit: $1,950
Amenities
Property amenities
Garage Parking 
		Ceiling fans
		Condo Floor Number: 10
		Full Time Door Valet/Attendant
		Elevators
		Fitness Center
		Floor Covering: Hardwood/Oriental Rugs
		Laundry: Separate Laundry Room on Every Floor
		Near Transportation
Unit amenities
		Air Conditioning
		Alarm
		Cable Ready
		Controlled Access
		Dish Washer
		Double Pane Insulated Windows
Garage Parking Optional(assigned space additional $150/mo)
		Granite countertop
		Microwave
Terms
12 Month Lease Minimum, 2 Year Lease Available

Description:
One bedroom condo located on the 1st floor available October 15th. All utilities included! 10-min walk to both Columbia Heights and Georgia Ave-Petworth metro stations. 7-8min walk to Giant, Safeway and Target. Less than a 1 minute walk to 11th St. which has tons of restaurants and bars including: Meridian Pint, The Coupe, Bad Saint, and El Chucho. 
Washer/dryer located down the hall and is free.
Pets are allowed.
Community patio area with grill and fire pit located on the backside of the building.
Building has a keyless entry feature and security cameras.

The perfect blend of Georgetown Historic charm and modern finishes. Walk to popular Georgetown restaurants and retailers, with public transportation just steps away. Description:
A City Lover's Dream! 
This apartment is in the heart of Columbia Heights and is perfect for roommates or a couple. It's a 2 minute walk from Columbia Heights Metro Station and a 15 minute walk from the U Street Cooridor and Adams Morgan. It's the perfect location for anyone looking for fun and convenience in DC. 
If you love having your favorite store or restaurant less than a few blocks away, this is the place for you. 
THE FEATURES IN THIS HOME INCLUDE:
- A parking garage is a few hundred yards away. Ask about parking costs if you are interested in parking for yourself and your guests. Street parking is also available. 
- All furnishings except some Artwork (Options for unfurnished renting is also available) 
- 2 wall-mounted, flat screen tvs...great for Sunday night football or binge watching your favorite show on Netflix
- Modern and newly renovated finishings that include high ceilings, hardwood floors throughout, stainless steel appliances, Quartz countertops, and an energy efficient home
*Leases available for 6, 12 or 24 months 
*Background check required as well as two most recent pay stubs from your job
*Security deposit required of $250 to $2600 based on credit and lease length 
*No subleasing is permitted
*Additional pet fees, if applicable

Description:
Available June 1, 2018-May 31, 2019 - 12 months lease
Contact Scott Sachs: 301-908-4373
Quick access to downtown DC, Capitol Hill, Rosslyn and Arlington, VA. one block from Wisconsin Ave, two blocks from M Street & three blocks form Georgetown University, Washington Sports Club, the Georgetown Waterfront, which features the Washington Harbor & AMC Multiplex 14 Theater
Located in a small boutique building, this spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bath luxury apartment accommodates 4 residents. This large apartment offers a spacious living room, two fireplaces, a luxury kitchen with granite counter tops, a stainless steel refrigerator and a dishwasher. The apartment has 3 separate rooms plus 2 luxury baths and includes a full size washer & dryer as well as an additional shared washer and dryer in the building. Just off of the second bedroom is a private outdoor full size patio for occasional entertaining.
If quiet, comfortable and luxurious living is your preference, contact us to schedule a tour to secure this apartment now!!!
Street parking available
Transportation:
"G2" and "D2" Metro buses. Visit WMATA'swebsite
DC Circulator buses
Fast Uber and Lyft pick-ups
Metrorail: Dupont metro station in DC & Rosslyn Metro Station in Rosslyn, VA

Description:
This completely renovated 1bed/1bath apartment is located in the Deanwood Neighborhood of Washington, DC just 1 mile away from the Deanwood Metro Stop. Rent includes all utilities except electric for which tenant is responsible. Available for immediate move in!
This Apartment Features:
- Brand new hardwood floors throughout the living & dining area
- Tiles floors in the bathroom & kitchen 
- New carpet throughout the bedroom
- Updated kitchen with new cabinets, granite countertops, and stainless appliances
- Remodeled bathroom with a whirlpool tub
- In unit front load washer & dryer
- Central air & heat
- Ceiling fans
- Crown molding 
- Gated community
- Assigned parking available
- On street parking available for guests 
For additional questions, to request an application, or to schedule an appointment to view this property please reply to this post.
Application Process: There is an application to fill out, but no application fee. Minimum credit score requirement is 625. 
We look forward to showing you your new home!
Continental Mortgage & Investment Corp.

Description:
Luxury 1 BR+Den/2BAs, can be rented furnished or unfurnished.. Open fl plan, recently renovated. Generous closets & storage. W/D in-unit. Private balcony. 2-zone HVAC. Extraordinary roof deck w/ sweeping city views! Dining, retail, arts & entertainment. 24 hr desk & gym. 1 blk to Metro! Entrance off of Indiana Ave NW between Cosi & PNC Bank. 
Min Lease: 12 Max Lease: 36 No Smoking Allowed Tenant is Responsible to Electric Rent Includes: Common Area Maintenance, Furnished, HOA / Condo Fee, Trash Removal, Water and Sewer
CALL SHANE AT 202.417.2088 FOR ADDL INFO OR QUESTIONS.
