The ultimate penthouse pad! all new stunning 1br townhouse condos flooded with light! Custom finishes - Gourmet kitchen w/stainless and gorgeous stone counters, warm hardwood floors, custom tiled baths, high ceilings, recessed lighting, w/d, huge private roof deck & 5 min walk to metro!! $30 - Application Fee

Description:
4 BDR/2.5 BA 2130 sqft end-unit magnificent Victorian rowhouse, built in 1895, in burgeoning Bloomingdale. Enormous bedrooms. Beautiful original detail. Vaulted ceilings. Master bedroom includes overhead loft and attached large master bathroom with shower and jetted tub. PA sound system with speakers in each room. 1-2 blocks from Yoga District, Red Hen, Big Bear Cafe, Pub and the People, Boundary Stone, Aroi, Tyber Creek. U Street restaurants walkable. 15-minute walk to both Red and Green/Yellow metro lines. United States Capitol building and Union Station down the street. 
>$4200/month
>Available October 15
>2-car carpark
>Washer/dryer included
>Utilities/water/cable not included 
>Application fee: $30/person
(Bloomingdale, Ledroit Park, NoMa, Eckington, Shaw, NW DC)

Description:
Beautiful 2 bedroom condo in lovely 16th Street Heights/Brightwood neighborhood for rent, October 15th. Large windows, stunning mahogany wood floors, jacuzzi tub, washer and drawer in unit, central heating and AC. The apartment is very conveniently located; close to Takoma Park, Silver Spring, Columbia Heights and Petworth. Major bus lines, bike shares, restaurants and shopping nearby. Short walk from Rock Creek Park. Very friendly neighborhood with easy unrestricted parking available on street.
Pets up to 25 lbs welcome with a $300 deposit.
$35 application fee
Rent $1900/mo + electric/1 month security deposit

Description:
OPEN HOUSE INFO: Sat 9/23 11:30-1 and Sun 9/24 10:30-12:30. Call/text for entry--(202) 321-5674
785 sq. ft 1-bedroom, 1-bath top floor apartment in well-maintained, elevator condominium building on quiet tree-lined Macomb Street NW. Just one block from Connecticut Ave., around the corner from Cleveland Park strip, very short walk to Metro. No smoking. No pets. $1,840.00/month (includes utils. except phone/cable/internet). 
* Includes one assigned parking space in building’s secured parking lot. 
* Brand-new Bathroom Renovation
* Full, separate kitchen with brand-new refrigerator and dishwasher; abundant cabinets and counters
* Huge bedroom with generous floor-to-ceiling closets
* Living room and adjacent dining room
* Large energy-efficient windows; southern exposure and Rock Creek Park views throughout unit
* Central AC/Heat
* Laundry Room in basement
* Hardwood floors
* Large walk-in linen closet with lots of shelving
* Coat closet in foyer with hanging space and shelving
* Also includes storage cage in building’s climate-controlled Trunk Room. Walk to Zoo, Park, etc., and easy access to just about everything city living has to offer!

Description: Open, Airy, and Quiet. Modern townhouse available November 1. If you are seeking quiet, trees and sun blocks from the metro and adventure, this the place for you! 4 bedrooms, two Italian granite bathrooms, lovely kitchens, brand new washer and dryer. Big entertaining spaces, back deck, outdoor fireplace and gardens. 8 minute walk to Petworth/Georgia Ave metro. Even closer to national recognized dining on 11th Street and Upshur Street.

Description:
We are offering a spacious and bright English basement apartment in the prime location of Eckington, DC. (1/2 mile from Union Station) The apartment is about 600 Sqft and it has an modern open kitchen set up facing a spacious bright living room. The bedroom is 144 sqft with ample closet space. Washer and dryer are located within the unit. Secure private front & rear entrances. 
The closest train station is only a few blocks away - NOMA train station, buses stops 1 block away and you have access to many local restaurants/bars/yoga/coffee shops all within walking distance. It's also a short walk/ride to the Bloomingdale, Brookland, Noma, Shaw, and U Street areas. Plenty of street parking available right in front of the house/neighborhood. 
We are chill, friendly, clean homeowners and we live upstairs. 
Tenant responsible for electricity only. 
Please contact us if you are interested. Thanks!

Description:
Fully furnished/equipped, beautiful, very spacious (about 1000 square feet) double-bed garden apartment in character corner pre-1900 townhouse. Separate private entry (front and back). Can accommodate couple or two roommates comfortably. Ideal for GU faculty or students, roommates or couple. Access to paved backyard with garden furniture. Lots of storage space. Bike area. Easy parking in street with permit delivered by DC MVA based on lease. 
Description. All hardwood floors. Lots of closets. Spacious living room with plasma TV, shelving, sofa and sofa-bed (double size), and table/desk + shelves. Superbly equipped large kitchen, granite countertop with high chairs. Large bedroom with queen-size bed + single bed for double occupancy and walk-in closet. Full bath with marble walls/floors. 
Location. Superbly located: front of Duke Ellington School of Arts (just remodeled); three blocks to GU campus; walk to Wisconsin ave. (large Safeway store), Glover Park (Whole Foods) and M street shopping & dining; buses (15 mn) or walk (40 mn) to downtown National Mall/White House, and Dupont Circle areas. 
Not pets. No smoking. 
Rent is all-inclusive. It includes central heating and A/C, cable TV, high-speed internet, in-apartment laundry facilities, and bi-weekly cleaning services. 
$2,499 monthly for single occupancy ($2749 for double occupancy). 
Please email geo.gardens@yahoo.com, or call Grace 571 480 2691

Description:
Available immediately
Beautiful, light filled, apartment (960 sqft), located in newly renovated Victorian house on one of the most beautiful streets of historic Mount Pleasant. Original features include very high ceilings, fire place, pocket doors, plantation shutters and oak floors. Large bedroom with fireplace and two closets. Very large living room with original ceiling beams. Very large, fully equipped kitchen tiled with terracotta tiles and huge storage closet. The apartment has its own private veranda in the back. 
Very centrally located. High walkability. Walking distance to Mount Pleasant Street with grocery stores, cafés, restaurant and bars. Walk to 14th St. Shopping Mall, Giant and Columbia Metro Station (green and yellow lines). Two blocks away from 42/43 terminal bus and Saturday farmers' market. One block away from H buses (on Park Rd) and three blocks away from S buses (on 16th Street).
Amenities include: Central A/C and heating. Water, gas and waste removal. Fully equipped kitchen, including dishwasher, microwave, range/oven, refrigerator and disposal. Laundry, washer and dryer. Individual back porch.
$2,796 monthly inclusive of utilities except electricity. Tel (571) 480 2691 (Grace) or (202) 615 8961 (Jean-Claude), or email geo.gardens@yahoo.com or jbalcet@gmail.com

Description:
LEASING NOW:
Available June 1, 2018 - May 31st, 2019 - 12 month lease
Rent includes: FREE water, FREE trash,FREE recycling, FREE building maintenance
Contact Scott Sachs: 301-908-4373 or Email: ScottSachs1@yahoo.com
APARTMENT FEATURES:
This bright and large 2 bed/1 bath floor-plan features hardwood floors, a pass-through kitchen and a pass-through foyer, a very spacious kitchen with a stove and refrigerator, full bath, A/C, ceiling fans in the living room and bedrooms, & internet and cable access.
BUILDING FEATURES:
*secured access
*security surveillance system
*bike shed storage
*Street parking is available 
*Online rent and maintenance portal
*laundry center in the building ( credit card operated machines)
TRANSPORTATION:
"G2" and "D2" Metro buses. (visit wmata.com )
DC Circulator buses
Fast Uber and Lyft pick-ups
Metro: Dupont Circle and Rosslyn Metro Station
Convenient to I-66, I-395, Whitehurst Freeway and George Washington Parkway
WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE: 
1 block from Wisconsin Ave. & 2 blocks from M Street NW
Georgetown University Medical Center, hotels, full service banks, drug stores, restaurants and shops such as Apple, Clyde's, Banana Republic, Coach, Michael Kors, J. Paul's, Ralph Lauren, Restoration Hardware, GAP, Dean Deluca and The Washington Sport Club fitness center. Great location for working professionals or students! One block from Wisconsin Ave. and 2 blocks from M Street NW & three blocks for Georgetown University - near everything!!!
APARTMENT FEATURES: 
Located on the west side of Georgetown's historic district, this amazing 1 bedroom apartment offers a spacious living room and bedroom with ceiling fans; two closets; hardwood flooring throughout; upgraded kitchen flooring & fixtures, granite countertop, a stove and a stainless steel refrigerator. This well-lit apartment also features upgraded flooring & fixtures and lovely exposed brick in the bathroom! 
BUILDING FEATURES:
*secured access
*security surveillance system
*bike shed storage
*Street parking is available 
*Online rent and maintenance portal
*laundry center in the building ( credit card operated machines)

Convenient to I-66, I-395, Whitehurst Freeway and George Washington Parkway

Georgetown shopping district - (1 block from Wisconsin Ave. & 2 blocks from M Street NW)
Georgetown University Medical Center, hotels, banks, stores, restaurants and shops i.e., Apple, Clyde's, Michael Kors, J. Paul's, Ralph Lauren, Dean Deluca and The Washington Sport Club fitness center. Also, 4 blocks from the historic C&O Canal, the Georgetown Waterfront, which features the Washington Harbor, & the AMC Multiplex 14 Theater

Description: Adams Morgan. Very bright, sunny apartment on one of Washington's most vibrant streets, this two level apartment has an entrance hall on the second floor with the living area on the third. This totally renovated space in an historic building, includes a large eat in kitchen, living room with a large bay window, two bedrooms and one bath. A washer-dryer, dishwasher, and a disposal are included. Pets are negotiable but would require a higher security deposit.

Description:
REDUCED -- This is a great English basement apartment in a Bloomingdale residential neighborhood, with access to the backyard garden. Lots of character with exposed brick and open concept living room & kitchen. Apartment has a washer/dryer and A/C. Parking available. Close to several bus lines. Small pets OK. 
Currently unfurnished, but can furnish for slight increase in rent.

Description:
This is a very spacious, unfurnished 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment with patio access requiring an annual lease at $2,900.00/month.
LOCATED IN THE ADAMS MORGAN NEIGHBORHOOD OF WASHINGTON, D.C., YOU’LL WALK TO METRO AND EVERYTHING ELSE FROM THIS CONVENIENTLY LOCATED 2BR/1BA APARTMENT. 
Please note: Maximum occupancy for this space is two people. Additionally, utilities (electric only-no gas) for this apartment is the responsibility of tenant(s)–Aside from rent and electric usage, there are no other expenses–Water, Trash Service, Direct TV and High-Speed Internet are all inclusive in rent.
Unlike most street level apartments where natural light is an issue, this apartment has windows in every room. The building faces south giving access to ample sunlight throughout the day. Entering the apartment from street level, you’ll find a very spacious and open floor plan combining the living area and kitchen. The living area has all hardwood flooring and joins a nicely configured kitchen which includes a GE refrigerator with ice maker, dishwasher, and a new ceramic top electric range. Granite counter tops were recently added along with a deep stainless steel sink with a commercial grade faucet wand and garbage disposal. The counter space that opens to the living area can easily accommodate bar stools and is perfectly suited for entertaining and/or the convenience of passing prepared foods.
Connecting the living area to the bedrooms and bathroom is a hallway covered in beautiful ceramic tiles. Extending from the hallway you will find a utility room with a stacked washer/dryer and shelving for extra storage. The bedrooms are quite spacious (see a link to floor plan below) with large closets. Both bedrooms have newly installed ceramic tile and under the tiles is electric radiant floor heating–you’ll love this amenity during the winter months and each bedroom has its own thermostat to independently control your personal level of comfort. The bathroom is centrally located with two doors connecting both the master bedroom and a common entry from the hallway. The shower was recently renovated with glass tiles in the shower surround accented with translucent glass tiles.
There is a new energy efficient heat pump (central air unit) with a programmable/digital thermostat that provides heating and cooling comfort year-round. Electric usage is the responsibility of tenant(s) and you must secure an electric account with PEPCO (D.C.’s electric cooperative) upon execution of lease. This apartment also has access from the master bedroom to a nicely landscaped garden/patio area with table and chairs and a BBQ grill. High-Definition Direct TV receiver with Premium Channels to include HBO, Starz and Encore . . . AND . . . Xfinity’s Cable Broadband High-Speed Internet service is all included in rent. These two included amenities equate to a savings of over $159.00/month thereby realistically reducing your rent from $2,900.00 per month to about $2,741.00 per month—–not bad for a 2BR/1BA apartment in this fantastic location.

Description: Live in the heart of it all in this recently updated 1 br in Logan Circle. Walk to K street, McPherson Metro, Whole Foods and all of the great restaurants on 14th Street. Unit is large with a big open kitchen for cooking/entertaining. Separate dining nook opens to living room. True 1 br with 2 closets in bedroom and washer/dryer in unit. You must see this. Custom blackout blinds in bedroom, wood floors, granite countertop and stainless steel appliances. Gym in building and Balance Gym just out your door. Pets welcome! Call or email for showings. Larger laundry machines just down the hall. Easy landlord and application process. No fee to apply.

Description:
This bright and sunny unit, currently occupied, has a washer/dryer, central air and heat, wood floors and updated appliances. Available for move in early November! 
The unit is located 1.5 miles from NoMa-Gallaudet University Station. Bus routes include the D8 (Washington Hospital Center/Union Station), D4 (Ivy City/Franklin Square) and the E4 (Ivy City). Restaurants and shops nearby include Ivy City Smoke House, Planet Fitness, Nike, MOM's Organic Market and the Atlas Brew Work and Union Market. 
Tenants are responsible for water and electricity. No pets allowed. There is an application fee of $50 per applicant. The minimum credit score required is 700 for this property. The minimum lease term is for one year. The security deposit is equal to one month's rent. This rental unit is professionally managed by Scout Properties, a leading rental property management firm located in the Brookland neighborhood of Washington, D.C. Please contact Khadijah Anderson to schedule a showing for the weekend of October 14th!

Description:
This comfortably sized two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment is located at the perfect nexus of city convenience and tranquility.
High up on the quiet side of the building, all of the unit's large windows look out over the treetops of Glover Archbold park. The apartment has a tranquil, lofty feel and you can easily escape to a wooded retreat, accessing the Glover Archbold hiking trail right next to the building - but city living conveniences are close at hand.
A bus stop directly in front of the building allows for a super easy commute downtown on the Mass Ave line (N2/4/6 to Dupont, Farragut North), while the northbound buses connect quickly to the Tenleytown and Friendship Heights Metro stations.
Closer to home, you'll find a short stroll up New Mexico Ave gets you to a Starbucks and shopping at Foxhall Square. You can enjoy Chef Geoff's excellent happy hour or delectable take out from Wagshal's without ever getting in the car. 
If you drive, though, you'll be happy to know that a convenient, dedicated parking space is included in the monthly rent for this apartment. While it is not in an enclosed garage, it is just steps away from the buildings rear entrance.
4200 Cathedral Avenue's greatest amenity is certainly its location. But there is more to love with a striking mid century modern decorated lounge/reception and helpful, considerate 24-hour concierge service. Other common spaces include a well appointed and meticulously well-kept laundry room and a private rooftop deck.
From the common hall, the apartment opens to a small entry area with a well-sized coat closet. Immediately to the left is a large linen closet, and continuing in that direction you will find the bathroom and the entryways to the two bedrooms. The master bedroom has a walk-in closet with built-in shelves. The smaller bedroom also has a closet. To the right of the apartment's main door you look into a large, open L-shaped room that encloses the kitchen. When we lived in the apartment, we used zones of the space for dining, an office, and a living room. Some of our tenants have even carved out an additional bedroom from the space; you can easily adapt it for your needs.
The kitchen has full-sized appliances and pull-out storage. The bedrooms and main living area each have their own programmable thermostat.
The apartment has been cleaned to the nines and is freshly repainted, ready for you to move in and make it your own.
Please be in touch; we'd love to show you the place soon!

Description:
Beautiful Washington Harbour Penthouse with Potomac River Views. 1,995 sq. ft. of luxury living on three levels. Upgraded gourmet granite kitchen with top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances: Thermador, Viking, and Sub-Zero. Refinished hardwood floors, fresh paint, plantation shutters. Marble luxury baths, jacuzzi tub. Two spectacular roof top terraces - one with view of the Potomac. Inviting Living Room with woodburning fireplace. Skylights offer abundant natural light. Garage parking space included. Newer washer/dryer. Excellent building amenities: rooftop pool with sweeping views of the Potomac, garage parking, front desk concierge, exercise room. Broker/owner.
Lease Terms:
* Vacant - available immediately 
* Min. 12 mo. / Max. 24 mo. lease 
* No Smoking 
* No Pets 
* Tenant pays all utilities 
* Landlord pays condo fee 
* Application fee per adult on lease: $50 (non-refundable) 
* Security deposit: $7000
* 1 garage parking spot

Description:
Beautiful Victorian Rowhouse. Short walk to the Red Line (NOMA/Gallaudet stop), Union Station, Union Market, H Street/Atlas District night life, Eastern Market, and much more. 
2 bedrooms 
1 open office space/nursery 
2 full baths (one with a Jacuzzi tub) 
1 half bath 
SS kitchen with granite 
Washer/dryer 
Gas fireplace (with remote) 
Exposed brick 
Hardwood floors throughout, newly refinished
Freshly painted
2 skylights 
2 decks (one off kitchen, one off office/nursery) 
Covered carport with garage door 
Rent is $3,400 with utilities (water, gas, electric, security), one month security deposit required. Sorry, but no pets and no smoking.

Description:
This bright, open studio apartment is available for rent as early as October 1st. Rent price includes ALL UTILITIES including cable and internet. Located two blocks from the Southwest Waterfront metro on the Green Line, the apartment is steps from the actual waterfront and has unmatched rooftop views overlooking the Potomac and Hains Point. The apartment includes all utilities with some furniture available for purchase. With Phase 1 of the new Wharf development opening on October 12th, the apartment is in an excellent location to experience one of D.C.'s most exciting neighborhoods. Nationals Park, Arena Stage, Navy Yard, and Audi Field (future home of D.C. United) are all within a 15-minute walk, and the National Mall is just 9 blocks away.
Rent: $1,795 - this includes ALL utilities, cable, and internet.
Features include updated hardwood floors, two floor-two-ceiling sliding glass windows, and lots of closet and storage space in the unit. The floor plan has plenty of space for a distinct sleeping area separated from the living area, with room for a full kitchen table. The apartment complex, Harbour Square, includes 24-hour security and gatehouse services, brand new indoor pool, gym with cardio and weight training equipment, locker room, and beautiful English gardens. The complex also includes a business center, library, and car wash port, with additional community rooms available for rent.
Move-in date is flexible, with preference given to those who can move in sooner. Please include your ideal move-in date in your email.
Key features
* 	550 square feet
* 	Bathroom: 1 bath
* 	Kitchen includes: fridge, oven, dishwasher, and microwave
* 	Parking: on street, with option to rent a space in building
* 	Lease Duration: preferably 1 year with option to extend
* 	Security Deposit: $1000
* 	Laundry: brand new laundry room in basement
* 	Bike Storage: in basement
* 	Furniture: some available for purchase to include kitchen table, couch, entertainment center
Public transportation just two blocks away at the Green Line SW Waterfront Metro station. There are multiple buses within a couple of blocks, including the 74, W9, A9, and P6

Description:
Be the first to live in this 1 bedroom + den (with barn door, closet, and space for a bed) and 1 bath modern unit one block from Harris Teeter and the Potomac Ave metro (orange/blue/silver lines). A large living space with floor to ceiling windows, custom closets throughout, and in unit washer/dryer make this condo easy to call home. This secure building has bike storage and a roof deck with grills and great views. Tenant pays the electric bill. 
Call or email Jocelyn Lederman, Compass, 845-987-0999 or jocelyn@buyandselldc.com to setup an easy showing. You won't be disappointed!

Description:
Freshly-painted and renovated 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment overlooking gardens and a tree-lined street. Kitchen boasts new stainless steel appliances (including dishwasher), ample counter space and a wall-mounted knife rack. Bathroom shines with white subway tile and contemporary fixtures, including an oversized medicine cabinet easily shared between 2 people. Gorgeous parquet flooring throughout open floorplan living room and dining room, and carpet in both bedrooms. Master bedroom has a walk-in closet outfitted with custom shelving. Apartment comes with plenty of closet space, as well as an assigned storage unit.
4200 Cathedral Ave NW is a quiet building with beautiful grounds.
- Spectacular rooftop patio / sundeck
- 24/7 concierge signs for packages and arranges dry cleaning service
- On-site management and maintenance staff
- Ample zoned street parking
- On N2 and N6 bus lines; easy connection to Tenleytown, Friendship Heights, and Dupont Circle (red line metro)
- Quick walk to American University, Chef Geoffs, Al Dente, Starbucks, National Cathedral, and the new Cathedral Commons district
- Steps from Glover Park trails connecting with C&O Canal Towpath and Capital Crescent Trail
- Credit and reference check required
- Security deposit of $2000 at lease signing
- Building charges a one-time $350 move-in fee
- No pets or smokers permitted
Flexible move-in date. ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED (heating, cooling, garbage, water, gas). Cable/phone/internet are tenant's choice.
Lease duration is 12 months minimum, with option for renewal.

Description:
2bd/2bath condo apartment unit in Mount Pleasant / Columbia Heights (16th and Newton st) classic building. The apartment is on the terrace/basement level of the building. The building is very safe and well taken care of by long term residents. Located between Columbia Heights and Mt. Pleasant it it convenient to both the Yellow/Green metro and buses (S2,4,9, H2,3,4, 8 and 42, 43). It is 5 minute walk to Target, Giant and many other stores in the Columbia Heights square.
The apartment is clean and roomy. There is a new washer and dryer in the unit. Utilities (electric and internet) run around $60-$80 per month. Basic cable is include.

-ITALIAN TILE IN BATROOM
-GRANITE COUNTERTOPS
-STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES

-LARGE COMMON ROOF DECK Unit is in the SilverStone building. Great location near Thomas circle, just steps away from whole foods, starbucks, sweetgreen and other restaurants and bars. New construction, hardwood floors, kitchen with granite and new whirlpool appliances, central air and heat. Rent is $1,850 per month plus electric. Building is equipped with two laundry centers. There is no parking offered. Building features a large common roof-deck.

Description: Top floor apartment in a four-unit townhome. Large deck in the back with off-street parking. New appliances, fixtures, built in 2015. Spacious master bedroom with high ceilings and great natural light. Skylight in the bathroom for natural light in the morning.

Images: ![Front of building, unit is right of entrance. - 1651 Lamont St NW](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/maP8eKuwNIuhQUsNrc-3gEduM8oIEYfeoWRk_CTKKgM/110/1651-lamont-st-nw-unit-1b-washington-dc-front-of-building-unit-is-right-of-entra.jpg)
Description:
Historic Mt. Pleasant neighborhood is an excellent urban living location. Attractive, renovated early 1900's building is cater-cornered from the public library. Within a block of S, 42 & H buses, ten minute walk to Columbia Heights yellow/green line.
Single parking space with private entrance behind building, included.
Good restaurants and pubs, groceries, bank, pharmacy, laundry, cleaners, hardware, convenience store, farmers market, other amenities within a short walk.
Zoo entrance, Rock Creek Park within a few blocks.
Fifteen minute walk to heart of Adams/Morgan, ten minutes to shops and restaurants of Columbia Heights. Mexico and Spain cultural centers close.
Wood floors, kitchen with granite counters and Spanish tiles, W/D. 
This is a 17 unit condominium. Seeking self-sufficient renters mindful of their neighbors. No smoking, cats discouraged, well-trained (no barkers) dogs considered. Both bedrooms have bright light, view of front garden, main bedroom has bay window. Unit sits ten steps up and back from the street.
Gas and electric utilities are low.
Photos sent on request.
I lived here for thirteen years and still think the neighborhood is one of the best in DC.

Description:
1 Bedroom Condo for Rent with Great View and Light + Rooftop Heated Pool in the Heart of Dupont Circle (Available immediately). Indoor bike storage in the building (in the parking with secured access).
This 1-bedroom apartment is steps away from the center of Dupont Circle and perfect for anyone seeking the conveniences of a well-managed building in an extremely walkable and safe neighborhood.
1 min walk from Metro. Bikeshare also available a block away.
Downtown DC/GW/the White House/World Bank/IMF/ U street/14th St are all within a 10-15 min walk. 10 min walk from grocery shops (Safeway, 2 Whole Foods Market, and Trader Joe's are only a few blocks away). You are also a block away from a 24-hour CVS, numerous restaurants, gyms, banks, and nightlife. 
The condo is very quiet because the windows face the residential side. It is also on the seventh floor so you have a great view, and the huge windows bathe the apartment in light all day.
The rent includes ALL utilities--electricity, water, heat, AC, and condo fees. There's ample storage space, including a huge walk-in closet. The condo features a 24/7 doorman, so it's extremely safe. Best of all, the building has a huge, heated rooftop pool with amazing views of the city.
FEATURES
Unbeatable location in a walkable, safe neighborhood
Large closets, one of which is a huge walk-in closet
All utilities included
Air conditioning, Central heat
Kitchen with granite countertops, dishwasher, refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave)
Great view and lighting from 7th floor
COMMUNITY FEATURES
Large, heated rooftop swimming pool with a view
24/7 Doorman
Regular (brand new) and Freight Elevators (3 in total)
Laundry room in the building (plenty of new laundry machines and driers) 
Community garden
Regular events such as outdoor movies on the rooftop
LEASE TERMS
1 year +
No pets.
Security deposit

Description:
This is 2 BR/2 Bath second floor condo in the brand new 525 Water Condominium, located at 525 Water Street SW. 525 Water is a part of new The Wharf development along the DC's SW Waterfront. 
(Please note: this listing is for 525 Water Street, NOT 625 Water Street - Apartments.com won't let me change the address for some reason.)
At the heart of The Wharf, 525 Water offers modern living right on the water, with 20 new restaurants, cafes, bars, parks, and the Anthem, all within a brand new waterfront community. 
The unit features a large open floor plan with floor to ceiling windows, hard-wood floors, modern European stainless steel appliances, a large walk-in closet off Master BR, and a balcony overlooking the new Waterfront Park. 
525 Water is conveniently located, just 2 blocks from the Metro (Waterfront stop on GR/YL and L'Enfant Plaza stop BL/OR/SV/GR/YL) and minutes to the Navy Yard, Nationals Stadium, the National Mall, Capitol Hill, Fort McNair, and the future DC United Stadium. For those with a car, the unit comes with an assigned parking spot in the building's underground garage. 
525 Water amenities include: full-time concierge, exercise room, resident's club room, courtyard with waterfall and grilling area, 1 parking spot in underground, secured garage.
Rent includes all utilities except electricity and cable/internet (wired for Comcast and Verizon Fios). 
AVAILABLE NOW. 
Interested parties must pass background and credit check. First month's rent and security deposit at lease signing. Please contact me to view the condo.
I am the owner and I'm not interested in services/listing agents.

Description:
Price just reduced! 
Want great light? It's here. 
Want to be able to paint the wall a color you actually like? You can. 
Want some pretty quiet neighbors? You got got 'em.
Right at the center point where DuPont circle, Logan circle, U street, and Adams Morgan all come together. 
This is a spacious two bedroom unit on the top floor of a building right at 16th and U street. AC, Laundry, wood burning fireplace, full kitchen, it even has decent closet space! There is an elevator, so you can be lazy. 10 minutes or less walking to: Dupont or U street metro stations, 100's of different restaurants, hardware store (Logan Hardware), movie theatre (Atlantic Plumbing!), grocery (Trader Joe's, Safeway and Whole foods), and most everything else you could want. Starbucks right on the corner.
Currently showing by appointment - Please reply here or call 202-262-1831

Description: Great sunny 4th floor courtyard facing one bedroom unit with Juliet balcony and fountain views. Building amenities include: Fitness room, 24 hr Concierge Service, Computer room with complimentary printer/fax/scanner, Three rooftop decks and one club room with pool table, TVs and courtyard access. Harris Teeter super market located on ground floor with access from inside the building. Potomac avenue metro stop located across across the street. Below ground garage parking available (great location - directly in front of elevator bank). Blocks from Navy Yard/Ball Park area and easy 395/295 highway access. 1 Year minimum Lease

Description:
The Claridge House Apartments, a boutique building located in the charming historic neighborhood of DuPont Circle. The building was built in 1948 and restored in 2010. The Claridge House offers seven unique and beautiful floor plans and designed to fit your personal lifestyle. The Claridge House is perfectly located within walking distance of Logan Circle, Adams Morgan and the 14th Street Corridor with an abundance of restaurants and cafes, boutiques and fantastic grocery stores.
Please contact us for more information about the Claridge House and see you soon!!

Images: ![Primary Photo - 408 M St NW](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/TmLtTbygwJ5g-6SEk-kwGzCkhfNXyIp2CzuKZlozY6k/110/408-m-st-nw-washington-dc-primary-photo.jpg)
Description:
Fully furnished 2-BR/1.5-BA garden apartment contains: Full-sized kitchen (all utensils, cutlery, dishes and cookware); dining table; queen-sized convertible sofa and Smart Television in living room; master bedroom has queen-sized bed, dresser and closet; second bedroom has full-sized bed, dresser and closet; washer and dryer; free Premium DirecTV; high-speed Internet and all utilities. Secured off-street parking for one vehicle. Located in historic Penn Quarter/Shaw area adjacent to Washington's Gallery Place &; Central Business Districts. Pets will be considered on a case-by-case basis. Some of our former tenants include: Corporations with DC-based projects; international &; domestic interns; 2 and 3-person groups of domestic and international travelers. 
THE NEIGHBORHOOD OFFERS: 
	*Short walk to Georgetown Law, Howard Medical School, Convention Center and Downtown offices.
	*Entertainment: Movies @ Gallery Place (14 screens); E Street Cinema (9 screens); Penn Quarter &; H Street Atlas District Night Life; Washington Mall and museums; Washington Sports &; fitness facilities. 
	*Restaurants: Approximately half (17/36) of the Very Best DC Restaurants selected by Washingtonian Magazine. 
	*Supermarkets: A 59,000 sq. ft. gourmet Safeway (2 blocks away); a 72,000 sq. ft. Giant (4 blocks away); Whole Foods &; Trader Joe's (one mile away).
	*Metro: Yellow & Green Lines (2.5 blocks away), Red Line (6 blocks away); $1 Circulator bus (2 blocks away) to Georgetown, DuPont Circle, Union Station, K-Street Corridor, Navy Yard, Barracks Row, Woodley Park/Adam's Morgan.
	*The following are within a 10-minute (or less) drive:
		-Reagan National Airport 
		-Union Station (AMTRAK)
		-Capitol Hill offices
		-Washington Hospital Center, George Washington U. Hospital
		-Major league baseball @ Nationals' Park

Description: We are proudl to present to you, this fresh and bright 2Bed, 1Bath apartment near Logan Circle! Conveniently located one block away from U Street Metro (Green & Yellow Line). Only steps away to shops, restaurants, entertainment that U Street and 14th Street have to offer! This unit features 2 large bedrooms and 1 full marble bath. Huge living room contains 10+foot high ceilings, original ornate plaster cornice moldings, original hand carved wide oak door casings and pocket doors!! Original oak floors throughout home, fireplaces, marble bathroom, marble floors, new stainless steel appliances, exposed brick and so much more! Luscious courtyard garden available to residents.There is also a individual washer/dryer in each unit. Please call or text Ms Zak at 202-468-7722 for additional information or to schedule a viewing.Apartment is $3045/$2845

Description: SPACIOUS (600+ s.f.) CORNER 1-bedroom in THE IMPERIAL HOUSE with sweeping views in the heart of Dupont Circle fun! Upgraded kitchen with granite counters, newer appliances including GAS stove. Parquet floors throughout. Custom-built cherry hardwood shelving unit conceals a queen-sized bed with a specially designed mattress. Tons of closet space -- 3 closets in the living area plus 2 in the bedroom. Water, gas & electric INCLUDED in rent. Rooftop deck, 24-hour front desk, laundry room, bike storage & more. Pets accepted on case-by-case basis (weight and breed restrictions per Imperial House rules.) Only 1 block from Dupont Circle...restaurants, shops and Metro are only steps away.

Services: * Laundry Facilities

Description: SUNNY & CONVENIENT Studio in the IMPERIAL HOUSE with wall-of-windows view in the heart of Dupont Circle! Upgraded kitchen with granite counters & NEW appliances including GAS stove. Parquet floors throughout. Custom-built cherry hardwood shelving unit concealing a queen-sized bed with a specially designed mattress. Tons of closet space. Electricity, water, sewer & gas INCLUDED in rent. Rooftop deck, 24-hour front desk, laundry room, bike storage & more. Pets accepted on case-by-case basis. Only 1 block from Dupont Circle...restaurants, shops and Metro are only steps away.

Description:
Not your typical bedroom apt unit. Beautiful basement 1BR /1BA on the edge of Eckington/Bloomingdale with gas fireplace. Brand new floors, with fully updated kitchen. Available October 15th. Open to short term lease. The street has ample street parking with no restrictions. 
Includes: Beautiful exposed brick bedroom with great light and sliding wood doors
Gas fireplace Brand new updated kitchen, with new dishwasher, refrigerator, and microwave
Fully updated bathroom and shower
W/D 
Location:
5 Minute Walking to Crispus Attucks Park
7 Minute walk to Red Hen, Boundary Stone and Bloomingdale strip 10 minute walk to Big Bear Cafe
5 Minute walk to Eckington Pool and Recreation Center
15 Minute walk to red line metro (Rhode Island)
Very quiet block with tons of street parking

Come home to a beautifully renovated condo just a few blocks from the Potomac Avenue metro (Orange/Blue/Silver) where you can easily take a stroll to Lincoln Park or right up Pennsylvania Avenue to Eastern Market’s bustling marketplace and popular Barracks Row restaurants. This home is also centrally-located, allowing for easy access downtown as well as to 295/395.

Description:
Delightful one bedroom apartment -- corner unit with ample closet space, updated bathroom and kitchen! Don't miss this spectacular apartment. Unit has a dishwasher, and the building has laundry, a pool, business office, a gym, and 24 hour concierge service. Limited furnishings can be provided upon request. Description:
Luxury Apartment in the Heart of Georgetown. The perfect blend of Georgetown Historic charm and modern finishes. Walk to popular Georgetown restaurants and retailers, with public transportation just steps away. This elegant one-bedroom, one-bath apartment has high ceilings with light-filled windows. The Kitchen features custom Porcelanosa cabinetry, quartz countertops, high-end Bosch appliances including washer/dryer, and Kohler fixtures. Rent includes: keyless entry system, water, trash collection, fire monitoring, and cleaning and pest control for common areas. Gas and electric are separately metered and not included in rent. Inquire about nearby parking. Equal Housing Opportunity.
Be the 1st Person to Live in this Newly Constructed Luxury Home.

Newly renovated two bedroom unit near Minn Ave. Metro
Two bedroom apartment for rent at 900 48th Pl. NE Apt. #1 20019.
This newly renovated, first floor apartment features modern kitchen and bathroom appliances, central air AC, washer/dryer, secured front entry door to the building, large backyard, separate front and back doors to the unit. Easy access to public transportation or downtown DC.

Description:
Capitol Hill, spacious Two Bedroom Apt. just two blocks from Metro rail and Grocery Store.
Located at 519 12th St. SE 20003 which is near the corner of 12th St. and Pennsylvania Ave. Rent is $1,900.00 per month. Security deposit is also $1,900.00. Tenant pays for gas and electricity as the only mandatory utilities. Lease is for one year minimum. One cat permitted. No dogs please.
Unit is located just two blocks from a Metro rail station (Potomac Ave.) on the Orange, Blue, and Silver lines. There’s a Harris Teeter grocery store just two blocks away. No need to own a car! Restaurants, bars, coffee shops, nightlife, and cultural attractions can be found just a few blocks away on the Barracks Row commercial corridor of 8th St. and PA. Ave. SE.
This first floor apartment features two large bedrooms w/ plenty of closet space, a rear porch, and a large back yard for barbecues or tossing the Frisbee. Central A/C and heat are controlled in the unit. High ceilings and working windows help make this unit feel more like a house than an apartment. A washer+dryer and a dishwasher are also included in the unit.
Prospective applicants must view the dwelling to receive an application. No site unseen rentals. Application fee is $30 to pay for the credit check. Applicants must provide documentation of income. 
To arrange a viewing please call Home Realty at 202 547-7895. Leave a voice message if calling after business hours. 
Equal Housing Opportunity

Description: GREAT LOCATION!! Let the (real) lions guard your door! Be a neighbor to two living Presidents! Live next to the largest urban park in the US! Enjoy the suburban feel of this historic district in the heart of the city with its restaurants, shopping and vibrant community! Nestled on a very quiet street with little traffic, you won't believe that you're less than a block away from the Metro, the Zoo and Rock Creek Park and very, very safe! This 900 sf apt. has it all! A separate entrance through a lovely shared patio, spacious rooms and all the modern conveniences! The large living room overlooks the full-sized kitchen and the gorgeous bath has extra storage. The bedroom has a giant walk in closet. And your own private w/d right in the apt.! W/W carpeting, recessed lighting and tall ceilings! A steal at $1,660/mo. INCLUDING UTILITIES. The cost of internet and cable are shared with the landlord. A year's lease. No smoking and no pets.

Description:
This lovely one bedroom unit is located at the award-winning Cityline at Tenley Condominium; It is spacious and bright with sweeping City views. It is approximately 800 square feet and is located in a fantastic location above the Tenleytown/ AU Metro ( red line). It is across the street from the Janney Elementary School, Wilson High School and Aquatic Center, and one block from American University's Washington College of Law. The building is conveniently located across from Whole Foods, CVS, Panera Bread and many restaurants and shopping. The bus to Georgetown stops in front of the building and the AU Shuttle runs often from across the street. 
The building has a 24-hour concierge, fitness and business center, landscaped courtyard, and a lovely modern lobby. Non-smoking! One small dog or cat is permitted with additional fees. Utilities are not included. We are offering a $500 one-time summer move-in special for leases commencing before September 1. Covered parking is available for $175 per month. Please contact Lisa Lake at 240-393-7116 for additional details. If seriously interested, please do not contact me by email!

Description:
Open house is on September 7th from 10-2pm by appointment 
showing sooner by appointment also. 
Charming 3 BDR 3.5 Bath Tudor Style Rowhome in Lovely Petworth Neighborhood. Recent Renovations include Kitchen, Bathrooms, and Central A/C. All new stainless steel appliances and washer and dryer. Finished Basement with an additional 800 square feet of space and 1 Car Garage available but is small. Fenced in yard with small pergola in the back good for barbeques. Really close to downtown DC, along with supermarkets and Pet worth restaurants and 10 minute walk to the Fort Totten Metro and house is on 3 major bus routes. 
Available NOW Mid September/ Early October
Tenant will have to pay all Utilities house has gas, electric and water. Tenant is responsible for lawn maintenance. Application fee is $35 per person for background and credit check.

Description:
- Once a month maid service included in rent! 
- Water included in rent.
- Opposite the street from Potomac Ave. Metro. 
- Ready for move in October, 28th, 2017. 
- Plenty of street parking available (zone 6).
Top-of-the-line finishes and impeccable style. Features include wood floors, SS appliances, white Carrera marble counters, recessed lighting, Grohe faucets, cantilever doors, contemporary sink vanities, & much more. This unit boasts a master suite w 2 large closets, en-suite bath with marble sink vanity & spa shower w glass doors & double shower-heads. Second BR w private access to the outdoor courtyard.
This spacious condo is conveniently located across the street from the Potomac Ave. Metro Station, near Harris Teeter Grocery Store, and all the amazing restaurants and bars in Capitol Hill/Eastern Market.

Description:
A large 2BR + den/office, 2BA unit available in the Solo Piazza condo building, located just off the hot 14th Street corridor in Logan Circle. This wonderfully laid-out, approximately 1400 square foot unit, features tons of windows and views onto your own private 170 square foot patio surrounded by greenery! 
- Fully furnished modern condo in a prime location on 13th St. NW. Furnished by design within reach furniture.
- Available for move in November 1st.
- Rooftop with great views of DC. 
- 2 Underground covered garage parking spots included in the rental.
A little about the building and the area:
Every unit at Solo Piazza has its own outdoor space as well as sharing the buildings dramatic roof deck overlooking the city. Kitchens and baths feature Poggenpohl cabinetry topped with Italian granite counters. Many units feature gas fireplaces as well for cool DC evenings. The building also features a two-story lobby with concierge, secure garage parking, and extra storage. The location could not be more central within 1-2 blocks of Whole Foods, CVS, Starbucks, the Studio Theater, multiple Metro stations, VIDA Fitness, Bang Salon and the multitude of restaurants, shops, and cafes of Logan Circle. 
Vibrant Logan Circle At Your Doorstep
Logan Circle is one of DC s most vibrant, happening and desirable neighborhoods with Victorian row houses, repurposed loft spaces and new condominiums lining the streets. Residents enjoy a host of retailers, restaurants, coffee houses, art galleries, furniture stores, live theater and nightlife venues. Property values for the exceptional condominium residents found in Logan Circle top some of the highest price per square foot figures in the city and for good reason. Logan is definitely one the hot spots to be. 
Perfectly situated just one block from the buzz of 14th Street in Logan Circle, residents enjoy literally having the best of the city at their doorstep. Within 1-2 blocks are Whole Foods, Vida Fitness, CVS, Logan Hardware, the Studio Theatre and the neighborhood's abundant restaurants and boutiques. Solo Piazza is a short walk to the Metro's Green Line at the Mt. Vernon-Convention Center station and also the Red Line's Dupont Circle station.

Description: Be the first for live in this completely renovated 2 bedroom 1 full bath basement apartment. As you can see from the pictures we are finishing up the last details on this modern true Capitol Hill living. Eight foot high ceilings throughout, bright and clean white paint and full tile flooring make this a peacefully retreat after a long day’s work or a busy weekend hub for activities. The full bathroom is finished in white subway tile and modern chrome fixtures. Washer and dryer are also included so no trips to the laundromat on the weekend. Large closets and windows accompany the two bedrooms. The kitchen has off gray cabinets surrounded by white marble countertops and back splash. All new appliances with refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave and garbage disposal. You won’t find a cleaner and brighter apartment so close to the Capitol and ready to move in! 2,875 per month. Water and gas included. Pets are subject to approval and could be extra pet charge. Act now before this place in gone….

Description: Welcome to 407 A street S.E. Three blocks from the capital. This home features 3 large bedrooms with 2½ bathrooms on two levels. From the front double doors, you walk into the open floor plan showing off the double fireplaces and chandeliers on the grand living room. Next to the living room is a full size dining room right behind the kitchen. A new half bathroom has just been added next to the stairs for the first floor use. There are hardwood floors throughout the house. All the floors on the first floor have just been sanded and polyurethane. The HVAC (central heating and cooling) system is completely updated. The kitchen has a new counter deep extra wide refrigerator and new convention oven, granite counter tops and bay window with a seat. Upstairs are the 3 bedrooms. The master bedroom has the original fireplace when the house was built that gives the room an old sense of warmth. The hallway contains the 2 full bathrooms and washer and dryer. Parking is included with this house. There is space for two cars in the back yard on the newly built stone patio and driveway. Water and gas utilities are included in this rental package. Asking price for the rental is $4,980. There is a one month security deposit. Pets are possible on a case by case approval.

Description:
About the Space:
Cozy 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom 700 sq/ft condo on a beautiful tree-lined street less than a 10 minute walk to the Rhode Island Metro (red line). The larger room (14’x10’) has a big closet. The smaller bedroom (12’x10’) has a good size closet and two windows that let in lots of natural light. It also has a private entrance. The condo features a full kitchen with stainless steel appliances, microwave, and convenient storage. There is also a full bathroom with shower and jetted tub. 
Additional amenities include:
* Washer and dryer in unit;
* Central air-conditioning;
* Central heating; 
* Backyard patio with seating and a charcoal grill; and
* Some utilities (water, garbage, and exterior maintenance) included.
About the Neighborhood:
This condo is located in the neighborhood of Brentwood. It offers easy access to everything you need, including:
* Giant grocery
* TX Maxx 
* Home Depot
* CVS, Bank of America, Chipotle and other shops and restaurants on Rhode Island Row
* Menomale, Brookland's Finest and other restaurants and bars on 12th Street
About the Transportation Options:
As previously mentioned, this condo is less than a 10 minute walk from the Rhode Island Metro (red line), several bus lines (D8, H8, T14, etc.), a Capital Bikeshare station, and the Metropolitan Branch biking/walking trail to downtown DC. Getting downtown takes less than 15 minutes on public transportation. There is a carport with free parking available on a first come basis.
About You:
You are a responsible and reliable tenant with good credit.
Minimum one-year lease (with longer durations possible). Monthly rent is $1,900 and the security deposit is $1,900. Serious applicants will be asked to complete an application and a credit check.

Bright 24-hour laundry room 
In-unit dishwasher, disposal 
Master TV antenna

Assigned Indoor parking: waitlist (extra charge) 
Great neighborhood, off Dupont Circle, close to nightlife, work, shopping, metro, gyms, in the heart of it all! Rent includes all utilities (cable extra)

Description: Beautiful condo in a in the active North East part of Washington D.C. Great access to public transportation, such as the metro and public buses all of which are increase the convenience to the various businesses within the area. The condo has two bedrooms, one bathroom which features a soak tub jacuzzi, the condo floors are hardwood and the kitchen comes with stainless steel appliances and granite kitchen tops. The unit also has the added convenience of including washing machines. If you are looking for the next place to settle, this is a great condo, situated in a convenient and fenced location. The added convenience of being within walking distance of various schools and businesses makes this an attractive offer in a wonderful and safe area of Washington D.C.

Description:
Hello!
Two female, working professionals are looking for a third roommate to share a three bedroom, two bathroom house in Columbia Heights. 
The room:
Basement room with bathroom. Next to washer/dryer. Private entrance from back of house if wanted- Makes for super easy move in.
Details about house:
-Rent for room is $760, utilities run ~$110 per month
-FiOS High Speed Internet 
-Two female roommates in mid/upper twenties live in the upstairs bedrooms
-Parking space behind the house (with additional cost) or on-street parking
-Washer/Dryer in the basement
-Amazing back patio with a grill
-15 min walk to Columbia Heights and U St Metro stops
-Multiple bus routes available steps from home- the 64/63 and 52/53/54
-Tons of storage between spare room and basement
-Walking distance to great restaurants, bars, 9:30 club, etc.
You:
-Respectful of common spaces and thoughtful to clean up after yourself
-Easy going and friendly
Move in date Oct 1, but flexible within a few days. Ideally looking for someone willing to commit to 1 year lease.
We look forward to meeting you!

Description:
Three level rowhouse available for rent on one of Mount Pleasant's nicest and quieter streets. House has three bedrooms, two full bathrooms, renovated kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, washer/dryer, central air, and new heating system. Sunny backyard has brick patio and terraced garden with off street parking pad for one vehicle. Conveniently located to H2/3/4 and 42 bus stops and walking distance to Columbia Heights metro; Rock Creek Park, National Zoo and DC USA just minutes away. No smoking. $3700 per month plus utilities. 
OPEN HOUSE Sunday October 1st 2:00-5:00pm.
3300 19th Street NW DC 20010

Description:
This stylish, two bedroom duplex apartment is located in a warm and friendly townhouse close to Chinatown nightlife and Metro transportation. (Nearest Metro stations: Mount Vernon Square & Chinatown, many Metro bus lines also stop nearby.)
It features two bedrooms, a half bathroom, one full bathroom with jacuzzi bathtub, two levels, high ceilings, a spiral staircase, warm gas heat, central air conditioning, in apartment washer/dryer, and stainless steel appliances.
The place is available November first and will be provided unfurnished. No smoking, no pets. Lease, credit check and application will be completed. Homeowner is a quiet professional who lives in another apartment in the same townhouse.

Description: Your private balcony awaits. This large (UNFURNISHED) "real" 1 bedroom in the heart of Cleveland Park is a 1 minute walk to the Metro, shopping, ZipCar, Bikeshare. Don't worry about paying for utilities; they are INCLUDED in the rent. Kitchen remodeled with granite countertops, lots of large cabinets; large hallway coat closet; linen closet; beautiful parquet wood floors; and actual large bedroom with large walk-in closet. This is a friendly, medium-size building in a vibrant. walkable neighborhood with all the conveniences within two blocks: supermarket, organic grocer, restaurants of all types, bars, National Zoo, Italian deli, neighborhood gym, 2 drug stores, cleaners, bank, walk-in clinic, nails, Uptown Theater, post office, etc. Rent includes ALL utilities, but not internet or cable. Note - photos include rooms with furniture -- but apt. is unfurnished, except for balcony furniture. Sorry, no pets, no smoking. A One year lease & credit check required. Landlords live close by. email: bakdc@aol.com.

Description:
Available 15 October 2017. 12 months lease or longer. Ideal for couples or family with a child.
Step in into freshly decorated with industrial twist, fully furnished 14 Street Corridor 2 bdr, 1 bathroom condo on the 1st floor of a mid-rise condo building in the best location! 
Walk out your front door to the D.C. Some of the area's most iconic restaurants, art galleries, nightclubs and Trader Joe's grocery store.
The property features an open living area and spacious kitchen, granite counter tops, breakfast bar area with high chairs, custom made real wood furniture, real leather couch, two walk in closets and newly installed pallet wood and faux brick accent walls in the living room and master bedroom.
Enter filled with sun master bedroom through french barn doors and there is a custom made pine wood king size float bed with comfy Casper mattress along with two walk-in custom closets. 
Second smaller size bedroom benefits from space utilization through installed Murphy bed (queen/memory foam), upper closets and bike rack.
The property has two in-wall air conditioning unit, two wall mounted plasma TV's with Apple TV additions, nicely decorated and has in-unit washer-dryer for your convenience. Alternative, commercial size coin operated washer/dryers can be found in the building corridors laundry rooms.
Secure bike rental room available in ground floor.
The U Street Metro (Green and Yellow lines) approximately 2 blocks away and the Dupont Circle Metro station (Red Line) is approximately 8 blocks away. Walk Score: 97 (Walkers Paradise), Transportation Score: 89, Bike Score: 95. No pets, sorry.
Utilities included in rent:
-water/sewage 
-gas
-trash removal
Unit Amenities:
-A/C -- 2 in-wall units
-Bed #1 -- King with Casper mattress
-Bed #2 -- Murphy with Full memory foam mattress
-Breakfast bar 
-Dishwasher
-Granite counter tops
-Hardwood Floors
-High Ceilings
-Microwave
-TV Provider - Xfinity (can assist in subscribing)
-Washer/Dryer in unit
-Wireless Internet ready
-Family size, real wood dining table 
-Fully blackout thermal Roman shades bedroom windows
-Electric stove with oven
-Tap water filter
-Large fridge with ice maker
-Bedrooms privacy - light filtered french door shades

Description: AVAILABLE NOW! Renovated and modern, fully-furnished 1BR apartment just steps from the Senate buildings, Union Station and nearby Eastern Market. This is an English Basement unit of our beautiful townhouse with good natural light, shared back patio, and ample street parking. Kitchen and LR. Includes washer/dryer, kitchen with stainless appliances and stove, central air and heat, and all furnishings (linens and kitchenware too) . ALL UTILITIES AND WiFi and Cable TV INCLUDED. Rent is $2100/month; off-street parking available. Close to red/blue/orange line metros and D6/90/93 bus lines. No pets allowed.

Description:
GEORGETOWN - 2 br ENGLISH BASEMENT APARTMENT
Spacious apartment in the heart of Georgetown with separate front street entrance. Living room, Dining area, fireplace, washer/dryer inside apartment, dishwasher, central AC, spacious closets, recessed lighting.
Excellent location in prestigious and historic Georgetown East Village. Walk to parks, restaurants, art galleries, Kennedy Center, Georgetown Harbor, Universities.
Excellent transportation, several bus lines at door, Dupont Circle Metro Station, bike share stations.
Parking Permit obtainable from DMV upon presentation of lease.
Small pet allowed.
REQUEST APPOINTMENTS BY E MAIL ONLY

Description:
Furnished one bedroom English basement apartment located in a quiet private col-du-sac. With central AC and Heating. Own washer and dryer(for small loads) in unit. Hardwood floors. Renovated kitchen and bathroom. Kitchen with large refrigerator, microwave, and kitchen necessities. 
Nice backyard. Friendly, and safe neighborhood. Parking
Just two blocks away from Columbia Heights metro station (green and yellow line). A short walk to both 16th street and 17th street buses. Not far from 14th street new shopping area, Giant supermarket, Starbucks, Target close to theater and gym. A Citibank, PNC bank and Wachovia, Best Buy and much more new exciting shops in just a short walking distance.

Description:
1 bed/1 bath with 9 foot ceilings and gleaming hardwood floors. Great U St./Shaw location, 2 blocks to metro and bike share. Ground level w/ great natural light, 596 sq ft, granite in kitchen, gas stove, AC/ Heating, in-unit W/D, small outdoor space. 
Assigned underground parking (not included but may be able to rent a space) and separate storage space (included), plus exercise room and HUGE roof deck with grill, seating, foliage, lookout deck, steps from awesome bars & restaurants (right across from the 9:30 club) and great fireworks view. 
This neighborhood is truly amazing with no shortage of restaurant, bar, & live music options to include American Ice Company, Dickson Wine Bar, El Rey, Blind Dog Café, Chix, Greek Spot, Shaw Tavern, Bistro Bohem, Thai X-ing, Nellies, The Brixton, Right Proper Brewery, The Coffee Bar, Howard Theatre, 9:30 club, DC9, Velvet Lounge, & Black Cat, Trader Joe's and Yes! Organic market, a movie theatre are within walking distance as well as the YMCA/ Vida. 
Please let me know if you would like to be a part of this wonderful community! 
There is a background/ credit check.

Description: Ultra luxury and spacious town home in great location on 9th and T street. 1 block from U Street. Historically preserved facade with new construction completed in 2008. Spacious 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. The Preservation at 815 T street combines 5 concepts; historic preservation, green living, smart technology, new construction, and luxury. Dramatic entry with curved stone wall entrance and special molding; stone walls in master bathrooms with special shower heads. Exposed brick in bedrooms and living rooms. A wireless headset gives you control of your home (lights,heating/ac,alarm). The unit comes with large flat screen computer that controls the smart system in the unit. built in speakers throughout the house. Walk to U Street night life or Shaw Metros. Great amount of space in the urban environment. Pets allowed with fee and rent.

Description:
Gorgeous and spacious, light filled 3 BR 1.5 Bath apartment available now.
Be the first to view this amazing apartment and schedule a showing today. This apartment features a fire place, high ceilings, and lots of built in shelves that give it lots of character. Tons of living and storage space.
It is walking distance to shops and restaurants and public transit is only minutes away. 
Parking space included.

Description:
Capitol Hill Townhouse for Rent
Open House
Sunday, October 1st
(10:00 am - 2:00 pm)
If you prefer autonomy in your day to day living with more control over your environment and comfort of home, then take a look at 1515 Pennsylvania Avenue SE. This spacious two level townhouse, available for immediate occupancy, is conveniently located one block from the Potomac Metro Station, near Harris Teeter Grocery Store, and all the amenities of Capitol Hill. .
Features:
- 1100 square feet
- two bedroom
- one and one-half bath
- central air/heat
- wood-burning fireplace
- washer/dryer
- dishwasher
- microwave
- walkout deck
- private rear yard
Rent, Deposit, Fees:
$2595 Monthly Rent plus Utilities
$2595 Security Deposit 
$ 250 Non Refundable Pet Fee (one time)
$ 55 Monthly Rent Per Pet 
Open House
Sunday, October 1st
(10:00 am - 2:00 pm)

Services: * Laundry Facilities

Description:
Available Nov 1st - FULLY-FURNISHED GORGEOUS TOP FLOOR Upper Georgetown Spacious 1 BR with Garage Parking
2320 Wisconsin Ave Nw #515, Washington, DC 20007
$2,350/mo | Furnished
KEY FEATURES 
Year Built: 1984
Sq Footage: 744 sqft.
Bedrooms: 1 Bed
Bathrooms: 1 Bath
Parking: 1 Garage
Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)
Deposit: $2,350
Pets Policy: None
Laundry: In Unit
Floor: Top
Property Type: Condo
DESCRIPTION
Just bring a suitcase!
Top-Floor one bedroom, one bath spacious 744 sq ft soundproof apartment on quiet side of the building in upper Georgetown condo project across the street from Whole Foods. One reserved garage parking space is included for additional fee of $200 monthly. Walk Score: 90!
Unit features renovated kitchen, unit-controlled HVAC, hardwood floors, wood-burning fireplace, walk-in closet, ensuite BA, washer/dryer in-unit, private balcony. Water utility + basic cable w/ mounted LED television are INCLUDED. Available October 1, 2017. Email to schedule a showing.
Building features: Expansive, privately shared rooftop deck w/ views of the National Cathedral, 2 Elevators, Secured Entry, Renovated Lobby and Hallways
Add'l info: No Pets please. Application fee of $75 per applicant. Tenant has option to cover upgraded cable and add internet for additional $100 p/month.
FULLY-FURNISHED Kitchen, Living/Dining and Bedroom, just bring a suitcase. 
Location: Walk Score: 90. On Wisconsin Ave in the heart of Glover Park across from Whole Foods and Guy Mason Park and next to Starbucks, CVS, and great neighborhood restaurants. 10 min walk/5 min bus to the middle of Georgetown. Convenient to American University, Georgetown U., and Dupont Circle. Steps to bus lines downtown + 2 nearby bikeshares.

LEASE TERMS
Fully-furnished (as seen in photos), Landlord will pay move-in fee. One Garage Parking space is included for additional $200 monthly fee. Water and Basic Cable included. No Pets please. Application fee of $75 per applicant. Tenant covers upgraded cable (if desired) and internet.

Description:
Great 1 br apartment in heart of Woodley Park -EVERYTHING Included
Highlights
- Renovated, quiet and comfortable 1 bedroom / 1 bath English basement apartment located in a beautiful row house on one of the nicest blocks in Woodley Park
- Amazing location that is 1.5 blocks to the red line metro and Rock Creek Park; leafy street surrounded by restaurants, stores and tons of other amenities 
- Responsible and considerate owner lives upstairs
- Includes ALL utilities, as well as free premium cable, including HBO and DVR
- Nicely updated and bright bathroom as well as kitchen with stainless steel appliances
- Private washer/dryer in the unit
- Painted brick walls
- Small outdoor patio with room for a few chairs and table
- Separate entrance
Pets Considered

Description:
Centrally located Dupont Circle studio with 2 closets, updates $1,850/mo
KEY FEATURES
Year Built: 1962
Bedrooms: Studio
Bathrooms: 1 Bath
Parking: None
Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)
Deposit: $1,650
Pets Policy: Prohibited
Laundry: Shared
Property Type: Condominium DESCRIPTION
________________________________________
Spacious open studio on 3rd floor of well managed condominium building featuring hardwood floors, abundant natural sunlight, an updated kitchen with granite countertops and modern amenities. Located in the heart of Dupont in a full service building offering spectacular roof deck views of the National Cathedral and sunsets, a 24/7 front desk, and laundry facilities. Short walk to Logan Circle, Adams Morgan, U Street and Farragut Square correspond with a perfect walk score of 100. 2 blocks to Metro and several bus lines! Rent includes all utilities except phone/cable/internet. Many shops, restaurants and gyms within walking distance, including Safeway, Whole Foods, Hoban’s, Madhatter’s, Duke’s Grocery, Lauriol Plaza, Front Page, Annie's Paramount Steak House, Circa, Bar Dupont, Komi, Etto, Levante’s, Filter, Dolcezza, Washington Sports Club, Vida Fitness, and many more. SAIS, Georgetown College, Georgetown Law, and American University are a short walk or bus/metro ride away. Unit is move in ready. NO PETS. RENTAL FEATURES
________________________________________
* 	Living/Dining room space
* 	Walk-in closet
* 	Range / Oven
* 	Refrigerator
* 	Dishwasher
* 	Garbage disposal
* 	Heat: forced air
* 	Air conditioning
* 	Cable-ready
* 	Hardwood floor COMMUNITY FEATURES
________________________________________
* 	Doorman 24/7
* 	Secured building entry
* 	Rooftop Deck/Patio
* 	Near Metro (red line) and multiple bus line transportation options
* 	Elevator
* 	On-street parking LEASE TERMS
________________________________________
1 year lease required. Application fee is $55 per person. First month’s rent and security deposit equal to one months rent due at lease signing. $250 move in fees due to Dupont East building.

Description:
We have a fully furnished studio with full bathroom and full kitchen in the lower level of our house. Separate entrance and shared back yard, located a block west of 43rd Street. Utilities are included! Laundry is right outside the door. Lease period is flexible. 
The building is within short walking distance to Friendship Heights and Tenleytown metro stations, as well as a block from the 30, 31, 33, 37, and N2 bus lines. 
Rodman's grocery store, Crunch Gym, Yosaku Japanese Restaurant, Pete's Pizza, and Thanad Thai Cuisine are just a few of the establishments within the neighborhood.

Description:
Amazing apartment, terrific building, fabulous neighborhood.
An Amazing Apartment: Newly renovated, Junior 1-bedroom apartment on fourth floor of this modern building in Southwest. Fresh paint, new carpet, new light fixtures, new wood blinds, new HVAC. Open floor plan, walk-in closet. Huge windows look out on building’s pool. Facing east, it gets an ocean of morning sun. Rent includes electricity, gas, and water. Modern appliances: Refrigerator, gas oven/range, Built-in Microwave, Disposal, Dishwasher. Also: Pets negotiable, smoking isn't (sorry). 
Terrific Building (no exaggeration): Potomac Place Towers. Pool, gym (cardio, aerobics, and weights), computer room,, community room, 24 hour concierge/doorperson. Coin-Operated Laundry with built in library/book exchange. Three Metro stops: Waterfront (Green), 3 minutes; Federal Center SW (Blue/Orange/Silver),

Description: Super unit in boutique pre-war building on one of the prettiest streets in Kalorama, cusp of Adams Morgan, light filled, southern exposure, high ceilings, recessed lighting, hardwood floors, huge closets, updated kitchen with all stainless appliances.Very neutral and furnished.

Services: * Laundry Facilities

Description:
Rent includes all utilities. Pristine, newly painted 1 bedroom room, living room with L shaped dining area, granite counters in Kitchen, large walk in closet, as well as hall closet.
Highly secure building with 24 hour desk, in site resident manager and engineers.
Swimming pool, rooftop patio, 7 day convenience store plus dry cleaning services on first floor. Community laundry with large library. Close to bus stop.
Off street parking available for $100/month

Description: This newly renovated one bedroom condo is located in the heart of Washington's bustling Columbia Heights neighborhood. Brand new wooden floors, cabinets, and marble fixtures - this stylish, cozy 1BR is perfectly located. 1-block walk to the Columbia Heights metro (quick trip to the White House/Nat'l Mall, U St. and Dupont Circle), restaurants, bars and beautiful Meridian Hill Park - the location can't be beat. Washer/Dryer, dishwasher, bedroom fan in-unit, including central air. Avail ASAP Furnished (or unfurnished). 55" HD TV, pull-out couch, modern marble coffee table, antique dresser, cabinet, and bed. $1,995 monthly. Water/Trash fees included.

Description:
Close to downtown D.C. 5 blocks to Metro train stations. Easy street parking.
Unfurnished 2-bdrm apartment in a 4-unit row house, 2nd floor.
The apartment has Central HVAC. Updated with dishwasher and in-unit laundry machine.
Rent is $1750/Month plus utility.
Photos:
https://www.flickr.com/x/t/0095009/gp/52029828@N05/2H4P88/
Available 10/1.
Inquire by email with the following information:
OCCUPATION / CURRENT RESIDENCE / REASON TO MOVE / MOVE IN DATE

Description:
Walk everywhere! Live close to NY Avenue Metro Station, NOMA, Bloomingdale Restaurants, and so much more.....
Two blocks to Big Bear Cafe. Stone's throw to Pub and The People, Firehouse, Bloomingdale Farmers Market and so much more...
Lovely two bedroom one full bathroom apartment that is close to everything. Walk, Metro, Uber or take Capital Bikeshare in this convenient neighborhood basement apartment that is close to everything. Perfect for a couple or a single professional who wants to be close to downtown, NOMA, Brookland, Bloomingdale, U Street, H Street and Union Market. 
Details:
2 Bedrooms
1 full bathroom with tub
Granite countertops
Stainless Steel Appliances
Stackable Washer and Dryer
Storage Space
Carpeted Bedroom
Separate Entrance
Hardwood Floors
Ceramic Tile
Modern Fixtures
32" LCD Television in Living Area (stays with rental)
Brushed Nickel Fixtures
Recessed lights
Individual Climate controlled Heat and A/C
Front and Rear separate entrances

Description: Large Georgetown one bedroom in the perfect location! Located directly across from Rose Park -- a short and easy walk to restaurnats, bars and shopping of Georgetown and DuPont Circle (Red Line Metro). Hardwood floors. Tons of sunlight. Park views. Access to shared patio with grill. Washer/dryer. Large kitchen with stainless steal appliances and gas stove. Play and relax in Rose Park - tennis, basketball, playgrounds, jogging trail, weekly farmers market.

Description:
Bright and Sunny 1BD/1BA Nestled in Quaint Van Ness Neighborhood
UNIT FEATURES -Hardwood Floors -Lots of sunlight -Open floor-plan -Loads of closet space -Washer/dryer in unit -Gas fireplace -Private balcony -Elevator access 
AREA FEATURES -Minutes from Giant Grocery -Blocks from Cleveland Park Shops/Restaurants (St. Arnold's Mussle Bar, Cleveland Bar and Grill, Ripple, Fat Pete's BBQ, Spices Sushi, Nanny Obrien's, Vace Delicatessan, Ardeo, Allero, Indique, Medium Rare, City Fitness, AMC Movie Theater, CVS, Walgreens.) -Minutes from Rock Creek Park and miles of trails -Easy access to Rock Creek Parkway and minutes from Downtown via Connecticut Ave -Steps from the Red Line (DuPont Circle, Metro Center, China Town) -Located on the L1 and L2 bus lines with service from Foggy Bottom to Chevy Chase

Description: This one bedroom unit features plenty of natural light, wood flooring, central air and heat, a washer/dryer, electric range, garbage disposal and ample kitchen counter space. Available for move-in late October or November 1! The unit is located in the Petworth neighborhood is 1.5 miles from the Georgia Avenue Petworth Metro Station. Bus routes include the E4 (Riggs Park/Fort Totten/Friendship Heights), 70 and 79 (Archives/Silver Spring). Local restaurants nearby include Taqueria Districto Federal, Culture Coffee and Crown Bakery. Walmart Supercenter, the nearest grocery store, is half a mile away. Tenants are responsible for electricity and gas. Small pets allowed (dog or cat under 45 pounds). There is an application fee of $50 per applicant. The minimum lease term is for one year. The minimum credit score required is 700 for this property. The security deposit is equal to one month's rent. There is a non-refundable pet fee of $300. Tenants with Scout Properties gain access to our online portal where they can pay rent, view lease documents, and submit maintenance requests. This rental unit is professionally managed by Scout Properties, a leading rental property management firm located in the Brookland neighborhood of Washington, D.C. Please contact Khadijah Anderson to schedule a showing!

Description:
PARKING FOR TWO CARS IN BACK.
Master bedroom with balcony, jacuzzi tub with separate shower. Movie room in basement.
New carpet, paint, and floors.
Walk to shops, restaurants, in the heart of historic Georgetown.
Across from Volta park with tennis, swimming, basketball, and baseball diamond, all 
FREE to Volta residents.

Description:
Welcome to The Rock Creek Gateway Condominium! This unit is a sunny 1 bedroom 1 bathroom, 534 sq. ft., hardwood floors, carpet in bedroom, ample closet space.
Walk to Walmart and restaurants and shops along Georgia Avenue. One block from intersection of Georgia Avenue and Missouri. Easy walk to Rock Creek Park for outdoor recreation. Ample street parking for guests.
1 BD/ 1 BA
Hardwood floors; carpet in BD
W/D facilities
Dishwasher
Secured entry
Pets case-by-case
Tenant pays electric & phone/cable
On-Site Add'l Storage Unit (great for keeping seasonal items & luggage!)
Email Only for a showing! Phone calls will not be returned.
First month & Security required. $29.99 Application Fee per applicant for Credit & Background check.

Description:
Kenyon Square is a contemporary mixed use condo building that was awarded the "Best Mid-Rise Condominium by the National Association of Home Builders for 2008." Located on Kenyon Street between 13th and 14th Street in Columbia Heights, Kenyon Square offers 153 units across its eight stories. Completed in 2007, amenities range from a 24-hour front desk, a rooftop deck with panoramic views of the City, an outdoor grill and sundeck to a landscaped courtyard and patio. The building also includes underground parking as well as a Starbucks, FedEx Kinko's, MedSPa, and an assortment of dining options on the first floor. Kenyon Square is within walking distance of the Columbia Heights Metro Station.
Call Jason TO View 703 400-2022

Description:
English Basement available for October. I am leaving sometime between October 6-10th so I am flexible with the move in date.
Great location for all types of activities. Dupont circle, U street and Adams Morgan are all within walking distance of this apartment. That being said, there are a myriad of places to eat, have a drink or go for a workout. 
You will be sharing the basement with another male roommate, so this space is only for males. The living room is the first room when you walk in, along with the kitchen (see the attached photos). Your room is the first room closest to the front door.
The room is 8 x 10 feet space with a built-in closet. There is enough space for a dresser, and a full bed. A small desk could also fit. 
The room is available for $1345 per month. Utilities are not included, but they are typically around $100 a month. Washer and Dryer are available in the apartment
I'm sad to leave such an amazing place but I hope to find a great replacement.

Description:
Modern rowhouse on a convenient block in the heart of Petworth. All new, green renovation. Get the best of both worlds with the charm of old architectural details and the conveniences of modern technology. 
Featured in Petworth News, this rare find has three bedrooms and three full bathrooms, including a gorgeous master bedroom suite with incredible light and a sweeping view. Enjoy morning coffee or tea on the stylish front porch or the deck overlooking the garden. Make dinner with fresh herbs, veggies and fruits from the garden in a beautiful open kitchen with quartz countertops, a gas stove and convection oven, energy efficient refrigerator and dishwasher, and a reverse osmosis water filter.
Live comfortably year around with central air conditioning, radiator heating and ceiling fans. Save on electricity costs with 16 solar panels installed on the roof. Other key features include: washer/dryer on first floor and security cameras in front and rear on the house. 
Easy walk to the Petworth metro station, Yes! Organic Market, Grant Circle, and Upshur Street restaurants. Street parking with no zone sticker required. Nearby bus lines: 60, H8 and 64. 
Six month to one year lease term preferred. One month security deposit. Rent is $3,500. An application with references and background and credit check required.

Description:
Walk everywhere! Live close to NY Avenue Metro Station, NOMA, Bloomingdale Restaurants, and so much more.....
Two blocks to Big Bear Cafe. Stone's throw to Pub and The People, Firehouse, Bloomingdale Farmers Market and so much more...
Lovely two bedroom one full bathroom apartment that is close to everything. Walk, Metro, Uber or take Capital Bikeshare in this convenient neighborhood basement apartment that is close to everything. Perfect for a couple or a single professional who wants to be close to downtown, NOMA, Brookland, Bloomingdale, U Street, H Street and Union Market. 
Details:
2 Bedrooms
1 full bathroom with tub
Granite countertops
Stainless Steel Appliances
Stackable Washer and Dryer
Storage Space
Carpeted Bedroom
Separate Entrance
Hardwood Floors
Ceramic Tile
Modern Fixtures
32" LCD Television in Living Area (stays with rental)
Brushed Nickel Fixtures
Recessed lights
Individual Climate controlled Heat and A/C
Front and Rear separate entrances
