Description:
Brand new, modern studio one block from Logan Circle, minutes from 14th Street, Shaw, and City Center. Just a short walk to Mount Vernon Metro, major office buildings, and grocery stores.
Contemporary building featuring wide plank flooring, Bosch stainless steel appliances (a GAS cooktop!), dishwasher, oven, front-loading washer/dryer, Caesarstone kitchen counters, backsplash, and more! 
Building amenities include a stunning rooftop terrace with gas grill, two elevators, bicycle storage, and secured package room. The unit is fully furnished as shown in the photos including, but not limited to the following items:
- Full Size Sleeper Sofa
- TV
- Collapsable Kitchen Table with Folding Chairs
- Coffee Table, Rug, and Art work
Gas and water included in rent.

Description:
Great price! Sunny and Well Maintained one bedroom/one bath 768 square foot condo in sought after Ordway Gardens on top floor. 
Located one block from Cleveland Park Metro on Red line and in the heart of Cleveland Park's restaurants, Uptown Theatre and close to Rock Creek Park and National Zoo. 
Freshly painted, A/C, Heat, GE washer and dryer in unit, dishwasher, garbage disposal, gas range. 
Spacious living room with windows over looking trees and a separate dining room that can also be used as an office. Windows in every room that provides natural light. 
$1685 monthly rent includes gas, heat, water, garbage removal. Electricity is not included. Security deposit is $1500.
No fees added (i.e. Move in, application, etc).

Description:
Available immediately - Fantastic 2BR/2BA + private balcony on high floor, storage unit AND ideally located, 1-car garage prkg space near elevators and ramp. This end/corner unit is approx 1150 SF and features an open floor plan, new carpet in bedrooms, new hardwood floors, granite countertops! More?? How about 2 carpeted WALK-IN closets, gas cooking, 2 soaking tubs, new stacking W/D, very nice fitness center in bldg, large separate storage unit AND a walk score of 100! 1441 Rhode Island Ave, NW is a stones throw away from the P St Whole Foods and 14th Street's fine dining and theater. This unit rents for $3,800 per month. Pets negotiable. 
Contact Chad to inquire or schedule an appointment. 
Available immediately!

Description:
In the heart of NW DC (Cleveland Park/ Van Ness), this 770 SQFT end unit condo features a large, elegant living room and separate sun room/office. Hardwood floors throughout. A separate dining space off of a bright kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Welcoming entry foyer and a large bedroom with plantation shutters. Four great closets - two in bedroom are renovated by California Closets. Great light from large windows in every room.
Steps to two METRO stops and buses, Rock Creek Park, restaurants, theaters, library and grocery stores. Enjoy 24 hour gym in building. On street parking is never an issue

Description:
This apartment is a recently renovated, two bedroom, one centrally located bathroom apartment, complete with hardwood flooring, 9 foot tall ceilings, in unit washer and dryer, and stainless steel appliances. This apartment may come fully furnished or standard at the discretion of the renter. 
The utilities are shared between the Landlord and Tenant, with Tenant responsible for the electric, and the Landlord responsible for the gas and water. Off Street parking in tenant's only carport available. Just minutes walk to H street and Gallaudet University.

Description:
Beautifully maintained and privately owned 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo nestled in between Meridian Hill Park and bustling 14th Street, just four blocks north of U street. 
Apartment is available immediately. 
Highlights include:
- open concept living, kitchen and dining room area
- hardwood and ceramic tile flooring throughout the unit as well as 9' ceilings and crown molding 
- granite counter tops and ceramic tile back splash
- high-efficiency washer and dryer in unit
- kitchen boasts upgraded stainless steel appliances 
- access to roof deck with panoramic views of DC and VA as well as a courtyard with grills and community space 
- assigned indoor parking space
RENTAL FEATURES
________________________________________
* 	Living room
* 	Dining room
* 	Walk-in closet
* 	Range / Oven
* 	Refrigerator
* 	Dishwasher
* 	Microwave
* 	Garbage disposal
* 	Stainless steel appliances
* 	Freezer
* 	Hardwood floors
* 	Ceramic tile floor
* 	Granite counters
* 	Assigned indoor parking space
COMMUNITY FEATURES
________________________________________
* 	Elevator
* 	Secured entry with intercom
* 	Controlled access
* 	Gated entry
* 	Doorman (M-F, 11am - 8pm)
* 	Bicycle racks
* 	Disability access
* 	Near transportation (14th Street bus lines, U Street and Columbia Heights Metro, Bikeshare and more) 
* 	Barbecue grills in the community courtyard
* 	Guest parking available 
* 	Community room

Description:
***Discounted monthly rent possible, for longer then 12 month lease.***
Live steps away from restaurants, bars, and shops of the most desirable neighborhood in the district. Dine at nearby cafes, enjoy the history of DC, or experience the trendy nightlife of the area. 
The Rutherford building is minutes walk away from 14th and U street attractions, convention center, WholeFood, Giant, entertainment and many other urban conveniences. You have 4 metro stops to choose from with McPherson being the closest. 
The unit has hardwood floor everywhere and wall-to-wall carpeting in the bedroom. You'll have the view of the street through floor to ceiling windows. The apartment is energy efficient and features central AC with Nest thermostat, walk-in closet and plenty of extra storage, washer/dryer in-unit, kitchen island and granite-top counters, stainless steel appliances, generous kitchen cabinets and more.

Description:
A true FURNISHED one bedroom apartment in The President Condominiums at 2141 Eye Street NW. 
This furnished corner unit has a galley kitchen with electric stove, garbage disposal, refrigerator, and dishwasher! There's air conditioning, a bathroom with the best water pressure in DC, and windows wrapping the walls the apartment - there's a window in every room! 
The living/dining room is large, and the bedroom easily fits a queen bed and dressers. Plenty of storage space in the walk-through closet. 
BUILDING: 
The President has a front desk staffed 24/7 that will sign for packages and watches the front door. There are 6 washers/dryers in the basement, and I've never had to wait to use them. The building is wired for Comcast and RCN. (You can look up reviews of The President, they're pretty accurate. In short, it's a pretty solid building in a great location - this place is a good value.) The building is mostly studio/efficiency units, but this is one of the biggest apartments in the building, a coveted corner 1-bedroom. 
LOCATION: 
The apartment is in a fantastic location, across the street from the Foggy Bottom Whole Foods Market. It's situated at the north end of George Washington University's campus, you're only steps away from the IMF, World Bank, State Department, and White House. Transportation is a breeze - The apartment is one block away from the Foggy Bottom metro station (blue and orange lines) & bus stops (including the Circulator), and there are two sets of Capital Bikeshare docks within half a block. You're only a 5-15 minute walk from Dupont, Georgetown, West End, and downtown DC. 
PARKING: 
If you have a car, the apartment does not include a spot, but it's Zone 2 parking, and you should be able to find a spot within 2 blocks of the apartment, especially after Whole Foods closes at 10pm. 
LEASE TERMS/FEES: 
The rent is $1,850/month, and includes water and trash. The tenant is responsible for electric and phone/cable/internet. Electric depends on use, but we have averaged $40-80 a month. 
There's an application fee of $50.00 per applicant, and you'll need to provide first month's rent + security deposit equal to one month's rent upon application approval and leasing signing. 
Property Management: 
The rental is professionally managed by EJC Property Management, LLC . We can be contacted at 866-765-9981, ext. 1012, Monday through Friday, from 9am to 5pm. BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.
Viewings 
By appointment only (call 866-765-9981 x1012) 
Availability 
Immediate
THIS ONE WILL GO FAST!

Description:
LOCATION: 649 Columbia Rd NW EB Washington DC 20001
NEIGHBORHOOD/BUILDING HIGHLIGHTS
*  Combining urban living with unique contemporary style and comfort gives you a perfect place to call home.
*  In the heart of the Columbia Heights in Washington DC, Columbia is situated just off Georgia Ave, only a short distance from both the green and yellow lines at Columbia Heights Metro and Petworth Metro
*  WALKABLE, it is perfectly situated for shopping, dining, city living, with many gyms and yoga studios to maintain positive and healthy lifestyle.
*  Four blocks to Columbia Heights Metro Station, where you will also discover a plethora of restaurants, shops, stores, and eateries, including Best Buy, CVS, Chipotle, Marshalls, Panda Express, Cava Grill, Z Burger, Target, Giant, as well as Saturday/Wednesday Farmers’ Market.
*  Easy access to Downtown DC with bus lines on Georgia Ave, 11th, 14th, and 16th, all providing excellent access to downtown. The Capital Beltway is in easy driving distance and can take you to all points in Maryland/Northern Virginia.
*  Recently received national attention through the New York Times for its eclectic collection of privately owned restaurants and businesses, 11th Street has quickly created a name for itself as 'The Hip Strip' provided by the Maple, Meridian Pint, The Coupe, RedRocks, El Chucho, Room 11, Wonderland Ballroom, and much more to discover.
INTERIOR HIGHLIGHTS
*  Brand new everything in this English Basement apartment, including floors, stainless steel appliances, paint, paint, countertops, and cabinets!
*  Spacious iving room to the front of the home is split with kitchen and dining.
*  Kitchen features gorgeous hardwood cabinet and granite countertop space, stainless steel appliances and access to private fenced in backyard.
*  Master bedroom to the back of the home has dual closet space and terrific natural light.
*  Middle bedroom has excellent closet space and direct access to the back of the home.
THINGS TO KNOW
*  Available NOW
*  Pets considered with damage deposit
*  Tenant responsible for Electric, 1/3 Water (shared with Main level), Cable/Internet
*  Shared Parking Pad for 1 car
*  Washer/dryer in unit

Description:
*Available October 1st*
This bright, simply-furnished one-bedroom apartment is conveniently located in the Bader Condominium, within walking distance to Foggy Bottom metro, GWU and GW Hospital, World Bank, Trader Joe's and a stroll to Georgetown and the Waterfront. (See www.badercondominium.org for more building info and pix.)
The apartment features a bedroom with walk-in closet, living room, and dining nook. A courtyard and rooftop deck are available for your enjoyment. 
Minimum lease is six months; first month's rent and security deposit are due at signing. 
*do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers*

Description:
[2 bedroom, 2 ½ bath house, 1 open room available for rent] 11/1/2017 (possibly earlier) 
For $1300 you get: 1 bedroom (14ftX8ft) in 2 bedroom non-smoking house, Private bathroom, Private balcony, Washer/Dryer, ½ utilities cost (avg $120/month), Street parking, Dog therapy; (6 yr. old boxer currently lives here, no other pets allowed), Outside Space: Grill, gas fire pit, movie/screen projector, Fully furnished kitchen and living room, Central A/C & heat
Additional details: This room (14ftx8ft) fits a full bed and has an attached balcony from the bedroom and two skylights overhead. 
The room will be unfurnished, but the rest of house is furnished. The closet space is small, however, there is room for a dresser + clothing cabinet. Closet downstairs and plenty of room to create additional storage space if needed. You have your own full bath adjacent to the room.
Female, 33, gov’t professional who leads a low key home life. For fun; I take yoga, hike, travel or go to a concert. I’m always down for a live music show. 
If this sounds like the place for you, please respond with a little bit about yourself (current job, hobbies, age) and I’d love to set up a time to tour the house and meet you.

Description:
Spacious 1 Bedroom / 1 Bath Apartment in Historic Bishop's Gate. A Very Quiet Oasis in the Heart of Bustling Dupont/Logan Circle Area of DC
*** Garage Parking Space and Storage Unite $250/mo. additional ***
Third-floor condo has 741 square feet of living space 
Conveniently located on the Green Line: 1/2 block west of 14th St., 2 blocks east of 17th St., and 2 1/2 blocks south of the U St.
Spitting distance to hot 14th street and U street corridor restaurants, shopping, theater, health clubs and more. 
Property Description
* Secure, Gated Community
* Highly-Desired Garaged Parking Space ($250/mo. additional)

* Fireplace
* Hardwood Floors
* High 11' Ceilings
* Large Windows With Top-Up/Bottom-Down Shades
* Master BDR has Sun-Block Shades

* Gourmet Kitchen With Stainless GE Profile Appliances
* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Utility Closet
* Full-Size Bosch Washer/Dryer in Unit

* Parking
* High Speed Internet Available
* Gate
* Storage Space
* Bike Storage
* Quiet Courtyard
* BBQ/Picnic Area
* Elevator
* Near Public Transit
* Package Receiving
* Laundry
* Controlled Access

Description:
Open Saturday 9/9 12:00-1:30. Deluxe 2 story town house style apartment with 1,353 sq.ft of living space and private entrance and GARAGE PARKING for one car. Features 2 bedrooms + den, 2.5 baths, gleaming hardwood floors, chef-style kitchen with built-in island and granite counter-tops, private patio, W/D in unit, huge closets, and garage parking. Upscale amenities include a concierge; club room with wet bar; large community landscaped courtyard with waterfall, shared gas grills, and fire pit; and guest parking. The roof deck is spectacular with lounge seating and sweeping DC views. The condo building, named "The Fedora", is adjacent to Meridian Hill Park and part of the Columbia Heights/U Street urban village. Only a 5 min walk to U Street metro, 8 min to Columbia Heights, and within walking distance of Adams Morgan/Logan Circle/Dupont Circle, D.C's hottest neighborhoods.
Tenant pays utilities

Description: Spacious 2 BR/2.5BA townhouse style condo unit with galley kitchen, and newly re-tiled bathrooms, just re-finished hardwood floors and floor-to-ceiling windows bringing in lots of natural light. This unit comes with parking space – a rare find, and also offers in-house washer and dryer, storage basement CAC and lots of storage space. Enjoy being in the heart of the New Downtown SW Waterfront in the Carrolsburg Condominium community with manicured lawns trimmed with beautiful trees and flowers. This home offers convenient access to many other parts of DC and surrounding area via the Waterfront (Green Line) Metro Station and easy access to I-395. Carrollsburg is within walking distance of many stores, restaurants and attractions including the waterfront Promenade, the Washington Marina, the Maine Avenue Fish Market, Arena Stage, Nationals Park, The Yards Park and District Wharf (opening in October 2017). Reserved parking Space is an additional $175 per month.

Services: * Laundry Facilities

Description: Cute Junior 1BR unit in a quiet, well-run condo building, with private entrance right across the street from the US Supreme Court. Enjoy the perfect location by walking to any of the many popular restaurants on close-in Capitol Hill, or by walking one block to the US Capitol, one block to the Library of Congress, or three blocks to either the Orange, Silver and Blue lines at Capitol South Metro or the Red line at Union Station. Enter this front-facing, terrace-level unit from the front walk directly into the bright condo unit. Includes brick-tiled floors, newer kitchenette, a nook perfect for a desk and chair, a small bedroom behind a privacy wall and a comfortable-sized living room.

Description:
Union Row: One Bedroom+ Separate Den, 2 Full Baths and 1 Parking Spot
Hello,
Our one bedroom + separate den and 2 full bathroom loft style condo available for rent in September in PN Hoffman's award winning Union Row building. Located in the center of the U Street area, this spacious unit faces out over 14th Street. It has an open floor plan with exposed ductwork, extra high (9 foot) concrete ceilings and floor to ceiling windows. Hardwood floors, granite countertops, two Porcelanosa bathrooms and a spacious kitchen island make it an ideal living space. The unit is nearly 900 square feet in size with maple hardwood floors in the den, living room and kitchen areas, and Berber carpet in the bedroom. There is a full sized stackable washer and dryer in the unit. 
Rent is $3100 per month + utilities. Included in the rental price is one oversized parking space in the parking garage under the building (direct elevator access from the building into the garage). 
Union Row was built in 2007 by PN Hoffman. It is located at 2125 14th Street N.W. - between V and W Streets - just two blocks from the U Street metro station. Amenities include a 24-hour front desk concierge, reception area, business center/lounge, rooftop deck and on-site security. The location is fabulous - located in the center of all the shops, restaurants, entertainment and nightlife the U street corridor offers. Yes! Organic, Trader Joe's and Whole Foods market, the YMCA, Compass Rose, Le Diplomate, Tico, the Black Cat, Columbia Heights (including Target, BestBuy), the Studio theater, and many other places of interest are all just a short walk away. 99 walk score!
Please contact me if you are interested.
Thanks!

Description:
This gorgeous 1 bedroom + den with 2 full bathrooms is located right in the middle of Logan Circle and 14th St near all of DC's best nightlife, right at the corner 14th and Q St NW. Walking distance to downtown, Dupont Circle, U Street and right down the street from Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Le Diplomate, Pearl Dive Oyster Bar, Doi Moi, Ted's Bulletin and many more! Walk score of 95, transit score of 96, and bike score of 92.
Apartment Features:
Floor to ceiling windows
1 bedroom + den featuring master bedroom with attached bathroom
2 full bathrooms 
Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and gas powered stove
Juliet balcony
Washer & Dryer in unit
Rooftop terrace with 360º sweeping views with BBQ and dining cabana
Secured entryway with fob access, secured package drop off for UPS and USPS

Description: Newly renovated English Basement in a gorgeous Victorian townhouse right in the heart of U Street. Renovations were recently completed on this spacious and ideally located English Basement. The unit features a massive living room, a spacious kitchen – outfitted with the latest kitchen appliances (double electric oven range, top of the line dishwasher, microwave and refrigerator), a sizable bedroom, and beautiful bathroom. The unit also includes its own washer/dryer unit and is accompanied by a large gorgeous private patio – which includes amazing bistro string lights, a gas and electric grill. This is a terrific location: Steps from the extremely popular 14th Street (but just far enough away to avoid the noise), an easy walk to DuPont, Adams Morgan, Columbia Heights and close to Trader Joe’s, gyms, (Vida Fitness, Washington Sports Club, CrossFit, and a local YMCA) yoga classes (i.e. YogaWorks and Yoga District), Soul Cycle, amazing coffee shops (The Wydon Coffee Bar and Peregrine Espresso), and great restaurants (way too many to list). The house has a walk score of 99, and is WALKING DISTANCE to downtown DC jobs, and there are numerous bus lines (54, 52, S1, S2, S4, S9) to downtown (if you don’t want to walk). Also close to the Yellow and Green metro lines (and a reasonable walk from Red). The unit also literally steps out to a bike path, thus if you are a biker, this is an additional plus.

Description:
Modern bright and immaculate corner condo apartment. Short walk to Subway and enjoy the area nightlife and the convenience of nearby grocery stores, drugstores, boutiques, and salons. @ the U Street corridor.
Located on the 3rd floor, soundproof and super quiet.

Description:
LOCATION: 5842 SHERIER PLACE NW WASHINGTON DC 20016
COMMUNITY/NEIGHBORHOOD HIGHLIGHTS
*  Fabulous Palisades location on quaint residential block near several parks and ideally situated just off of MacArthur Blvd.
*  One block to bus stop with direct routes to downtown, Foggy Bottom/Georgetown, NW metro stations and Bethesda. Nearby expressways (Canal/Clara Barton, Dalecarlia, Whitehurst) provides car access to Maryland, Virginia, the Beltway and Downtown DC in minutes.
*  Half a block to the Capital Crescent Trail connected to miles and miles of nature trails. Take the stunning and safe daily bike to work along the Potomac. Walk along the C&O Canal to Fletcher's Cove, or bike north to Great Falls. 
*  Close to AU, Georgetown, Sibley Hospital, DHS, embassies and so on
HOME HIGHLIGHTS
*  4BR/3BA and over 2,000 square feet of living space in this charming storybook home with high ceilings, hardwood floors, and craftsman wood features throughout.
*  Expansive front yard and garden; fenced backyard with deck; and a one car detached garage. 
*  2BR plus full BA on each floor, plus full bath in basement
*  GoldPV solar rating, central AC, washer/dryer upstairs. 
*  Living room with lovely wood burning fireplace, upright piano, and custom built-ins 
*  Large eat in kitchen with ample countertop and cabinet space 
*  Second level features two large bedrooms with terrific closet space.
*  Partially-finished basement features additional storage and space.
THINGS TO KNOW
*  Available NOW
*  Tenant responsible for Gas, Electric, Water, Cable/Internet
*  1 car garage
*  Pets considered

Description: Danbury Apartments located on Danbury Street SE between First & S. Capitol Streets is a quaint community consisting of ten (40) one bedroom apartment homes situated only three blocks from the District border with Prince Georges County, MD. We are just one mile from the MGM Hotel & Casino and Gaylord Hotel at National Harbor with an abundance of retail shops, restaurants, bars, amusements and marina activities. A brand new park and recreation area is currently underway just across the street from us and is scheduled to open this Fall 2017. Give Ms. Hubbard a call today for additional information. She will be delighted to assist you.

Description: Danbury Apartments at Galveston Place is a quaint community consisting of ten (10) four bedroom apartment homes situated only three blocks from the District border with Prince Georges County, MD. We are just one mile from the MGM Hotel & Casino and Gaylord Hotel at National Harbor with an abundance of retail shops, restaurants, bars, amusements and marina activities. A brand new park and recreation area is currently underway just across the street from us and is scheduled to open this Fall 2017. Give Ms. Hubbard a call today for additional information. She will be delighted to assist you.

Description: Large sunny NEWLY RENOVATED 1 bedroom with free reserved parking space and all utilities included! 2 new CAC HVAC units installed in 2016. Across from Palisades Deli and a few steps to Hardy Park and Recreation Center. Short walk to Georgetown Potomac River, C&O Canal, towpath, reservoir trail and several restaurants including, Kotobuki, Makoto Blacksalt and Seventh Hill Pizza. Excellent schools also within walking distance.

Description:
H Street living without breaking your wallet. BRAND NEW 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom Apartment. Hardwood floors, SS & marble Kitchen, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer, Shower Jets in the Bathroom, Central A/C & Heat, New Kitchen Cabinets and Appliances. EVERYTHING BRAND NEW. Right on H Street, 2 walking blocks from over 20 bars and shops. 3 minutes walk to the free DC Street Car that takes you to Union Station. Great Location. Legal rental unit that just passed DC inspection. $1,850/month + Gas & Electricity. Landlord pays for water.
Please note, this apartment is an efficiency 2br/2ba (600 sqft) which explains the low price comparing to $2000+ for a 1 bedroom in the area. The master bedroom fits a queen bed and the smaller bedroom fits a full size bed
Looking for at least 6mo. Background + credit check.

Description:
Uncommon living in Brookland. DC's first shipping container residential building is uniquely assembled using repurposed steel shipping containers, merged together to form one of the most memorable multi-family buildings in all of DC. Comfort and convenience highlights this property as there are only four units and you are located less than 5 minutes from Brookland metro, Busboys and Poets, Catholic U. and a host of restaurants and nightlife attractions. 
* 6 bedroom and 6 bathrooms in each unit ensuring privacy for every resident ($833 per bedroom)
* Large restaurant style kitchen
* Stainless steel appliances 
* Full size stackable washer and dryer
* Balconies (select rooms)
* Hardwood floors
* Floor to ceiling windows
* Heated Stairwell 
* 24 hour emergency maintenance 
Call now and become a part of DC's best kept secret!
No Cats Allowed (RLNE2514573) Other Amenities - Other- maximum one dog per unit. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description: Located in the heart of Foggy Bottom and campus of the George Washington University, a modern contemporary one bedroom/one bath unit located on a high floor offered in a full service buidling. The apartment on the 8th floor has hardwood floors, dish washer, microwave, 5 burner gas range/oven, central air/heat and all utilities are included except for cable TV/internet. The building features on site repair service and has a full service front office/desk and security. Additionally, the building is located within two blocks of the Metro and Trader Joe's and Whole Foods. The building is pre-wired for internet and cable TV and has a roof top pool and terrace, laundry rooms on each floor. Also, there is on-site fitness facilities and community room available to all residents. The unit is available for lease starting on/about after July 1st for $2298/month with a minimum of a one year lease. Indoor parking is available at an additional cost and seperate lease agreement or can be part of the enitire lease agreement. Discount is offered if parking and unit are leased together. One month security deposit required with first months rent upons execution of lease agreement. Building requires a move-in fee paid directly to the building management upon execution of lease agreement and master key depost. Also, there are no pets allowed as well as sub-leasing of the unit.

Description:
U Street Area, Completely Renovated One Bedroom, Short Term, Parking, Yard $1,850 a month.
Bright, spacious, first floor apartment in two-unit town house with yard. Off street parking. 3 to 6 month lease. Three blocks to U Street and Metro, restaurants and shopping. Just renovated, with two private entrances, this roomy one bedroom boasts granite kitchen counters, hard wood floors, new stainless steel appliances and its own energy-efficient washer and dryer and dishwasher. Near the corner of 11th Street NW and Florida Ave.

Description: Best location in Capitol Hill. Close to metro, Union Station, H Street Corridor, Parks, etc. Enjoy this beautiful 3 bedroom, 2.5 baths in Cap Hill as soon as this month. Available for long term or short term. Great place for law students, staffers, or young professionals. Walking distance to restaurants, bars, parks, gym, Georgetown University Law, Giant super market and lots of bus stops and bike share stations. There is one master bedroom with private master bathroom, and 2 other bedrooms and one bathroom in the second floor. The first floor has a great kitchen, stainless steel appliances, wood floors, 1/2 bathroom, and exit to a two level wood deck and grill patio area. The house comes unfurnished, but you have a choice on the patio furniture and grill. Small pet lease is also available. Off street Parking. Short term available.

Boutique building with elegant lobby and spectacular rooftop deck. Condo has all the bells and whistles (hardwood floors, washer dryer, gas fireplace, granite kitchen and baths, stainless steel appliances, plenty of closets, two large bedrooms, etc. etc. etc.)

Description:
Spacious 1 Bedroom / 1 bath condo offered at $1840 / mo. Located in the much sought after Garfield Condominiums in Chevy Chase, Washington, DC. This property boasts a recently renovated kitchen with granite countertops, stainless appliances, separate living and dining, and refinished hardwood flooring, and rooftop deck providing spectacular views of fireworks and monuments. Full bath and large Master bedroom with ample storage throughout. Beautiful views of the surrounding area and the avenue. 24 -hour attendant / concierge, on-site manager and maintenance staff, gym and rooftop terrace. Utilities included - electricity, gas, water, trash and sewage. 
Furnished. Smoke-Free Building.
Connecticut Ave bus at front door, Friendship Heights Metro near by, Two blocks to Bike Share/Zip Car across street, ample on-street parking. Garage parking is available. 15 minutes to NIH, 10 minutes to American Univ.
Walk a few blocks to Starbucks, Politics and Prose, Avalon Theatre, Library, Post Office, Safeway, McGruder's, CVS, & many Restaurants, Mazza Gallerie and Microsoft.
One year lease minimum. Sorry -- No pets

Description:
OPEN HOUSE WEDNESDAY OCTOBER 4TH FROM 6PM-7PM. PLEASE RSVP
-STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES
-WALK IN SHOWER WITH ITALIAN TILE
-HARDWOOD FLOORS -CENTRAL AC/HEAT
-LARGE COMMON ROOF DECK Beautifully renovated, 1 bedroom 1 bathroom. Historic walk-up building with tons of character. Unit contains high end kitchen with Granite countertops, sleek backsplash tile and stainless steel whirlpool appliances. The bathroom contains a walk in shower with Italian tile. Great natural light with hardwood floors throughout. Building contains large roof deck and free of charge washer/dryer in the common area. Amazing location, just a ten minute walk to Trader Joe's and the U street metro stop. Steps away from Three Fifty Bakery & Coffee Bar, Vida Fitness, and tons of restaurants and bars on U street.

Description: Named after the American Civil War Colonel, Robert Gould Shaw, who commanded the first African American regiment in the US Army in 1863 and is the namesake of the Shaw neighborhood, The Colonel is meant to honor the significance of the units contributions to our nation. The original structure dates back to the turn of the century, though the renovations are forward thinking, like the buildings namesake. Residents will appreciate the style and surroundings, the attention to detail, and the way in which the building commands a presence in this unique DC neighborhood.

Description: The newly opened Monroe Street Market brings three distinct styles of living to the eclectic Brookland neighborhood in Washington, DC. Discover a unique mix of apartments, the arts and vibrant shops and restaurants at the Brookland-CUA Metro Station. Which style is right for you? Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons Win Big at This Year?s NAHB Best in American Living Awards This year, two Bozzuto communities, Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons, won a grand total of three awards at the NAHB Best in American Living Awards (BALA), the nation?s premier award program that recognizes design excellence for the entire residential building industry including single family and multifamily homes communities. The first recognition goes to Monroe Street Market, which was selected as the coveted Multifamily Community of the Year. Additionally, Bozzuto achieved the two top wins in the Urban Mixed Community category for the Platinum and Gold awards for Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons respectively. Congratulations to these amazing developments and all those who worked tirelessly to make them into the award winning communities they are today.

Description: In the heart of downtown Washington, DC, The Apartments at CityCenter anchors a vibrant neighborhood, interconnected with nearby entertainment, shopping and cultural offerings including the Penn Quarter, Verizon Center and nearby theater venues. Enter The Plaza at CityCenter through the new kinetic art Gateway with eye-popping state-of-the-art HD imagery. Dine and drink at upscale yet relaxed eateries including Del Frisco's Double Eagle Steak House and DBGB Kitchen and Bar. Shop the world?s best brands ? kate spade new york, BOSS, Burberry and much more. Walk through The Park at CityCenter and pick up fresh local produce at the weekly farmers market, listen to live music or check out the free fitness training. When it?s time to go home, you?re already there. Elevator up to your perfect getaway, one of the sophisticated residences in two new distinctive buildings at the center of everything that makes DC great.

Description: Live among landmarks. On historic Pennsylvania Avenue, halfway between the U.S. Capitol and the White House, is a select group of superlative urban living spaces: The Newseum Residences. Offering exquisite views, unsurpassed luxury and a prime location across "America's Main Street" from the National Mall, The Newseum Residences combines modern sophistication and cutting-edge technology with upscale comfort and convenience.

Description: Loree Grand at Union Place is the District's new apartment address where the NoMa neighborhood (North of Massachusetts Avenue) meets the 21st century and where the past keeps pace with the future. Named in honor of longtime local resident and community activist Mrs. Loree Murray, it's the place to live, work and play.

Description: Located in the distinctive Foggy Bottom neighborhood and surrounded by a panorama of national treasures, The York and its sister building, Potomac Park, offer residents the advantages of a truly unique address. From your doorstep, the World Bank, State Department and George Washington University are all minutes by foot. Use Capital Bikeshare and peddle over to the Kennedy Center, the National Mall, or Georgetown. Lastly, for those looking to explore the city, our Foggy Bottom apartments are located just a few blocks away from the Foggy Bottom Metro Station, making the entire DC metropolitan area just a short train trip away!

Description: Located in the picturesque Chevy Chase neighborhood, just minutes from the Maryland border, Legation House's Friendship Heights apartments offers residents unparalleled access to the best of metropolitan Washington. Walk to the fine stores and restaurants at Mazza Gallerie, Chevy Chase Pavilion, The Collection at Chevy Chase, and the Shops at Wisconsin Place, or catch the train at the Friendship Heights Metro Station and head downtown for a taste of the world class culture our Nation's Capital is known for from our Chevy Chase apartments.

Description: The much anticipated 1430 W is now open and ready for you. Situated in the vibrant 14th and U Street corridors, the 38 new apartment homes at 1430 W offer affordability, accessibility and comfort all in one location. A Walk Score of 92 makes it a Walker's Paradise and with the U Street Metro Station and over 10 major bus routes just steps away, commuting can't be any easier! Individual climate control with modern Nest Thermostats along with open floor plans, chef islands, stainless steel and energy efficient kitchen appliances and in-home laundry in every apartment provide the residents of 1430 W with the comfort of modern living in a historically significant address. You can have it all at 1430 W.

Refinished hardwood floors fresh paint plantation shutters. Marble luxury baths w/ jacuzzi tub. 2 spectacular roof top terraces. Inviting living room w/ woodburning fireplace. Foyer LR w fireplace DR renovated kitchen & side den on the main level. 3 BRs and 2 renovated FBs up plus fixed stairs to attic storage. LL rec room with 3rd updated FB laundry & office. Lafayette School.

Description:
(240) 997-3585 - Mass. Ave. Heights 4 Bed 3 Bath Row House - Welcome home to your Massachusetts Avenue Heights row house. Complete with four bedrooms, three bathrooms, and a majestic view of the iconic National Cathedral right from your front door, this space is available to lease now.
Enter this 2532 square foot home into the foyer with dining room (14x13) to the left, living room (18x13) to the right, and stairs in between. The lower level includes detailed crown molding throughout, chair rails and bay windows in the dining room, latticed white radiator covers, and a matching white-trimmed fireplace. The dining room provides an open feel with a kitchen pass for convenient entertaining. Matching stainless steel appliances and black granite counter tops further lend utility to the galley kitchen. A cozy sun room (10x8) faces the rear patio and completes the first floor. A fully fenced in brick patio is found off from the sun room, or from a sliding glass door in the living room. The second floor contains three carpeted bedrooms (13x11) (11x9), the master (17x13) with a double vanity master bathroom, and two additional bedrooms. A second full bathroom (also with a double vanity) is accessed from the second floor hall. The third and uppermost floor has the sky-lighted fourth bedroom (24x12) which is carpeted and has built in shelving. The carpeted basement has a common area, full bathroom, a washer and dryer room, and a den (13x9). Located from the basement, the versatile single car garage faces the rear of the home. The rear, off-street driveway can also be used for easy parking. 
If you are seeking to be blocks away from The Washington International, Maret, and The National Cathedral Schools as well as Embassy Row, please call WMS at (240) 997-3585 during normal business hours (or text after hours!) to inquire about this choice location. PLEASE NOTE that this will be an unfurnished rental. Pets case by case.
(RLNE3359050)

Description:
(202) 559-9357 - Spacious 1BR | 1B Condo With Sunroom / Parking - Beautifully renovated 1BR+Sunroom Condo with Parking and Secure Bike Parking Included. 
Spacious condo features: wood floors throughout, expansive windows with multiple exposures facing park, ample closets, modern kitchen with stainless appliances, granite counters, breakfast bar, in-unit washer / dryer. Enclosed sunroom is ideal home office or study. 
Located walking distance to both Columbia Heights and Petworth metro stations. 14th and 16th St bus-lines with easy access to downtown. 
Lease Terms: 
Minimum 12 Month Lease 
1 Month Security Deposit 
$40 Non-Refundable Application Fee Per Applicant 
Utilities: Tenant Pays Electric 
Equal Housing Opportunity
(RLNE3359643) Pet policies - Cats Allowed.

Description:
(202) 656-0082 - Jordon Manor is located near the H Street Corridor in the Atlas District. The Atlas District in NE Washington, DC is a neighborhood in transition. It is becoming a unique neighborhood, blending the flavor of historic DC with new and exciting shopping, food, and nightlife. The vibrant community along H Street is developing into an arts and entertainment district. The revival of this neighborhood was kicked-off with the opening of the Atlas Performing Arts Center, an art-deco 1930s movie theater that was converted into an arts complex with multiple theaters and dance spaces. This isn't just a neighborhood -- it's a community. Interior Amenities: Key code access Central A/C Electric Heating Hard wood floors Microwave Garbage Disposal Dishwasher Free Stack Washer & Dryer (Front Loading) Exhaust Fan Self Cleaning Gas Oven Refrigerator Ask about our "move-in" discounts for teachers, police officers, firefighters, and military personnel!
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE2564482) Other Amenities - Unfurnished, Smoke Free. Appliances - Dishwasher, Air Conditioning, Refrigerator, Range, Oven, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer, Microwave. Lease lengths - 12 Months. Accessibility features - No-Step or Ramped Entry. Details regarding this property's Utilities - Resident Pays Electricity, Resident Pays Gas. Pet policies - No Pets Allowed.

Description:
(202) 559-9357 - Beautifully Renovated AU Park Townhouse - Location! Location! 
This semi-detached AU Park Townhouse features: Formal living and dining rooms, wood floors, recently renovated kitchen with breakfast bar, expansive windows with great light, rear deck ideal for entertaining, three bedrooms upstairs, finished lower-level with office space, and bonus room or 4th bedroom. Off-street parking, side yard, and welcoming front porch complete the package. 
Few blocks to Friendship Heights and Tenleytown dining, shopping, entertainment. Walking distance to Friendship Heights and Tenleytown Metros.
Area schools include: Janney, Deal, and Wilson 
Lease Terms: 
12 Month Lease Minimum 
1 Months Rent Security Deposit 
$40 Non-Refundable Application Fee Per Applicant 
Tenants responsible for electric, gas, water & sewer. 
Sorry, no pets, please!
Equal Housing Opportunity
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE2475323) Other Amenities - Parking. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

(202) 759-7678 - U St 2BR 1BA English Basement with Patio, Spanish Tile, Island Kitchen, Washer & Dryer In Unit - TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING: CALL or TEXT 202-759-7678
Price: $2,495 for an 18 Month Lease OR $2,600 for a 12 Month Lease
Address: 1828 13th Street NW, Unit #1, Washington, DC 20009
Name of Building: 1828 13th St NW Condo
Property Type: Condo
Utilities Included in Rent: Water, Sewer, and Trash
Tenant Utilities: Electricity, Cable, Internet, Phone, Others
Lease Terms: 6 Month Lease Minimum, 18 Month Lease is an Option. 
Pets: Yes, but will be reviewed on a Case by Case basis
Status: ACTIVE – Available Now!
Enjoy Washington, DC's Historic U St neighborhood! Just 1.5 blocks to the U Street Metro station and two metro lines. One block from the new Trader Joe's, walk-able to Whole Foods.
The living room features Spanish tile floors throughout and is very spacious with an offset area large enough for a dinning table. Kitchen has a full sized fridge, stove, dishwasher and disposal.
Conveniently Located between the U St and Logan Circle neighborhoods, you get the best of both worlds! Whole Foods, P Street Commercial District, U Street Nightlife, 14th Street NW Corridor, and so much more!!
Bedrooms: Two
Bathrooms: One 
Neighborhood: U Street / Logan Circle
Kitchen: Dishwasher, Electric Range and Oven, Disposal, Refrigerator and Freezer. 
Laundry: W/D in Unit
Sq Ft: Appx. 980
Application Fee: $50/Applicant 
Deposit: Equivalent of The First Month's Rent
Fireplace: One Wood Burning 
Floors: Hardwood and Tile
A/C & Heat: Central AC and Heat 
Furnishings: NONE 
Closets/Storage: BR Closets, Built-Ins
Amenities: Patio, Pets Possible
Video Walkthrough- http://youtu.be/bG8-Sf5icYM
EJF Real Estate Services Inc. 
1428 U Street NW, Second Floor
Washington, DC 20009

Leasing Agent

Description:
(202) 299-9145 - Open Saturday at the Park Crest: Gorgeous 2 bed/1.5 bath with Hardwood & Great Closets! First month free! - Open Saturday, October 7th from 1:00 to 4:00 pm!
Free rent for October or November!
Featuring spacious living & bedrooms, excellent closet space, and 1 and a half bathrooms.
All utilities included with the exception of phone/cable/internet. The building features free to use additional storage space and bike storage, on-site laundry room, and a vibrant roof deck with fabulous views of Rock Creek Park & the National Cathedral!
The Park Crest combines modern luxury living and service in a well-maintained classic pre-war building. While the Park Crest sits adjacent to the serene Rock Creek Park, the building is also a short walk away from the vibrant Adams Morgan, Dupont Circle, and Woodley Park areas.
Converting to a smoke-free building. Sorry - no pets. Keener Management is an EHO provider.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE2017147) Other Amenities - Other- roof top deck with panoramic views of dc, personal storage bins and bike storage (no charge), on-site management and maintenance with 24 hour emergency service, on-site laundry facility, hardwood floors, stainless appliances, maple kitchen cabinets, granite countertops. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(301) 875-2167 - Washington Home For Rent near Bolling AFB Joint Base Anacostia - What a great home! Tucked away, who knew those homes were back there! Large Brick Front Detached home with loads of space for you a 1 car Garage and driveway with additional street parking too! Don't wait because you won't find this much space for this price in DC anywhere! Two story foyer, large upstairs hallway for furniture movement and decor; Beautiful Maple hardwood flooring on the 1st level. Spacious kitchen with 42" Oak cabinetry and black appliances with space for a 4 seat table. Large dining room large enough for 8 seats and a China cabinet. Large master bedroom with a large bathroom with a dual sink, separate shower and soaking tub. Our secondary bedrooms are large as well with a Jack and Jill bath with a dual sink between. Finished basement!!!! Potential 4th bedroom/office/theater room in basement with a Front loading laundry. This home shows very well and you won't be disappointed!
(RLNE1888326) Other Amenities - Other- large bedrooms, large walk-in closets, hardwood floors, fully finished basement, wet bar, fireplace, tile floor, security system, Garage, Yard.

Description:
---- SCHEDULE A SHOWING ONLINE AT: http://showmojo.com/lac/0c7112805a ----
This is a stunning and spacious 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath home with gorgeous hardwood floors and light-filled bay windows. The chef's kitchen features stainless appliances and granite counters, with beautiful white cabinetry that offsets the rich wood floors. The home includes a fireplace and a large backyard with plentiful space for entertaining and private parking. You'll be amazed at the detail and finishes in this wonderful home and enjoy it's excellent location - this house is labeled a "Walker's Paradise" with a Walk Score of 92!
Pets permitted with owner approval.

Description:
---- SCHEDULE A SHOWING ONLINE AT: http://showmojo.com/lac/5c5ec26032 ----
2 Bedroom escape in a Columbia Heights row house within walking distance of Petworth and Columbia Heights metro stops and bars. Modern and open kitchen and living area. Easy trip downtown from a centrally located neighborhood. 
Hardwood floors and granite counter tops. Recently renovated. 
Available October 1st for 9-month, 1-year or 2-year lease. 
This apartment is in an end-unit row house in Columbia Heights with a friendly neighborhood feel. Short walk to Rock Creek Park and the Columbia Heights and Petworth metro stops, Target, Giant Grocery, and Best Buy. Easy bus ride to the White House and downtown. Close to bars and restaurants on 11th Street, Lyman's, The Pinch, Mezcalero, Little Coco’s, Thip Khao, and The Red Derby.
Energy Star stainless steel appliances, washer/dryer, everything new. Central air and heat. Fully renovated.

Description:
---- SCHEDULE A SHOWING ONLINE AT: http://showmojo.com/lac/0bb1428013 ----
TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING: CALL or TEXT 202-759-7678
Address: 1234 Otis Street NE Washington, DC 20017
Market Rent: $4,500 for a 12 Month Lease
Property Type: Private Four Bedroom Home
Tenant Utilities: Water, Sewer, Trash, Electricity, Gas, Cable, Phone, & Internet
Pets: Yes, Case by Case
Status: Available Mid-September
Stunning four bedroom two bathrooms detached house with finished basement in beautiful neighborhood. House will be rented unfurnished. This home has plenty of windows, hardwood floors throughout, spacious living room with fireplace, separate dining room, 2 sun rooms, study. Kitchen has brand new stainless appliances including dishwasher, plenty of counter space.
Finished basement has full bathroom and brand new washer and dryer. Plenty of storage space. Front yard has open front porch overlooking a fountain, beautiful gardening. Private sprawling back yard with patio. Up on a hill, removed from street level, giving it a country estate feeling. Very close to Brookland metro, near Monroe Street Market, restaurants and shopping. 
Bedrooms: Four Bedrooms
Bathrooms: Two Bathrooms
Neighborhood: Brookland
Square Footage: 2,202
Parking: Street Parking
Pets: Yes, Case By Case Basis

Amenities: Private Home, Backyard, Patio, Two Sun Rooms, Finished Basement, Updated Kitchen, Plenty of Storage

Description:
Beautiful light-filled updated Wesley Heights 6 bedroom 4.5 bathroom home with views of Battery Kemble parkland. Boasting floor to ceiling windows and high ceilings throughout the main level. Step out into the woods from main level deck off family room or enjoy the view from the upper level deck off master bedroom suite. Newer kitchen and master bath. 
Large rooms and plenty of storage. Finished walkout lower level with additional recreational/family room, fireplace, bedroom with en suite bathroom. 
Short commute to American University, shops and restaurants. Located 2 miles from Georgetown University.
Pets considered on a case by case basis.
Contact us to schedule a showing.

Description:
This is a stunning 4 bedroom 2 full bath newly renovated house in Georgetown NW!!! 
The house also features washer and dryer, outdoor patio space, brand new renovations throughout the house, separate basement with small kitchen area, skylights on the top floor hallway and bathroom, hardwood floors and much much more!!!!
1640 30th Street NW Washington DC (Georgetown)
The house is under a 10 minute trip to a couple of metro stations (Dupont, foggy bottom), just a few blocks from the restaurants, shops, and nightlife that DuPont Circle and Adams Morgan have to offer!! Easy access to Rock Creek Park, downtown, entry/exit points to the city
Unit is available for move in August 1st 2017 inquire today to schedule a viewing!!!
* Outdoor patio area
* New renovations (Kitchen, bathroom, floors, bedrooms, dining areas, living room)
* Large bay windows facing the front of the house
* Skylights on top floor
* Central HVAC
* Washer/Dryer on location
* Beautiful finishes
* Hardwood Floors 
* GREAT LOCATION!!!

Description:
We have wonderful new units available in Mt. Pleasant, just minutes to Adams Morgan! 
This industrial-themed building includes exposed brick in the interior hallway and sits atop a hill, offering serene views of the neighborhood. All new units have been freshly painted with brand new carpet installed, and include the following features: 
-Bright living rooms with fresh carpet and large windows 
-Full kitchens
-Multiple Closets throughout, including walk-ins, linen, and hallway closets
-Washer/Dryer located on premise
-Some units come with full patio, balcony, or Juliet balconies
-Parking spot included! 
This bright apartment home is located at 17th and Newton, situated a block away from Piney Branch Park. You’re just a few blocks away from lively entertainment on 14th st, and less than a mile away from Columbia Heights Metro station, which houses a Giant, Target, Marshall's, and IHOP, and other great retail and restaurant options. 
The units boast tons of living space with natural light pouring in! 
Schedule a viewing today!!
Contact us to schedule a showing.

Description: This spacious 2 bedroom/1 bath apartment is located in a two story brick building in Ward 7 of the Fort DuPont Park neighborhood. The apartment has central air and heat, and is accessible to transportation, churches, schools, banks, grocery stores and shopping. The metro bus line is 1.5 blocks away and the Minnesota Metro station is a 20 minute walk. Subsidy programs allowed.

Description: Huge 3 story brick colonial with open floor plan offers approximately 3,000 finished square feet of living space! Master bedroom w/ private deck, master bath w/ separate shower and soaking tub. Gourmet kitchen has granite stainless and leads to the second deck. Finished lower level w/ in-law suite and private entrance. Hardwood and high ceilings throughout.Off street parking. Near metro.

Description: SIX MONTH LEASE ONLYNew construction townhouse from 2010 with three bedrooms and three bathrooms. Main living level features hardwood floors with open kitchen floor plan and island and door to deck for outdoor seating. Stainless steel and granite counter tops. Decorator painted walls. Upper floor features a master suite with double vanity bathroom and walk-in shower. Second bedroom has its own bathroom. Third bedroom is located on street level. Garage and driveway parking security system tenant expense and grounds that are maintained by the HOA. Ten minute walk to Fort Totten Metro station Walmart and other shops.Easy access to downtown DC or Silver Spring Takoma etc. Maximum three unrelated adults or total four people. No pets nor smoking. Credit score of 650 or above. Must have rental history with two favorable landlord reports. No history of landlord disputes or court cases no Chapter 7 bankruptcies etc. No recent convictions for crimes against people or property. Maximum lease six months or ending March 31 2018. For more information visit the Search Rentals page of our website www.ColumbiaPM.com. This home is professionally managed by Columbia Property Management. For a virtual walk-through of this property please visit https://youtu.be/y1DCUee0SUM

Description:
Large, updated 3BD/2.5BA available for rent in Columbia Heights! Fully furnished! This spacious home features beautiful hardwood floors, large windows, renovated kitchen, in-unit laundry and an open floor-plan. Decorative fireplace adds character and appeal. Kitchen features gas range stove, granite counters, and stainless-steel appliances. Captivating bathrooms feature newly designed sink patterns, standalone showers, and bathtubs with jacuzzi features. Apartment opens to its own back patio with room to garden and barbecue. 
96 Walkscore! Short walk to the U Street Corridor. Only a nine-minute walk from the Metro station (Yellow & Green Line), shops and many restaurants at Columbia Heights. On-street parking readily available in this neighborhood. 
$45 nonrefundable application fee. Pets subject to approval and $50 a month pet rent. Tenant responsible for gas, and electric.
TO SCHEDULE A SHOWING, COPY/PASTE... goo.gl/jfnshd ...INTO YOUR BROWSER.

Description:
Extra spacious 3BD/3.5BA home available for immediate move-in! Tons of character throughout this charming home - decorative fireplace, hardwood floors, gas range stove, dishwasher, and lots of cabinet space, complimented by granite countertops. Upstairs laundry. Features a fenced backyard space great for grilling and gardening, and space for parking. Three big bedrooms with large windows which let in tons of sunlight. The master bedroom has a walk-in closet - a rarity for DC! The home boasts a huge living room and dining room which is offset by beautiful sunporch.
Excellent location - 10 minute walk from Fort Totten Metro (Yellow, Red, and Green lines). Close to North Capitol Street for easy access downtown. Quiet, walkable residential neighborhood. Off-street parking!
Gas, water, and electric responsibility of the tenant. Pets subject to owner approval, and $50 a month pent rent. $45 nonrefundable application fee.
TO SCHEDULE A SHOWING, COPY/PASTE... goo.gl/TSdjie ...INTO YOUR BROWSER.

Description: BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION! 2 bedroom/2 bath penthouse with monuments views! Open floor plan with hardwood floors, private deck, recessed lighting and large sunny windows. Parking and in-unit washer/dryer included. Building features concierge, gym, and amazing rooftop with full kitchen and grills. Steps to all the restaurants and bars of H Street. New Whole Foods around the corner! Call 202-412-7462 for a showing!

Description:
Available Oct 06, 2017.
-
In the heart of Dupont, this sunny, fully-furnished studio, 1-bathroom is on the second floor of a beautiful Victorian with a large yard. The unit features an high ceilings, hardwood floors, an updated bathroom, a gas stove, a queen-size bed, a 37" HDTV, a washer and dryer in unit, and central air conditioning. It's just steps away from the best restaurants, groceries, transportation, cafés, and shopping in Dupont Circle and is only a few blocks from the bustling 14th Street Corridor. It's a short walk to Washington Sports Club, VIDA Fitness, and Hilton swimming pool (memberships required). The Dupont Circle (red line) Metro Station is less than a 10-minute walk away, and the U Street (green and yellow lines) Metro Station is less than 20 minutes away. Walk score: 98, Transit score: 88, Bike score: 93. On-site parking may be available for $270 per month. 
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Jan 26, 2018.
-
Enter into a large and majestic shared garden and veranda, this fully-furnished 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom basement apartment is a great find in Kalorama, bordering Adam's Morgan. This renovated apartment features updated appliances including a dishwasher, gas stove and microwave in the kitchen. There is king sized bed in one bedroom and a queen-sized bed in the other bedroom. There is an additional sleeping room that has a twin bed. This prime spot is located a block away from an organic market and the weekend farmer's market. Every city convenience is within a block - restaurants, grocery stores, public transport, dry cleaners, gyms, stores, urgent medical care, coffee shops, banks, electronics, nail and hair salons. The Woodley Park (red line) Metro Station is a 12-minute walk, and the Dupont Circle Metro (red line) is a twenty minute walk. Walk score: 96, Transit score: 80, Bike score: 94. 
Historic Developer Harry Wardman used this property as first development project.  Wardman was known for columns and large porches and his influence is seen throughout Washington DC.
* The apartment includes free monthly cleaning service.
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Nov 19, 2017.
-
Enjoy living in this fully loaded, fully furnished, sunny, spacious, renovated 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo in Dupont Circle. This condo has it all, including large-windows, washer and dryer, dishwasher, gas stove, HDTV, private deck, hardwood floors, queen size bed, comfortable living room and more. Also, as with all Attache properties, all utilities, internet cable, kitchenware and linens are included! Prime location with easy access to Dupont Metro, great restaurants, shopping, groceries and more.  Walk Score rates it a "Walkers Paradise". The property does not come with parking, but with this central location there are several garages in the area. The cafe downstairs is only open during business hours and serves a great cup of morning coffee. Building was fully renovated in 2013. 
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Jan 02, 2018.
-
This newly renovated 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom English Basement apartment provides great access to downtown and Capitol Hill. Property features two walk-in closets, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, central air, a full size washer and dryer, queen size bed, and a large shared back patio.  You can easily access the Washington Hospital Center and backyard opens onto Bloomingdale’s “secret garden” Crispus Attucks Park.  Also, the Safeway is about 6 blocks away.  However, Giant and U Street shops are within easy walking distance.  Served by Shaw/Howard Metro, G8, G2 and 80 bus lines.  (G8 and 80 are two blocks away.)  
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Nov 06, 2017.
-
This newly renovated 1 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom condo in a Dupont Rowhome is conveniently located between 21st Street, N Street and M Street providing easy access to both the Dupont Circle and Foggy Bottom neighborhoods.  They offer many restaurants, shops and grocery store choices.  Walk Score rates this property a "Walker Paradise". The Dupont Metro is just a 5 minute walk. Enjoy this properties wonderful charm in the heart of the city from the moment you see it. It features hardwood floors throughout the apartment. The kitchen comes stocked with all the tools needed for cooking.  A queen bed is in the bedroom.  No trips to the laundry mat.  There is a washer/dryer in the condo. Pets are welcome!
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available May 02, 2018.
-
This fully-furnished, luxury 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo has expansive windows and modern style. The unit features hardwood floors throughout, an electric fireplace and queen-sized bed in the master bedroom, a two person double shower and a separate steam shower in the en suite master bath, all stainless steel appliances including a dish washer and a wine fridge in the high-end kitchen, a 55" HDTV, an in unit washer and dryer, and central air conditioning. The building has a 24-hour concierge/front desk, a sizable fitness room, a roof deck with a lap pool and an entertainment space including a grill, a business center, and a party room with a pool table. This prime spot is perfectly located for easy access to the museums, night-life, sporting, and arts events of Penn Quarter, the National Mall, Chinatown, and Judiciary Square as well as all of the amazing restaurants that can be found close by. The building is less than a 10-minute walk from a newly-built Safeway and across the street from a CVS. The Gallery Pl-Chinatown (green, yellow, and red lines) and Judiciary Square (red) Metro Stations are both an easy 7-minute walk away. A Capital Bikeshare stand is less than 200 yards away. Walk score: 96, Transit score: 100, Bike score: 83. 
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description:
Available Nov 08, 2017.
-
This spacious 3-story townhome in Palisades has 2 bedrooms, a den and 3.5 baths. The home, professionally decorated with fine art and features hardwood floors throughout, a gas fireplace, a dining room, formal and informal living rooms. The house includes a 47" HDTV, a gourmet kitchen with a large wine fridge. There is a king-size bed in the master bedroom and two single-beds in the second bedroom, a washer and dryer and central air conditioning. The fenced in back yard is secluded space and an ideal place for relaxing. It's a short walk to local parks, the historic C&O Canal, the Capital Crescent Bike Trail, restaurants, markets, and more. There are two parking spaces available behind the house for $270 each. Major bus lines in to Downtown run regularly along MacArthur Boulevard. Walk score: 72, Transit score: 40, Bike score: 76.
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Apr 08, 2018.
-
Spacious, sunny, fully-furnished 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom condo with city views from the tenth floor of a luxury downtown condo building. The unit features include hardwood floors throughout, 55" HDTV, dishwasher, queen-size bed and large closets in the bedroom, in-unit washer and dryer, and central air conditioning and heat. Enjoy complete convenience in a building with concierge service, a fitness center, a roof deck with amazing views, a library, and a party room.
The building is surrounded by a great mix of retail and restaurants, including the Verizon Center, a 24-hour flagship Walgreens store, and the National Portrait Gallery and Smithsonian American Art Museum just across the street. The Gallery Place Chinatown (red, green, and yellow lines) Metro Station is less than 200 feet away on the same block. Parking is available through Colonial Parking in the building garage (approx. $270 per month). 
Click here to inquire about our property availability
.

Description:
Available May 11, 2018.
-
This fully furnished 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo is perfectly located for the professional urban dweller who seeks convenience and access to the newest parts of Washington DC. This beautiful pet friendly unit features hard wood floors, a private balcony, a gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops, and a washer and dryer in unit. This new building offers a 24 hour concierge service, a rooftop pool with panoramic city views and grilling area, a fitness center, and easy access to Downtown and Chinatown. Just a few city blocks from an amazing selection of restaurants, shops and more at Chinatown, Logan Circle, the K Street business district, and the convention center.  This building is just one block from the Mt Vernon Sq. Metro Station (Green and Yellow lines) and also offers a garage parking spot if desired. Walk score: 96, Transportation score: 100, Bike score: 95.
Please note, although our minimum reservation term is typically 30 days, this particular building requires at least a six month reservation.
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description:
Available Jun 04, 2018.
-
Fully-furnished, immaculately renovated 2 story, 2 bedroom, plus den, 2.5 bathroom Capitol Hill row house. This beautiful home is located next to the center of the largest Victorian Historic district in the United States. Restaurants, groceries, shops and more are all within close proximity. The home features high-end upgrades and decorator accents throughout, including a private rear deck, and fenced in yard. Garage parking option for one car. The home features several decorative fireplaces and skylights. The gourmet kitchen has a gas stove, stainless steel appliances, a wine fridge and exposed brick and pipe decor. The master bedroom has a king size bed and custom closets.  A queen bed is in the 2nd bedroom. This property includes central air conditioning and a large washer/dryer. The home is 6 blocks from the Eastern Market Metro (orange and blue lines). Walk Score: 78 (Very Walkable), Transportation Score: 78, Bike Score: 96.  
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Feb 06, 2018.
-
This fully-furnished, luxury 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo is on the 10th floor of CityCenterDC. The property features hardwood floors throughout, a California King bed in the master bedroom with walk-in closet, ensuite bathroom. All stainless steel appliances including a dish washer, and in unit washer and dryer are in the condo. The condo includes custom closets, designer furniture, plus a large private balcony.  The second bedroom features a queen-sized Urban Essentials Comfort Sleeper sofa-bed (very comfortable, but can be replaced by a regular queen bed if preferred).
The building has a 24-hour concierge/front desk, a sizable fitness room, a roof deck and an entertainment space including a grill, and a bike storage. This prime spot is perfectly located for easy access to the museums, night-life, sporting, and arts events of Penn Quarter, the National Mall, Chinatown, and Judiciary Square as well as all of the amazing restaurants that can be found close by. The building is surrounded by fantastic new restaurants such as Momofuku and DelFrisco's and shops such as Hermes, Longchamp and TUMI. The building is less than a 10-minute walk from the newly-built Safeway. The Metro Center Station (red, blue, orange, silver lines) is three blocks away and Gallery Place (yellow, green, red lines) is two blocks away.

Description:
Available Feb 01, 2018.
-
Live on a quiet street in the heart of Friendship Heights just 2 blocks from Wisconsin Avenue in this 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom bungalow. Both the Friendship Heights and Tenleytown metro stations are just 3 blocks. Walk Score rates this location "very walkable". The multiplex theater, restaurants, Mazza Gallerie and Chevy Chase Pavilion shopping are all within close walking distance. Many private and public schools including Janney Elementary School, Deal Middle School, and Wilson High School are walkable. This charming 1926 bungalow was meticulously updated in the 1990s without losing any of its 1926 charm. The home features a well-appointed living room with a gas fireplace, dining room, a half bath and remodeled kitchen, with a new quartz counter-top, Bosch dishwasher, Samsung gas range and a second fireplace (wood-burning) just off the kitchen.  The master bath includes 2 sinks, shower stall, and Jacuzzi tub. Cathedral ceilings and a queen bed adorn the large 20x16 master bedroom. The 2nd bedroom has a double bed and the 3rd has a twin bed. The top floor also includes another room that can be used as an office.  As an added bonus the basement has a spacious family room and a large storage area with a washer and dryer. The home features both a front and back porch with a landscaped back yard. Pets are welcome!
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Jun 02, 2018.
-
This 4-level, 4 bedroom, 2 full and 2 half bathroom townhouse features grand style living in the heart of Georgetown. Walk 8 blocks to the Dupont Metro and 4 blocks to M Street shops and restaurants. Features include high-end kitchen appliances and finishes, a private rear patio for entertaining and a media room off the living room. Kitchen level has been completely renovated to include all new top-tier appliances, a new pantry, quartz counter tops and bar. It is stocked with all the tools needed for cooking. The Master Bedroom has a king bed.  A queen is in the 2nd bedroom.  The 3rd and 4th bedrooms each have a twin bed. Up to 2 small pets are welcome.

Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Dec 10, 2017.
-
Fully furnished modern 1-bedroom, 1-bath in one of DC's best locations, just blocks from Eastern Market and Barracks Row Main Street. Enjoy the stylish furnishings provided by the West Elm design team. This condo is on the main level of a three-story building. Property features include sofabed in the living room, renovated bathroom fixtures and tiling, central air conditioning, washer/dryer in the unit, and queen-sized bed. 
Eastern Market metro is just three blocks away, which is approximately a 5-minute walk. Plus, Capitol South metro 6 blocks, and Navy Yard 9 blocks away. The property is just 2 blocks from Barracks Row’s Main Street retail corridor, which includes the 2014 Best New Restaurant in America, Rose’s Luxury, among a vibrant group of restaurants, bars, and other retail. The Shakespeare Theater Company relocated to 8th Street, bringing acclaimed performing arts to the area. Several parks are walking distance, including Marion Park, which is 1/2 block north.
Located walking distance to grocers Harris Teeter, Yes Organic Market, Safeway, and Whole Foods. Walk south to visit Washington Nationals Park, as well as the burgeoning SW and SE waterfront developments. Reagan National Airport is less than a 10-minute drive. Option to add parking subject to availability, please inquire for availability. 
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Tentatively available Nov 08, 2017. See website for details.
-
In the heart of Georgetown, this bright, fully-furnished 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom condo is on the top floor of a row house. The unit features a spacious living room with hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and gas stove in the kitchen, a queen-size bed, HDTV, a washer and dryer in unit, and window air conditioning.
The house is located just steps to Georgetown's famous M Street with restaurants, grocery stores, shopping, coffee shops, entertainment, and more. The 38B bus, the DC Circulator: Dupont - Georgetown - Rosslyn bus, and the D5 bus stop is one minute away. The Foggy Bottom (blue, orange, and silver lines) Metro Station is a 20-minute walk away. Walk score: 98, Transit score: 72, Bike score: 83. Parking, subject to availability, is at the 3222 M Street garage through Colonial Parking.
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Jan 12, 2018.
-
Walking distance to everything, this modern furnished 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom corner unit condo on the 8th floor has it all! Walk Score rates this location a "Walkers Paradise". The building offers easy access to WestEnd, Foggy Bottom, Georgetown and the Rock Creek Park. Restaurants, groceries, coffee shops and errands can be accomplished on foot. IMF, The State Department, World Bank and The Kennedy Center are all easy commutes.  Trader Joe's and many other local markets are just footsteps from your door. The Orange & Blue Metro Lines at the Foggy Bottom Station are a 10 minute walk. Dupont Metro Red Line is 14 minutes walk. The property features hardwood floors, a huge balcony and tons of sunlight. One bathroom with a tub. The 1st bedroom has a queen size bed. The 2nd bedroom has a daybed that pulls out to a king size bed. A washer and dryer are in the condo. Garage parking spot available. 
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description:
Available Dec 29, 2017.
-
Enjoy living in this renovated top floor 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom fully-furnished condo located blocks from Logan Circle and the new City Centre. This condo features updated appliances, hardwood floors, a shared rear patio and great sunlight. The washer and dryer is stacked and apartment includes central A/C. This property is three blocks to Whole Foods, Logan Tavern, and all the best that Logan/14th St has offer. Parking for 1 car is available for an additional monthly fee. Walk score: 94, Transportation score: 89, Bike score: 94.
 
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description:
Available Feb 01, 2018.
-
Fully furnished 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom brick town house hidding behind the century-old wall facade of Beekman Place over looking Meridian Hill Park and the lights and sounds of the city below located just a couple blocks from the hustle and bustle of U Street and 14th Street.  The property features large spaces where sunshine pours in through the day, hardwood floors throughout, a working fireplace, custom built-in displays, with a balcony and grill.  The kitchen has upgraded stainless appliances and granite counters with a little breakfast nook that leads into a dining room furnished with a farm table.  The second floor is home to two bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of which is the master suite with a large open space, natural light, organized closets, and a master bathroom with a tile shower and vanity.  There is a washer and dryer in the unit, a 1/2 bathroom on the first floor, and two uncovered parking spaces available.  This prime location is just 2 blocks from 14th and U Street and all of the newest restaurants, shopping, and fitness studios including a Trader Joes coffee shops and so much more.  The U Street Metro Station (Green and Yellow lines) is a 12 minute walk.  Walk score: 92 Transit score: 84 Bike score: 87    
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description:
Available Oct 06, 2017.
-
Fully furnished, Dupont Circle studio condo on the 9th floor of the historic Cairo building. Located in the tallest building in DC, guests will love the amazing views from the apartment and roof deck. Just one block to a grocery store, restaurants, shopping and more! The condo features exposed brick walls, high ceilings, hardwood floors and a queen size bed. Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and all the tools needed for cooking are in the kitchen. This property includes central air conditioning. The building has a 24 hour front desk, roof deck, and a laundry room. The Dupont Metro (red line) is 3 blocks - a 5 minute walk! Walk Score: 100 (Walkers Paradise), Transportation Score: 93, Bike Score: 93. 
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please Note: this property has a six month minimum stay required.

Description:
Available Nov 28, 2017.
-
Fully-furnished 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo sits on the 7th floor of a 9 floor high-rise condo building designed by the famous architect I.M. Pei. The property features wonderful views of the Nationals Stadium, Capitol, and Library of Congress through the floor to ceiling windows. This bright unit has hardwood floors, central air, private washer and dryer, stainless steel appliances and a gas stove and range. The building is host to a gym, shared courtyard and patios, and additional bike storage if needed. Conveniently located in the Waterfront neighborhood in SW DC, it is on the same block as the Waterfront Metro (Green Line), Safeway, and within a couple blocks of several restaurants, shops and studios.
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description:
Available Feb 02, 2018.
-
Fully furnished 1 bedroom, 1 bath condo on the second floor of a Capitol Hill brownstone. Property features central air conditioning, in-unit washer and dryer, queen size bed, gas stove, and shared rear patio and fenced in yard.
This popular location is just steps from some of DC's best restaurants, plus grocery stores, a year-round outdoor market, great transportation (including to the Capitol Buildings and museums), great schools and other neighborhood amenities are with in close walking distance. Walkscore ratings: 94 Walker's Paradise, 83 Excellent Transit, 94 Biker's Paradise. Just an 8 minute walk to Eastern Market Metro Station which includes the Orange, Silver, and Blue lines. 
 
Click here to inquire about our property availability
Please note: For stays shorter than 90 days there is a required 14.5% Washington, DC Hotel Tax due in addition to the rental amount.

Description: Park 7 is ready for its close-up, and so is the neighborhood. Take a look at all we have to offer. Park 7 Apartments are the new standard in Northeast, DC living. Outfitted with modern features, fixtures, and finishes, and topped off by a naturally chic amenity lineup – including active courtyards and nearby parks, not to mention easy Metro access – it's without compare in the market. Park 7 is smart and stylish, just like you.
