Description:
---- SCHEDULE A SHOWING ONLINE AT: http://showmojo.com/lac/8beb8a9055 ----
This beautiful and classic home features gorgeous wooden floors, a chef's kitchen with modern stainless appliances, and wonderful finishes throughout the property. The master suite includes a luxury bath and the home includes an in-law suite with its own separate entrance and separate kitchen that's great for entertaining. The house includes a Nest thermostat and outdoor camera, along with a second washer and dryer unit in the in-law suite. You'll love the location - the house is labeled a "Walker's Paradise" with a Walk Score of 92.

Description:
(202) 547-7895 - Capitol Hill. Spacious Two Bedroom Apt. just two blocks from Metro rail and Grocery Store - Capitol Hill, spacious Two Bedroom Apt. just two blocks from Metro rail and Grocery Store. Located at 513 12th St. SE 20003 which is near the corner of 12th St. and Pennsylvania Ave. Rent is $1,900.00 per month. Security deposit is also $1,900.00. Tenant pays for gas and electricity as the only mandatory utilities. Lease is for one year minimum. One cat is permitted, no dogs please.
Unit is located just two blocks from a Metro rail station (Potomac Ave.) on the Orange, Blue, and Silver lines. There’s a Harris Teeter grocery store just two blocks away. No need to own a car! Restaurants, bars, coffee shops, nightlife, and cultural attractions can be found just a few blocks away on the Barracks Row commercial corridor of 8th St. and PA. Ave. SE.
This first floor apartment features two large bedrooms w/ plenty of closet space, a rear porch, and a large back yard for barbecues or tossing the Frisbee. Central A/C and heat are controlled in the unit. High ceilings and working windows help make this unit feel more like a house than an apartment. A washer+dryer and a dishwasher are also included in the unit.
Prospective applicants must view the dwelling to receive an application. No site unseen rentals. Application fee is $30 to pay for the credit check. Applicants must provide documentation of income. 
To arrange a viewing please call Home Realty at 202 547-7895. Leave a voice message if calling after business hours. 
Equal Housing Opportunity

Description:
Welcome Home.
One of the best things about apartment living in Washington, DC is that you don’t have to reside in large, impersonal high rises. The Glenwood offers style and space in the charming Brookland neighborhood. We are just minutes from Metro, shopping and Catholic University. With a Walk Score of 77 (Very Walkable) and a Transit Score of 88 (Excellent Transit), you won’t be far from anywhere you need to be. And, best of all, The Glenwood is a warm and friendly apartment community staffed by professionals committed to providing the best service possible.
The newly renovated interiors include brand new kitchens and baths, large, sunny windows, gleaming hardwood floors and ample closet space. Every apartment offers brushed nickel hardware finishes, two tone paint and kitchens with brand new appliances. All that is missing is you!

Description:
(202) 462-5106 - Chic City Living at the Etta on Vermont - This boutique property houses a brand new 1 BD/1 BA. With a "walk-score" of 97, this an ideal urban location, not requiring a car. Within 2 blocks of the Green/Yellow lines at U Street/Cardozo Metro Station; and car sharing and bike sharing locations. Dash out your door to the eclectic energy of the surrounding U Street, Shaw and Logan Circle neighborhoods.
This chic, comfortable and stylish unit features a modern kitchen with maple cabinetry, granite counters, glass tile, stainless appliances; luxurious baths with porcelain tiles, hardwood flooring, video intercom system and individual washer/dryers. Common patio area and bike storage racks on site for your use. 
Pets are welcome.
This property is located at 1810 Vermont Ave NW #2, WDC. 
Contact us today to schedule an appointment: (202) 462-5106 ext 1016; (804) 571-1404.
Professionally Managed By
KL Associates, Inc. 
1350 Wallach Place, NW
Washington, DC 20009
klproperties.com

Description: Welcome to The Policy Apartments a historic boutique community steps away from 18th Street in the Kalorama Triangle neighborhood. Enjoy the best of both worlds with direct access to Adams Morgan and Dupont Circle where a plethora of fine dining and entertainment are available for your enjoyment. The Policy offers finely polished Studio, One and Two bedroom homes, rich with both modern and vintage touches. If you are looking to experience both that genuine home feeling and the stimulating DC life, come and check out the Policy where your new home awaits you!

Description:
(240) 997-3585 - 2 Bed 1 Bath Renovated Unit w Yard Space on Capitol Hill 1 Block from Library of Congress! - Enter this gorgeously renovated ground-floor unit into a small foyer with coat closet. To the right of the foyer is the living/dining area (8x6). Kitchen comes fully equipped with a gas range, refrigerator, dishwasher and garbage disposal along with granite countertops and good cabinet space. The first bedroom (10x9) is found directly off of the kitchen and has a walk-in closet. The second bedroom (9x9) also has a walk-in closet along with direct access to the hall bath. Washer/dryer stack unit is located in a closet off of the foyer. Hardwood floors throughout the apartment. A small fenced in front yard and patio area complement this wonderful unit. Street parking only! Pets negotiable. 12 month minimum lease required, but longer terms encouraged! To inquire, please call or text WMS at 240-997-3585.
(RLNE3370752) Other Amenities - Other- granite countertops, washer/dryer stack unit. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Garbage Disposal. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
Updated studio apartment available for rent in Capitol Hill! This gorgeous apartment is located inside the Jenkins Row building, right above Potomac Avenue Metro station and Harris Teeter. The apartment features updated appliances, washer/dryer in unit, granite countertops, updated bathroom with deep soaking tub, hardwood floors, and central A/C. Unit has lots of closet space, including walk-in closet. Enjoy the top floor lounge area steps from your door. Building includes 24/7 concierge service, large fitness center, business center, game/lounge area, and quiet courtyard terrace. 
97 Walkscore! Harris Teeter grocery store and Subway in the building! Apartment building on top of Potomac Avenue Metro, and close to Barracks Row, Eastern Market, and Capitol Hill. Utilities responsibility of the tenant. Sorry, no pets. $45 nonrefundable application fee. Move in fees required due to Condo Association: $500 non-refundable move-in fee, $500 refundable condo deposits for move-in/move-out (refunded after moves complete).

Beautifully landscaped, this comfortable, sought-after community is convenient to Adams Morgan, is within walking distance of the Columbia Heights Metro Station, and is four blocks the new Target and Staples! Park Pleasant offers affordable, spacious studios, one bedroom and one bedroom/den apartments. So don't delay, call or visit Park Pleasant today!

Description: The Capitol Terrace Apartments is a boutique-sized 16 unit building that is composed of 1 bedroom apartments and is located on the Senate side of Capitol Hill. Convenient to all of the Congressional Office Buildings, only 3 blocks away from the Capitol, shops, restaurants, and Metro stop of Union Station. Capitol Terrace offers the best the Hill has to offer. Well known for its balconies, the building has a variety of spacious floor plans, as well as off-street parking. Beautifully renovated apartments with new kitchens and bathrooms are complimented by the designer. Common areas are decorated, creating a comfortable living environment for the building's residents.

Description: 638 Independence Avenue SE is a 6 unit building made up of one and two bedroom apartments. Its conveniently located on Capitol Hill and only 2 blocks from Eastern Market. Attractively renovated apartments with flexible floor plans and private off-street parking are just a few of the features of this always popular building.

Welcome to the Abby Apartments. Located in the gorgeous Cathedral Heights/ Glover Park , just 4-blocks from the National Cathedral, this picturesque property sits directly on the Wisconsin Avenue bus route to wisk you away to shopping in Bethesda or to experience the elegant night life of Georgetown or Washington, D.C.
Beautiful one bedroom apartments, designed with turn-of-the-century ambiance, feature elegant 9-foot ceilings, polished hardwood floors, and much more. Coin-operated laundry. Please call for an appointment today! PLEASE REPLY to have first picks on open availabilities with our beautiful apartment homes! OFFICE HOURS: MONDAY- SATURDAY 9-6PM. Description: The Normandie we are a charming six-story building that offers large apartment homes overlooking Georgia Avenue. Each apartment is complete with hardwood floors, spacious closets, full kitchen, abundant cabinet space and separate dining area. You will have a full bathroom with soaking tub and vanity. The Normandie offers controlled access, dedicated on-site service team, 24 emergency on call, fitness center, and close to public transportation. We are minutes away from downtown Silver Spring and Takoma Station. We are a pet friendly community that allows one pet per home, and have weight and breed restrictions. We have studios and one bedrooms available at this time. Currently our studios are starting at $1220 -$1295, and one bedrooms are starting at $1563-$1599 with all utilities included. We do not have two bedrooms available for leasing. Our office hours are Monday-Friday from 9-5pm. We are closed on weekends. Please feel free to give us a call at (202)882-1909 or (202)838-2764 to make an appointment.

Description: 3 Tree Flats is located along Georgia Avenue, NW, just steps from the Metro. Our community features resident controlled access, green roof with deck ,Clubroom, Fitness Room and Garage Parking Available. A commuter's dream, only minutes to Downtown DC or Silver Spring. Our Studio, Loft, 1 and 2 Bedroom homes feature Stainless Steel appliances, track lighting, dishwashers, ceramic tiled bath, individual Washer and Dryer, brushed nickel finishes and wood style flooring. Schedule your tour today!

Cutting edge amenities, meticulously-groomed grounds, and a dedicated staff contributes to a higher standard of living. Nestled quietly in the heart of the Bellevue SW, Washington DC and close to Bolling Airforce Base, The DC Police Academy, I-495, I-295, and within 1 mile of the Wilson Bridge. Bus stop at the front door!

Description: Chillum Manor’s beautifully landscaped grounds provide the perfect welcome to one of the finest garden style communities in the Brookland neighborhood. These sunny one and two-bedroom apartment homes feature walk-in closets, separate dining areas, spacious living rooms, remodeled kitchens, ceiling fans, and beautiful wood flooring. The courteous and professional staff at Chillum Manor attends to your every need, while controlled access gives you peace of mind. Built in 1940, Chillum Manor offers both style and convenience. Effortless access to all of DC with Metrobus at your doorstep and both the Red and Green line Metrorail stations just minutes away. Make the move to Brookland’s most welcoming garden style community—Chillum Manor.

Description:
Columbia Heights is D.C.'s hip and up-and-coming neighborhood. In a matter of minutes, you can go from the quiet suburban lifestyle, with family owned restaurants and farmer's markets in Mount Pleasant to a real urban feel, complete with a huge shopping mall featuring stores like Target, Marshals, DSW and Best Buy. The Newton Towers is just a couple of blocks away from the metro station on the Green and Yellow Line, only a few stops away from Gallery Place and L'Enfant Plaza, connecting you to all six metro lines in the Capital. Buses running north and south along 14th Street and 16th Street are some of the city's busiest, and a Circulator bus runs east and west. Residents also enjoy the convenience of a Giant supermarket open 24/7 just five short minutes away and the emerging restaurant scene on 11th Street. Our Community
Winner of "Best of DC" for two years in a row, our well maintained 56 units apartment building is located in the heart of this fantastic neighborhood. This property offers on-site manager, exercise room, card operated laundry facility, bike storage and on-site park with 4 Zipcars available 24/7. Utilities are always included! Your Home is Filled with natural light and features beautiful hardwood floors, ceiling fan, central air and heat and outlet with built-in USB charger. We also welcome our feline friends at no extra charge. Schedule a visit now and ask for our great Parking Fall Special! Appointments can be scheduled from Mon to Sat, 8 AM to 6 PM. The application process is quick and easy. Visit us and see for yourself why you should choose the Newton Towers as your next home! Please contact us via email for more information!

Description: The Drake offers efficiently designed luxury apartments in Dupont Circle at a comfortable price. Located in historic Dupont Circle, The Drake is close to Downtown D.C., as well as Logan Circle, 14th Street, the West End and Georgetown. Comprised of studios, junior one-bedroom and two-bedroom apartments, the Drake offers many designer finishes including hardwood floors, custom cabinets, silestone countertops with matching backsplash, stainless steel appliances and Bosch washers and dryers. The spacious baths include tiled bath floors with matching tub surround and custom wood vanities. Recessed lighting, custom closets and custom window shades complete the package. Complementing the apartments at The Drake is a fitness center, coffee and tea bar, private dining room with gourmet kitchen, business center, resident lounge and rooftop deck with grilling stations and views of the Washington Monument. Personal storage space and bike storage are also included in the rent. The Drake provides courteous and professional on-site management, maintenance and 24-hour front desk services.

Description: The Calumet Apartments consists of 10 one and two bedroom apartments in a historic four story, Federal style building at the corner of 3rd and East Capitol Street on Capitol Hill. The building has been extensively renovated and the apartments feature the amenities of newer Capitol Hill properties. It is located on the most well known street on the Hill, and most of the apartments possess views of the Capitol dome. The Calumet offers a unique opportunity to enjoy Capitol Hill living at its finest.

Description:
What is most important to you in an apartment?
If you are looking for an incredible location, The Rockford is close to Rock Creek Park, public transportation and downtown DC. With a walk score of 70 and a transit score of 64, you know you will be able to get anywhere you want to go with ease. If you are looking for space, our ample floorplans are complemented by generous closet space. You will have plenty of furniture arrangement options. If what you want is charm and comfort, The Rockford is perfect. This elevator building offers unique touches such as a midcentury lobby, large windows with great views and hardwood flooring that gleams. And, if what you want is to live in an apartment building where your needs are met in a timely and professional manner, you have found your new home. Our award winning customer service and cutting edge communication tools will make your life easy. No matter what is most important to you in an apartment, you have found it here. Welcome home!
